tō maē asaṁjāyasaṅkēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — nahi nahi tti.

tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ — na tara kuppiyavvaṁ rāyasāsaṇamiṇaṁ, jaṁ tē gēhamava
lōiyavvaṁ ti.
maē bhaṇiyaṁ — na etya avasarō kōbassa, payāparirakkhaṇanimittaṁ samārambhō dēvassa.

taō paviṭṭhā mē gēhaṁ saha nayaravuḍḍēhi
rāyapurisā.

avalōiyaṁ ca tēhiṁ nāgāpayāraṁ daviṇajāyaṁ, diṭṭhaṁ ca payattahāviyaṁ candananāmaṅkiyaṁ hiraṇṇavāsaṇaṁ, nīṇiyaṁ bāhi, daṁsiyaṁ
candaṇabhaṇḍāriyassa.
abalōiūṇa sadukkhamiva bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēga-aṇuharaï tāva ēyaṁ, na uṇa nissaṁsayaṁ viyāṇāmi tti.

kāraṇiēhi
bhaṇiya-vāēhi tāva avahariyanivēyaṇāpattagaṁ, kiṁ tatya imaṁ īisaṁ abhilihiyaṁ na pa ti.

vāiyaṁ pattagaṁ, diṭṭhamabhilihiyaṁ sajjhasī
bhūyā nāyarakāraṇiyā.
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēhi — satthavāhaputta! kuō tuha imaṁ.

tō maē vi cintiyaṁ — kaha sambhāvaṭhāviyaṁ mittanāsaṁ payā
sēmi.
mā nāma tēṇāvi karhi ci ēsō ēvaṁ cēva samāsāiō bhavē.

tā kahaṁ niyapāṇabahumāṇāō mittapāṇē paricayāmi tti cintiūṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ maē— niyagaṁ cēva ēyaṁ ti.

tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ — kahaṁ candaṇanāmaṅkiyaṁ? maē bhaṇiyaṁ — na yāṇāmō, kahiṁci vāsaṇaparāvattō bhavi
ssaï.
tēhiṁ bhaṇiya-kisaṁkhiyaṁ kiṁ vā hiraṇṇajāyametthaṁ ti? maē bhaṇiyaṁ — na muṭhṭha mumarāmi, sēī cēva jōēha.

kāraṇiēhi bhaṇiyaṁ —
vāēha pattagaṁ, kiṁdaviṇajuttaṁ kiṁsaṁkhiyaṁ vā taṁ candaṇasatyavāhavāsaṇaṁ ti.
vāiyaṁ pattagaṁ jāva dīṇāradaviṇajuttaṁ dasasahassasaṁkhiyaṁ ca.

kahaṁ appaḍihayacakkasatthavāhaputē
maē taṁ cēvāṇucintiūṇa taṁ cēva sihaṁ ti.
tēhiṁ ciya dhiratthu dēvassa tti bhaṇiūṇa mantiyaṁ.

anaṁpi tē na kiṁci parasantiya
gēhē ciṭṭhaï? maē bhaṇiya-na kiṁci.

taō tēhiṁ pattagaṁ vāiūṇa savisēsamavalōiyaṁ mē gēhaṁ, diṭṭhaṁ ca jahāvāiyaṁ niravasēsa mēva ritthaṁ
etthantarammi ya kuviyā mamōvari ārakkhigā.
satyavāhaputta! vināubhayalōyamaggō tuma, tā na tui ēyamērisamasāhucariyamasaṁbhāvaṇijja saṁbhāvēmi tti.

tā kahēhi tātra,
paramatyō tti? taō maē taṁ cēva cintiūṇa bāhajalabhariyalōyaṇēṇaṁ na kiṁpijī pēyaṁ naravaïpuraō tti.

taō rāiṇā samuppannāsaṁ
kēṇāvi tāyabahumāṇō asarisaṁ vayaṇamabhāsiūṇa kayatthaṇaṁ cākāūṇa nidhisaō samāṇattō mhi, nīgiōya rāyapurisēhiṁ nayarāō,
mukkō ya nayaradēvayāvaṇasamīvē.
samuppanā ya mē cintā-kimēdahamettaparibhavabhāyaṇēṇaṁ aja vi jīviēṇaṁ.
tā ēyamni nayaradēvayāvaṇasamāsannē naggōhapāyavē ukkalambēmi appāṇaṁ ti.

etthantarammi ya kahiṁci
ābhōiūṇa imaṁ vaïyaramōhiṇā samuppannā mamōvari nayaradēvayāē aṇukampā.

āvēsiūṇa rāyajaṇaṇi sāhiyaṁ jahaṭṭhiyamēva ēvaṁ tīē
rāiyō.

bhaṇiō ya rāyaḥ-imāē maïlaṇāē amugammi nayara jāṇāsannē naggōhapāyavē umbandhaṇēṇa attāṇayaṁ paricaïuṁ vavasiō cakka
dēvō.
tā lahuṁ nivārēhi, taṁ sammāṇiūṇa ya pavēsēhi nayaraṁ ti.

taō kōhanēhāulayāē saṁkiṇaṁ rasamaṇuhavantō rāyā arē geṇhaha
durāyāraṁ jannadēvaṁ ti āisiūṇa pahāṇavārūyārūḍhō samaṁ ahāsannihiyapariyaṇēṇaṁ turiyaturiyaṁ nigaō nayarāō, pattō ya nayarujāṇaṁ.
diṭṭhō ya ahaṁ rāiṇā naggōhapāyavasāhāgaō uttarīyanibaddhapāsammi ḍhōiyāē sirōharāē attāṇayaṁ pavāhiukāmō tti.

taō sō dūraō
cēva saṁbhamāisayaniyaḍiyasāraṁ bhō cakkadēva! mā sāhasaṁ mā sāhasaṁ ti bhaṇamāṇō sigṣayaratajjiyāē vārūyāē samallīṇō pāyavasa
mīvaṁ.
sayamēva avaṇīō pāsaō, geṇhiūṇa ya karammi ṭhāviō ahaṁ tēṇa vārūyāpaṭṭiyāē.

bhaṇiō ya sabahumāṇaṁ-bhō satthavāhaputta!
juttaṁ nāma bhavaō maē vi pucchi yassa sambhāvāsāhaṇaṁ?.
taō maē cintiyaṁ-hanta kimēyaṁ ti, payāsiyaṁ bhavissaï kēṇaï mittagujjhaṁ.

etthantarammi ya bhaṇiyaṁ rāiṇā-bhō sasthavāhaputta! sāhiō mama ēsa vaïyarō ambaṁ pavisiūṇa bhayavaīē nayaradēvayāē, jahā nidōsō
tumaṁ, dōsayārī ya ettha durāyārō jannadēvō.
tā khamiyatvaṁ tumaē, jamaē amuṇiyaparamatyēṇaṁ kayatthiōsi tti.

taō maē hanta saṁpattō
vasaṇaṁ jannadēvō tti cintiūṇa bhaṇiō rāyā-dēva! rāyadhammō'yaṁ, payāparirakkhaṇasamujjayassa natthi dōsō dēvassa.

jannadēvamūlamuddhiṁ
pi gavēsēu dēvō, na tammi mahāṇubhāvē aṇāyaraṇaṁ saṁbhāvīyaï.

rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — gaviṭṭhā mūlasuddhī, sāhiyaṁ bhayavaīē— savvamiṇaṁ tēṇa
pāvēṇa vavasiyaṁ ti.
ṭhiyaṁ ca mē cittē tuha dōsapayāsaṇēṇaṁ ti bhaṇiūṇa sāhiō jannadēvakahiyavuttantō.
tō maē cintiyaṁ — hanta kimēyaṁ asaṁbhāvaṇija.
etthantarammi ya āṇi yō rāyapurisē hi bandhē ūṇa jannadēvō, nivēiō rāigō.
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa-arē ēyassa jibbhaṁ chindiūṇa uppāḍēha lōyaṇāī.

taō maē calaṇēsu nivaḍiūṇa vinnattō
rāyā-dēva! mama ēsa avarāhō khamīyaü, muccaü jannadēvō.

rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — satyavāhaputta! na juttamēyaṁ, durāyārō khu ēsō, tā anaṁ
vinnavēhi tti.
maē bhaṇiyaṁ — dēva! alamannēṇaṁ ti, jaï mamōvari bahumāṇō dēvassa, tā imaṁ cēva saṁpāḍēu dēvō.

rāiṇā
bhaṇiyaṁ — alavaṇīyavayaṇō tuma ti, tuma cēva jāṇāsi! tō maē dēvapasāō tti bhaṇiūṇa nivaḍiō(a) calaṇēsu mōyāviō
jamnadēvō, pēsiō ya ahaṁ rāiṇā niyayabhavaṇaṁ taō sammāṇiūṇa mahayā vibhūīē gaō sabhavaṇaṁ ti.

jāō ya lōyavāō, ahō!
jannadēvassa jahannattaṁ.

ahō! asārayā saṁsārassa, vicittayā kamma
pariṇaīē, dullakkhāṇi pāṇicittāṇi.
tā na yāṇāmō kimettha juttaṁ ti.
etthantarammi ya samāgaō tattha mugihiyanāmō aggibhūī nāma gaṇaharō.

diṭṭhō maē bāhiriyāgaēṇaṁ.
jāō ya mē taṁ paï bahumāṇō, paṇamiō ya sō maē, dhammalābhiyō ya tēṇaṁ ubaviṭṭhō tassa pāyamūlē.

taṁ ca suṇamāṇassa samuppannā dēsaviraïpariṇaī pavaṭṭamāṇasaṁvēgassa
jāō bhavavirāgō.

cintiyaṁ ca maē-alaṁ saṁsārapavaḍaṇāmettaphalēṇaṁ imiṇā parikilēsēṇaṁ, pavajjāmō pavvajja ti
etthantarammi ya galiō kammasaṁghāō, payaliyā bandhapaṭṭiī, vihāviyaṁ attapiriēṇaṁ, samuppannā sabaviraïpariṇaï ti.

kahāva
sāṇē ya vinnattō maē bhayavaṁ gurū.
aṇuggihīō ahaṁ bhayavayā, virattaṁ ca mē cittaṁ bhavapaścāō, tā āisaü bhayavaṁ kiṁ maē kāyavvaṁ ti.
taō tēṇa suya(yā)sayanāṇiṇāmama bhāvaṁ viyāgiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — jujjaï bhavaō mahāpurisasēviyaṁ samagattaṇaṁ kāuṁti.

taōmaē tassa samī
vammi cēva pavanaṁ samaṇattaṇaṁ, parivāliyaṁ ca vihiṇā.

tō ahāuyaṁ pāliūṇa kālamāsē kālaṁ kiccā dēhaṁ caïūṇa navasāgarōvamāū
vēmāṇiyattāē uvavannō mhi bambhalōē, iyarō vi ya jannadēvō tisāgarōvamaṭṭhiī sakarappabhāē nāragō ti.

taō ahamahāuyaṁ pāliūṇa
dēvalōgāō cuō samāṇō ihēva vidēhē gandhilāvaī vijaē rayaṇapurē nayarē rayaṇasāgarasta satthavāhassa sirimaīē bhāriyāē kucchisi
puttattāē upavanō ti.

iyarō vi ya taō naragāō uccaṣṭiūṇa āhēḍagamuṇaō bhakkhi mariūṇa tisāgarōvamāū tatthēva uvavajiūṇa
tō ya ucaṭṭō nāṇātiriēmu āhiṇḍiūṇa tatthēva rayaṇapurē tāyagharadāsīē nammayābhihāṇāē suyattāē uvavannōti.

uciyasamayammi
jāyā ya amhē, pattā ya bālabhāvaṁ.
païṭāviyāī nāmāī, majjhaṁ candasārō, iyarassa aṇāhagō tti.
puvvabhakabhāsaō ya na imassa mamōvari vaścaṇāpariṇāmō avēi.

annayā ya āgaōtattha māsa
kappavihārī bhayavaṁ vijayavaddhaṇāyariō.
pavanō ya maē imassa pāyamūlē sāvagadhammō.

annayā ya taṁ puraṁ dīhadaṇḍajattāgaē naravaïmmi,
gāmantaragaēsu amhēsu vijhakēunāmēṇa savarasēṇāvaïṇā hayavihayaṁ kāūṇa avaṇīō kōi lōō.

samāgayā taṁ puraṁ.
diṭṭhaṁ ca masāṇāgāramaṇugarintaṁ, gavēsāviyaṁ māṇusaṁ jāva sabamēva dharaï, navaraṁ candakantā mē bhāriyā avahaḍa tti.

taō samuppannā
araī, jāyā ya cintā-hā! kahaṁ sā tavassiṇō mamādiviōgā pāṇē dhārissaï ti.

etthantarammi ya bhaṇiō dēvasammābhihā
ṇēṇaṁ vuḍḍamāhaṇēṇaṁ-satthavāhaputta! mā saṁtappa.

puṇō vi ēyammi cē disaē siritthalābhihāṇāō sanivēsāō ēvaṁ cēva savarēhi
avaṇīō jaṇō āsi.
sō niravasēsō akhaṇḍiyacarittasabassō mahayā daviṇajāēṇa mukkō tti.

taō ahaṁ ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa
aïkantēsu kaïvayadiṇēsu sabhūmimuvagaēsu sabarēsu aṇahagaduiō ghētūṇa savvasāraṁ daviṇajāyaṁ susaṇiddhasaṁbhiyaṁ ca pāhēyaṁ payaṭṭō
candakantāvimokkhaṇanimittaṁ ti.

iyō ya tīē mama viōgavihurāē cārittakhaṇḍaṇāsaṅkiṇīē ya karhici suṇgagāmāsannakūvayaḍāvāsiyāē sabaravāhiṇīē nisācara
masamayammi, pavattē ya payāṇagakōlāhalē pērantarakkhaṇāvāvaḍēsu savarasaṁghāēsu jīviyaniravekkhāē tammi cēva jiṇṇakūvammi pavāhiō
appā.
paḍiyā ya jalamajjhē, na mayā ya jalappabhāvēgaṁ.

kicchapāṇā ya
jīviyasēsēṇaṁ cēva jāva pāṇē dhārēi, tāva pattā amhē tamuddēsaṁ.

aṇahagassa vi ya punvabhavanimittaō tayatyasaṁdarisaṇaō ya samuppannō
mamōvari vañcaṇāpariṇāmō.
cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ— kahamēsō vaściyanyō tti.

taō sō aṇēyaviyappasamāuliyahiyō ahaṁ ca muddhasa
hāvō tti ēvaṁ vaccāmō.
pāhē yadaviṇajāyāṇi ya pattēyaṁ hatthagōyarāṇi havanti.
annayā ya mama hatthē pāhēyaṁ tassa daviṇajāyaṁ ti.
ēvamaṇugacchamāṇā pattā tamuddēsaṁ, jattha sā candakantā ciṭṭhaï.

etthantarammi ya atyamiō sahassarassī, luliyā
sajhā.

taō cintiyamaṇahagēṇaṁ-hatthagayaṁ mē daviṇajāyaṁ, vijaṇaṁ ca kantāraṁ, samāsanō ya pāyālagambhīrō kūvō, pavattō ya avarāha
vivarasamacchāyagō andhayārō.

tā ēyammi ēyaṁ pakkhiviūṇa niyattāmō imassa thāṇassa tti cintiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa-satyavāhaputta!
dhaṇiyaṁ pivāsābhibhūō mhi.

tā nihālē hi ēyaṁ jiṇṇakūvaṁ kimettha udagaṁ atthi, natyi tti? taō maē gahiyapāhēyapoṭṭalēṇaṁ
cēva nihāliō kūvī.
etthantarammi ya suvisatthahiyayassa lōyassa viya maccū āgaō mama samīyamaṇahagō.

sahasā pakkhittō tammi
ahamaṇahagēṇa, paḍiō ya udagamajjhē.

parāmuṭṭhā ya
bhayavihalaṅghalā candakantā thīsahāvaō bhayakāyarā.
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tīē namō arihaṁtāṇaṁ ti.
bhaṇiyā ya sā abhayamabhayaṁ jiṇasāsaṇarayāṇaṁ ti.
tīē vi ya pañcabhinnāō mē sahō.

rōviuṁ payattā, samāsāsiyā sā
maē, pucchiyā ya vuttantaṁ.
sāhiō ya tīē, maē vi ya niyagō tti.
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tīē-hā! duṭṭhu kayaṁ aṇahagēṇa.

mara bhaṇiyaṁ
sundari! na du? kayaṁ, paramośyārī khu sō mahāṇubhāvō, jaṁ tumaṁ saṁjōiya tti.
appanihāṇa ya aïkannā rayaṇī, uggaō aṁsumālī.
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tīē— kahamahaṁ tumaē agahiyammi geṇhāmi tti.

taō maē nēhakāyaraṁ sē hiyayaṁ
kaliūṇamakālē cēva gahiyaṁ pāhēyaṁ, bhuttaṁ ca amhēhiṁ.

taō cintiyaṁ maē-kēṇa puṇa uvāēṇa amhē imāō bhavasamudāō viva kūva
sasaṁbhrāntō lagnō pratikūpakaïkadēśē.
parāmr̥ṣṭā ca bhayavihvalāṅgī candrakāntā, strīsvabhāvatō bhayakātarā.

maṇiāṁ ca tayā namō'rhadbhya
gāō u tarissāmō tti.
ēvaṁ ca cintayantāṇaṁ kaïvayadiṇēsu khīṇaṁ pāhēyaṁ, paṇaṭā jīviyāsā.

jāyā ya mē cintā-kahaṁ pāviūṇa
jiṇamayaṁ akāūṇa paca jamakayatthō marissāmi tti.
etthantarammi phuriyaṁ sē vāmalōyaṇēṇaṁ, mamāvi dāhiṇēṇaṁ.

jaṁpiyaṁ ca tīē
ajjaputta! vāmaṁ mē lōyaṇaṁ phuriya'ti.
taō sāhiō sē maē hiyayasaṁkappō iyaracakkhuphuraṇaṁ ca.

sundari!
imēhiṁ nimittavisē sēhiṁ avassa amhāṇaṁ na cirakālāṇusārī ēsa kilēsō, tā na tumaē saṁtappiyavvaṁ ti.

ēvaṁ ca
jāva ahōrattaṁ nivasāmō, tāva samāgaō sabararāyahāṇīō rayaṇapuranivāsiṇō nandivaddhaṇābhihāṇassa satyavāhassa santiō rayaṇapura
gāmī cēva satthō tti.
uyaganimittaṁ ca samāgayā purisā gahiūṇa lambaṇā.

pucchiyāī vuttanta, sāhiō vittharēṇaṁ,vimhiō ēsō,taō patthiyāī rayaṇaüraṁ
jāva aïkkantēsu pañcasu payāṇa ēmu parivahantē satthē rāyapattaṇīō nāidūradēsabhāē diṭṭhō kaṅkālamettasēsō yāmapāsāvaḍiyadaviṇajāō
kēsariṇā dīhanidāvasamuvaṇīō aṇaḍagō tti.

taō taṁ tahāviha vivāgaṁ pecchiūṇa
samuppanō mē vivēgō, khōvasamamuvagayaṁ cārittamōhaṇīyaṁ.

taō ahaṁ tahāvihapa
baḍamāṇapariṇāmō cēva āgō sanayaraṁ.

ahāuyamaṇuvāliūṇa vihiṇā
ya mottūṇa dēī, ukvannō sōlasasāgarōvamāū vēmāṇiyattāē mahāsukkakappammi, iarō vi ya aṇahagō sīhavāvāiyasarīrō satta
sāgarōvamahiī vālugappahāē nāragō tti.

taō ahamahāuyaṁ pāliūṇa dēvalōgāō cuō samāṇō ihēba jambuddīvē dīvē bhārahē
vāsē rahavīraürē nayarē nandivaddhagasta gāhāvaïssa surasundarīē bhāriyāē kucchisi puttattāē uvavannō mhi.

iyarō vi taō
naragāō uvvaṭṭiūṇa vijhagiripacaē agasattaśavāyaṇaparō sīhattāē uvavannō.

taō sīhattāē uvavajiūṇa puṇō vimariūṇa
sattasāgarōvamāū tatthēva uvavanjiya tō ya ucaṭṭō nāṇātiriēmu āhiṇḍiya tasyēva nayarē saümasatyavāhassa nandimaīē bhāriyāē
puttattāē upacannō ti.

païṭāviyāī nāmāī-majjhaṁ aṇaṅgadēvō, iyarassa dhagadēvō
tti.
ābālabhāvō jāyā piī mama sambhāvaō, iyaraspta kaïyavēṇaṁ.

kumārabhāvammi ya pattō maē dēvasēgagurusamī vē sāṇṇubhāsi
ō dhammō.

santē viya puvvapurisajjiē daviṇajāē abhimāṇaō kimaṇēṇa punyapurisajjiēṇaṁ ti dayasaṁgaha
nimittaṁ gayā rayaṇadīvaṁ.
nihattāī rayaṇāī, kayā saṁjuttī, payaṭṭā niyadēsamāgantuṁ.

etthantarammi ya puyakayakammadō sēṇa cintiyaṁ
dhaṇadēvēṇa-kahaṁ puṇō vaściyavvō ēsa agaṅgadēvō.

abābāiō
ēsa na tīraē vaściu ti, tā yāvārami ēyaṁ.
paricintiō ubāō bhōyaṇē sē visaṁ dēmi tti.

annayā ya satthimaīsannivē
samaṇupattāṇaṁ bhothaṇanimittaṁ gaō dhaṇadēvō iṭṭamaggaṁ.
kārāviyaṁ ca tēṇa bhōyaṇaṁ, phakkhittaṁ ca ēgammi laḍḍugē visa.

cintiyaṁ
ca tēṇaṁ — ēyaṁ sē dāhāmi ti.

bhōyaṇavēlāē gahiō tēṇa
visalaḍḍugō, dinō mamaṁ ca iyarō tti.
pabhuttā anhē jāva thēvavēlāē cēva thāriō dhaṇadēvō.

taō kimēyaṁ ti āulīhūō ahaṁbīō bhavō
jāva kiṁkāyabvamūḍhō thēvakālaṁ ciṭṭhāmi, tāpa acnuggayāē visassa vicittayāē kammapariṇāmassa ubaraō dhaṇadēvō.

jāyā mē cintā
hā kēṇa uṇa ēvaṁ vavasiyaṁ ti.

sēsarayaṇa nāyaṁ pi ya jahāṇurūvaṁ kusalapakkhē nijiūga tannivvaēṇa cēṣa tayappabhiimannā
yavisayasaṅgō pavannō dēvasēṇāyariyasamīvē pacanaṁ ni.

parivāliūṇa ahāuyaṁ vihiṇā ya mōnūṇa dēhaṁ pāṇayammi kappē upabannō ēga
ṇavīsasāgarōvamāū dēvō tti, iyarō vi visamaraṇāṇantaraṁ paṅkappabhāē puḍhabīē navasāmavamāū nāragō ti.

ta' ahamahāuyaṁ aṇuvā
liūṇa cuō samāṇō ihēba jambuddīvē dīvē ēravaē khētē hathiṇāurē nayarē harinandissa gāhāvaïssa lacchimaīē bhāriyāē kucchisi
puttattāē uvavannō.

iyarō di tō naragāō uccaṭṭiya uragattaṇaṁ pāviūṇamaṇēgasattavāvāyaṇaparō dāvāṇaladaḍadēhō mariūṇa tīē cēya
paṅkappabhāē puḍhavīē kiṁcūṇadasasāgarōramāū nāragō hōūṇa taō ubaṭṭō, tiriēmu āhiṇḍiya tammi cēva hathigāurē indanāmassa
buḍḍaseṭṭhissa nandimaīē bhāriyāē kucchisi putta tāē ucavannō tti.

païṭāviyāī nāmāī-majjhaṁ dhīradēvō,
iyarassa dōṇagō tti.
pattā ya kumārabhāvaṁ, samappiyā ya lē hāyariyassa.
jāyā ya amhāgaṁ puavaṇiyā cēva piī.
kalāvēṇaṁ maē paḍivannō māṇabhaṅgagurusamī vē jiṇadēsiō dhammō, mamokkhāravaścaṇakusalēṇa davvaō dōṇaēṇāvi.

taō ya mē dhammā
ṇurāēṇa tappabhiī taṁ paï samupamā thirayarā piī.

bhaṇiō ya ēsō— vakaharaha aṇindiēṇa maggēṇa!
taō sō vavahariumāraddhō.

etthantarammi puvakayakammavāsaṇādōsēga jāō sē mamōpari ahiṁgō
vañcagāpariṇāmō.

cintiyaṁ ca tēṇaṁ-ajjiyaṁ pabhūyaṁ daviṇajāya, bhāgiō ya vīradēvō ēyasta, tā kēga uga uvāēṇa vañciyakō
lakṣmīmatyā bhāryāyāḥ kukṣaü putrāyōpapannaḥ.

iārō'pi tatō narakāduvr̥ttya uragatvaṁ prāpyānēkasattvavvāpādanaparō dāvānaladagdhadēhō mr̥tvā
ēsō, na ya muṇaï jahaṭṭiyaṁ ṇē kōi vavahāraṁ.
tā kiṁ abalambāmi? ahavā ēyammi paripanthagē na mē aliyavayaṇaṁ nivvahaï.
taō jamahaṁ :maṇissāmi, taṁ cēva agghissaï tti saṁpahāriūṇa pāraddhō tēṇa samuvayārō.

kārāviō mahantō pāsāō,
ukaribhūmibhāē ya tassa aṇiyamiyakhīlajālō ṇijjūhagō.

vīradēvaṁ pāsāyapavēsanimittaṁ nimantiūṇa daṁsēmi sē
nijjūhagaṁ.
taō sō rammadaṁsaṇīyayāē nijjūhagassa sahasā ārōhaïssaï.

tō ya tanivaḍaṇēṇa nivaḍiō samāṇō na bhavissaï
tti.
ēvaṁ ca kaē samāṇē lōyavāō vi parihariō hōi.

bhututtarakālaṁmi ya ārūḍhā duvē vi amhē
saparivārā pāsāyaṁ.

jāva ya nārōhāmi ahayaṁ, tāva
nivaḍiō.
hāhāravaṁ karēmāṇō samōḍaṇṇō ahayaṁ jāva dihrō pañcattamuvagaō dōṇagō tti.

tō ahaṁ tassa mayakiccaṁ kāūṇa tannivēēṇa cēva paḍivannō māṇabhaṅgagurusamīvē
samaṇaliṅgaṁ.

parivāliūṇa ahāuyaṁ uvavannō hechimōvarimagēvejjaē kiṁcūṇapaṇuvīsasāgarōvamāū dēvō; iyarō vi dōṇī tahāviharudda
jjhāṇōvagaō dhūmappabhāē puḍhavīē duvālasasāgarōvamāū nāragō tti.

tō ahaṁ surāuyamaṇubhujiūṇa cuō samāṇō ihēba jambuddīvē
dīvē ettha cēva vijaē campāvāsē nayarē māṇibhaddassa seṭṭhissa dhāriṇīē bhāriyāē kucchisi puttattāē uvavannō, jāō ya uciyasama
ēṇaṁ.
paḍhamaṁ ca kila maē ghōsamuccārayantēṇa amara tti saṁlattaṁ.

aō duiyaṁ pi mē nāma amaraguttō
tti.
sākkhagihuppattīē ya ā bālabhāvāō vēva papannō maē jiṇadēsiō dhammō.

etthantaraṁmi ya iyarō vi taō naragāō ughaṭṭi
ūṇa sayaṁbhūramaṇē samuddē mahāmacchō bhaviya añcantapāvadiṭṭhī maō samāṇō tīē cēva dhūmappabhāē duvālasasāgarōvamāū cēva nāragō hōūṇa
ucaṭṭō samāṇō nāṇātiriēsu āhiṇḍiya taṁmi cēva nayarē nandāvattassa seṭṭhissa sirinandāē bhāriyāē kucchisi dhūyattāē uvavannō
jāyā ya uciyasamaēṇaṁ.
païṭāviyaṁ ca sē nāma nandayanti tti.
pattā ya jōvaṇaṁ, viigṇā ya majjhaṁ.

samu
ppannō ya mē taṁ paï siṇēhō, tīē vi ya tahēba.
ēvaṁ ca visayasuhamaṇuhavantāṇaṁ gaō kōi kālō.

puvyakayakammadōsēṇa ya sē mamōvari
vaścaṇāpariṇāmō nāvēi, jēṇa samappiyasabagharasārā vi māyāē vavaharaï.
sāhiyaṁ ca mē pariyaṇēṇaṁ, na uga pattiyāmi tti.
taṁ puṇa sayaṁ cēva avahariūṇa samāulībhūyā.

aïkantēsu kaïvayadi
ṇēsu abbhaṅgagavēlāē samappiyaṁ sē nāmaṅkiyamuddārayaṇaṁ, saṁgōviyaṁ ca tīē niyayābharaṇakaraṇḍaē.

vattē ya ṇhāṇabhōyaṇasamaē kāūṇama
garāyaṁ parigeṇhiūṇa tambōlaṁ asaṁjāyāsaṁkēṇa cēva taō karaṇḍa gāō saī cēva gahiyaṁ maē muddārayaṇaṁ.

diṭṭhaṁ ca puvvanaṭṭhaṁ savvasāraṁ kuṇḍa
lajuyalaṁ.
jāyā ya mē cintā kimayaṁ puṇō laddhaṁ ti.

diṭṭhaṁ ca tīē majjha hatthaṁmi
muddārayaṇaṁ.

cintiyaṁ ca tīē-dilu imēṇa kuṇḍalajuyalaṁ
tā kimettha kāyavvaṁ.
jāyaṁ mē lahuttaṁ, paṇaṭṭhō ēsō vi.
tā jāva sayaṇavaggē vi mē lāghavaṁ na uppajjaï, tāva vāvāēmi ēyaṁ ti.

ēsō
ya ettha uvāō, sajjaghāyaṇaṁ sē kammaṇajōgaṁ paüñjāmi.
kō tīē kēvalāē cēva aṇēyamaraṇāvahadavvasaṁjōēṇaṁ jōgō.

saṁṭhavantī ya tamē
gadēsē ḍakā bhuyaṅgamēṇaṁ.

diṭṭhā ya kasiṇamaṇḍalavisavāviyasarīrā
jīviyametta mēsā nandayantī.
taṁ ca tahāvihaṁ daṭṭaṇa samuppannā mē cintā.

bāhajala
bhariyalōyaṇēṇaṁ ca sagaggayakkharaṁ bhaṇiyā maē.
sundari, kiṁ tē bāhaï? jāva na jaṁpaï tti.

taō visaṇṇō ahaṁ, paṇaṭṭhā jīvi
yāsā.
tahāvi gāruḍiyā ettha pabhāṇaṁ, acintā mantasatti tti sadāviyā gāruḍiyā.
satthavāhaputta, kāladaṭṭhā khu ēsā na gōyarā mantastra.
tā na kuppiyavvaṁ tumaē tti bhagiūga niggayā gāruḍiyā.

tō
akkandaṇavilavaṇavāvaḍassa mē pariyaṇassa vimukkā jīviēṇaṁ, kayaṁ sē uddhadēhiyaṁ.

tō ahaṁ tannivvēēṇaṁ cēva pavaḍḍamāṇasaṁvēgō
dhiratthu jīvalōyassa ti paricintiūṇa ya asārayaṁ caïūṇa kilēsāyāsakāriṇaṁ saṅgaṁ pavanō pavvajja ti.

sā uṇa tavassiṇī
tahā mariūṇa samuppannā tamappahābhihāṇāē narayapuḍhavīē.

ēyaṁ mē cariyaṁ ti ēyaṁ ca sōūṇa
saṁjāō rāyanāyarāṇaṁ nivēō.
bhayavaṁ, kō uṇa tīē avaō ya pariṇāmō bhavissaï? bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ.
tīsē aṇantasaṁsārāvasāṇē muttī, mama uṇa ihēba jammē tti.

lg.l: taō ahamēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa tassa cēva bhayavaō samīvē aṇēyanāyarajaṇaparigaō pavanō pavvajja

p.s:
aha kaïgaïsamāvannarūbō uṇa ēsa saṁsārō, kiṁvisiṭṭāṇi vā iha sārīramāṇasā
ṇi suhadukkhāṇi aṇuhavanti pāṇiṇō, kō vā estha saṁsāracāragavimōyaṇasamatthō bhayava! dhammōti? dhammaghōsēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — vaccha!
suṇa, jaṁ taē pucchiyaṁ—

muhadukkha
cintāē puṇa, kuō saṁsārasamāvannāṇaṁ jāijarāmaraṇapīḍiyāṇaṁ rāgāidōsagahiyāṇaṁ visayavisāvahiyacēyaṇāṇaṁ ca sattāṇaṁ suhaṁ ti?
na kiṁci suhaṁ, bahuṁ ca dukkhaṁ.

lg.l: jaha nāma kōi purisō dhaṇiyaṁ dālidukkhasaṁtattō
thēvēdiya hēhi navaraṁ kahaṁci panthāu pabbhaṭṭhō

p.s:
tīē ya taṇhā
chuhābhibhūpaṇa dariyavaṇaduṭṭhasāvayaravāyaṇṇaṇuttatthalōyaṇēṇaṁ dīhapahaparissamuppannasēyajaladhōyagattēṇaṁ mūhadisācakaṁ visamapahakhalantapayasaṁ
cāraṁ paribhamantēṇa tēṇa diṭṭhō ya palayaghaṇavandrasannihō nidraviyāṇēyapahiya jaṇabaḍiucchāhō gaddavbhagajjiyaravāvūriyaviyaḍaraṇṇudēsō
maggaō turiyaturiyaṁ dhāvamāṇō uddhīkaüddaṇḍasuṇḍō vaṇahatthi tti.

taha ya nisiyakaravālavāvaḍaggahatthā vigarālavayaṇakāyā bhīmaṭṭa
hāsasaṁjuttā asiyavasaṇā puraō mahādudarakkhasi tti.

taō ya tē daṭṭaṇa maccubhayavēviraṅgō avalōiyasayaladisāmaṇḍalō puvadisāē
udayagirisiharasannihaṁ niruddhasiddhagandhavvamihuṇagaïyaṇapayāramaggaṁ mahantaṁ naggōhapāyavaṁ avalōiūga paricintiuṁ payattō.

lg.l: taṁ pecchiuṁ visaṇṇō naggōhaṁ gayaṇagōyarāṇaṁ pi
ettō iō niyantō pecchaï kūrva taṇochannaṁ
uttuṅgabhittijāō sarathambhō tambhi tattha ya bilaggō
caüsu vi taḍīsu dariē visalavasaṁvaliyanayaṇasihi jālē
jāvēsō sarathambhō tāva mahaṁ jīviyaṁ ti cintantō
dhavalakasiṇē ya turiyaṁ duvē tahiṁ mūsaē mahākāē
tāva vaṇavāraṇēṇa ya vijjhāiṁ naraṁ apāvamāṇēṇaṁ
sīsammi nivaḍiyā kaha vi navaraṁ jōēṇa mahubindū
ōyaliūṇa ya vayaṇaṁ kahavi paviṭṭhā u uttimaṅgāō
jō purisō sō jīvō caügaïbhamaṇaṁ ca raṇṇapariyaḍaṇaṁ
vaṇavāraṇō ya maccū nisāyariṁ jāṇa taha ya jaraṁ
āruhiuṁ visayāuranarēhi na ya sakaṇijjō ti
maṇuyattaṁ puṇa kūbō bhuyaṅgamā taha ya honti u kasāyā
khaïō jēhiṁ maṇussō kajākajāhaṁ na muṇēi
jō vi ya puṇa sarathambhō sō jīyaṁ jēṇa jīvaï jīvō
jāō ya mahuyarīō ḍasanti taṁ tē u vāhiṇō vivihā
abhibhūō jēhi narō khaṇaṁ pi sokkhaṁ na pāvēi
ghōrō ya ayagarō jō sō naraō visayamōhiyamaṇō tti
paḍiō u jammi jīvō dukkhasahassāī pāvēi
iya vasaṇasaṁkaḍagaō vibuhō kaha mahaï bhottuṁ jē?
'tō bhē bhaṇāmi sāvaya! visayasuhaṁ dāruṇaṁ muṇēūṇa
cavalataḍivilasiyaṁ piva maṇuyattaṁ bhaṅguraṁ taha ya
suyaṇasamāgamasōvakhaṁ cavalaṁ jovvaṇaṁ pi ya asāraṁ
sokkhanihāṇammi syā dhammammi maī daḍhaṁ kuṇam

p.s: sīhakumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — bhaya! kērisō dhammō tti? bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — suṇa, khamāigō.

bhaṇiyaṁ ca
khantī ya manajjavamottī tavasaṁjamē ya boddhavvē.
saccaṁ sōya ākiṁcaṇaṁ ca bammaṁ ca jaïdhammō.
tattha khantī nāma sammannāṇapudhagaṁ vatthusahāvālōyaṇēṇa kōhassa aṇudayō, udayapattassa vā viphalīkaraṇaṁ.

ēvaṁ madavayā vi
māṇassa aśudaō, udayapattaspa vā viphalīkaraṇaṁ.
ēvamajjavayā vi māyāē aṇudayō, udayapattāē vā viphalīkaraṇaṁ.

ēvaṁ muttī vi
lōhassa aṇudayō, udayapattassa vā viphalīkaraṇaṁ ti.

lg.l: kāyakilēsō saṁlīṇayā ya bajjhō tabō hōi
jhāṇaṁ ussaggō vi ya anbhintaraō tavō hōi

p.s: ēyaṁ ca sōūṇa āvibbhūyasammattapariṇāmēṇa bhāvaō pavannasāvayadhammēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ sīhakumārēṇaṁ-bhagavaṁ! sōhaṇō jaïdhammō.
ēyaṁ kāumasamatthēṇa tāva kiṁ kāyav ti? dhammaghōsēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — sāvayattaṇaṁ.kērisaṁ tayaṁ ti? kahiyaṁ sammattamāiyaṁ.
taō appāṇaṁ kayakiccaṁ mannamāṇō kaṁci vēlaṁ pajjuvāsiūṇa dhammaghōsaṁ bandiūṇa ya saviṇayaṁ paviṭṭhō nayaraṁ.
pavannā ya ēsā vikahaṁci kammakkhaōvasamaō sāvayadhammaṁ.

annayā ya purisadattōrāyā amiyatēyagurusamīvē sōūṇa dhamma ahisiściūṇa rajjē sīha
kumāra saṁjāyasaṁvēgō saha mahādēvīē sirikantāē parannō muttimaggaṁ.

sīhakumārō vi dhammādhammavavatthaparipālaṇaraō sayalajaṇamaṇāṇa
ndayārī aṇurattasāmantamaṇḍalō dīṇāṇāhakiviṇajaṇośyārasaṁpāyaṇaraī jahōiyaguṇajuttō rāyarisī samuvajāō tti.

ēvaṁ ca añcantā
ṇurattaṁ ca piyapaṇaïṇi piva mēiṇi muṁjantassa aïkantō kōi kālō.

etthantarammi sō aggisammatāvasadēvō taō vijjukumārakāyāō
caviūṇaṁ saṁsāramāhiṇḍiya aṇantarabhavē ya kiṁpi bālatavavihāṇaṁ kāūṇa mottūṇa taṁ dēhaṁ puncakammavāsaṇāvivāgadōsēṇa samuppanō kusu
māvalīē kucchisi.

jahā-paviṭhṭhō mē uyaraṁ bhuyaṅgamō, tēṇaṁ ca niggacchiūṇa ḍakkō rāyā nivaḍiō siṅghā
saṇāō.
taṁ ca daṭṭaṇa sasajjhasā viya viuddhā kumumāvalī.
amaṅgalaṁ ti kaliūṇa na sāhiō tīē daïyassa.

pavaḍamāṇagabbhā ya
taddōsaō cēva na bahu mannaē naravaī.
bhaṇiyā ya pariyaṇēṇaṁ sāmiṇi! na juttamēyaṁ ti.

tīē
bhaṇiyaṁ — kim ahaṁ karēmi? sāhiyaṁ pariyaṇēṇaṁ — jahā dēvaṁ na bahu mannasi tti.
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ — nūrṇa ēsa gambhadōsō bhavissaï.

annahā
kahamahaṁ ajjaüttaṁ na bahu mannēmi.
annayā samuppannō sē dōhalō, jahā-imassa cēva rāiṇō antāṇi khāija tti.

cintiyaṁ ca tīē
pāvayārī mē ēsa gambhō, tā alaṁ imiṇā.
itthīsahāvaō ya bhattāranēhaō ya samuppannō sē vavasāō, jahā pāḍēmi ēyaṁ ti.

tō
ālōciūṇa pahāṇapariyaṇaṁ kajjagaruyayāē ya aṇunnāyā tēṇa gamaparisāḍaṇaṁ kāumāraddhā.
na ya sō nikāiyakammadōsēṇa paḍaï tti.
taō sā aṇēgōsahapāṇēṇaṁ ḍōhalayāsaṁpattīē ya paridubalā jāyā.

pucchiyā ya rāiṇā-sundari! ki tē na saṁpajjaï, kēṇa vā tē
khaṇḍiyā āṇā, kiṁ vā maē paḍikūlamāsēviyaṁ, jē nivvē ēṇa tuma appōyagā viva kumuiṇī ēvaṁ jhijasi tti? taō paḍihiyayaladdha
nēhaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ kusumāvalīē-ajjaütta! īdisō mē nivēō, jēṇa cintēmi attāṇayaṁ vāvāēmi tti.

rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — sundari! kiṁni
mittotti? kusumāvalīē bhaṇiyaṁ — ajjaütta! bhāgadhēyāṇi mē pucchasu tti bhagiūṇa bāhajalabhariyalōyaṇā sagaggayā saṁvuttā.

taō
rāiṇā mahantō sē nivēō, tā alaṁ tāva imiṇā kahāē cēva, ahaṁ ēyaṁ akkhivāmi ti cintiūṇa akkhitā kahā, kaō annō
pasaṅgō.
puṇō ya sē samāhūō mayaṇalēhāpamuḍō pariyaṇō, sabahumāṇaṁ ca bhaṇi bhō rāiṇā.

kiṁ juttaṁ tumhāṇaṁ suṇiyanibandhaṇāṇaṁ pi
ēvaṁ kasiṇapakkhacandalēhaṁ va parikhijamāṇiṁ dēviṁ uvekkhiuṁ ti.

na ya asajjhavatthuvisaō ēsa nivvēō, aō jīvalōvasārabhūyā
mē dēvī.
kiṁ ca taṁ vatthu, jaṁ mē pāṇēsu dharantēsu cēva dēvīē na saṁpajjaï tti.

mayaṇalēhāē bhaṇiyaṁ — mahārāya! ēvamēya; navaramitthīya
ṇasulahō avivēgō cēva kēvalaṁ ettha avarajjhaï.

mahārāya! ēyamiyāṇi pi kahiuṁ pārīyaï, tahā vi na
annō uvāō tti kāūṇa kahīyaï.

rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — aṇurūvamēyaṁ saṁbhamassa; jaṁ uvāyasajhaṁ taṁ sayamēva kīraha, iyaraṁ nivēiyaï tti,
tā kahēu bhōī, kō ettha paramatthō tti? taō mayaṇalēhāē sasajjhasāē viya ācikkhiō gambhasaṁbhavāō dōhalayadōsēṇa gabbha
sāḍaṇāvasāṇō vavahārō ti.
rāiṇā cintiyaṁ-ahō! sē dēvīē mamōvari asāhāraṇī nēhō, jēṇāvaccajammaṁ pi na bahu mannaï tti.
asaṁpāyaṇēṇaṁ ca dōhalayassa mā gambhavivattī sē bhavissaï tti uvāyaṁ cintēmi.

visajjiō ya tēṇa jamahaṁ kālōciyaṁ bhaṇissāmi, taṁ
tahā kāyavvaṁ ti bhaṇiūṇa dēvīpariyaṇō.

cintiyaṁ ca tēṇaṁ, juttaṁ
dēvīē vavasiya.
ahavā mā sē imiṇā uvāēṇa tīsē vi dēhapīḍā bhavissaï.

tā ēsa tāva ettha uvāō-bubhukkhiyassa rāiṇō kā
rimā antā poṭṭavāhiṁ dāūṇa nettapaṭṭāiṇā susiliṭṭhā ya kariya pecchamāṇīē cēva dēvīē kaḍḍiūṇa dijanti.

pacchā ya pamyāē cēva
gabbhamantarēṇa cintissāmō ti cintiūṇa nivēiō naravaïssa niyayāhippāō.

bhaṇiyā ya maïsāyarēṇa
dēvī-sāmiṇi! tahā kaḍḍēmi dēvassa antē, jahā aïsō na vivajaï ti.

bhaṇiyā ya mantiṇā-sāmiṇi! paḍhamapasyāē
na tāva dēvassa nivēyaṇīō gabbhajammō, avi ya mamaṁ ti; pacchā jahōciyaṁ karissāmi tti.

annayā uciyasamaē
pariṇayappāē diyahē pasūyā dēvī.

bhaṇiyā ya tēṇa-sāmiṇi! akusalō viya dēvassa ēsa gambhō lakkhī
yaï.
tā alaṁ imiṇā, annattha saṁvaḍaü, maō dēvassa nivēiyaï tti.

mamaṁ ciya hiyaēṇa mantiyaṁ amaccēṇaṁ
ti.

etthantarammi diṭṭhā rāiṇā, pucchiyā ya ki
m ēyaṁ ti? taō sasajjhasāē vēvamāṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ māhaviyāē dēva! na kiṁci tti.

taō dārayaṁ dadrūṇa
kuviēṇēva bhaṇiyaṁ rāiṇā-ā pāvē! kimēyaṁ vavasiyaṁ ti? taō thīsahāvakāyarayāē sāhiō sayalavuttantō māhaviyāē.
cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ, na ēsa ēyāṇa hatthē puṇō bhavissaï tti.
jaï kahavi dārayassa pamāō bhavissaï, tā viṇaṭṭhā mama hatthāō tubbhē.

nibbhacchiyā dēvī maïsāyarō ya kārāviyaṁ ca dēvīmanti
cittāṇurōhiṇā īsi pacchannabhūyaṁ tahāvihaṁ vaddhāvaṇayaṁ.
anayā pacantavāsī āḍaviō dummaī nāma sāmantarāyā duggabhūmibalagaviō vitthakō sī harāyassa.
nivēiē ya kuviō rāyā, payaṭṭō sayamēva amarisēṇaṁ.

etthantarammi sindhunaīpuliṇē parivahantē payāṇaē karivarōvariṭṭiēṇaṁ jalāō nāidūrammi ahō kaṭṭhaṁ ti jaṁpiraṁ dilu
maṇuyavandraṁ.

gaō taṁ cēva bhūmibhāgaṁ rāyā jāva diṭṭhō tēṇa mahākāō aïkasiṇadēhacchavī viṇintanayaṇavisajālābhāsurō gahiyarasanta
maṇḍukkagāsō bhayāṇayaviyariyāṇaṇaduppechō duyayarapavelliraṅgō mahayā kurarēṇa gasijjamāṇō juṇṇabhuyaṅgamō, kurarō vi diggayakarōrukāraṇa
rattacchabībhaccha ēṇaṁ ayagarēṇa.

jahā jahā ya ayagarō kuraraṁ gasaï, tahā tahā sō vi juṇṇabhuyaṅgamaṁ, juṇṇabhuyaṅgamō vi ya rasantamaṇḍukkayaṁ
ti.
taṁ cēva ēvaṁ vihaṁ jīvalōyasahāvavinbhamaṁ mūḍhahiyayāṇandakārayaṁ sappurisanivvēyahēuṁ vaïyaramavalōiūṇa visaṇṇō rāyā.

cintiyaṁ ca
ṇēṇaṁ, hanta! ēvaṁ vavatthiē kō uṇa iha uvāō? gasiyappāō kurarō ayagarēṇē, kurarēṇa vi bhuyaṅgamō, bhuyaṅgamēṇa maṇḍukkō tti kaṇṭhagaya
pāṇā vi ētē na annonnaṁ viramanti, avi ya ahiyayaraṁ pavattanti, na ya annayaraviṇāsaṇāē mōyāviyā ēē saṁpayaṁ jīvanti.

tā
kiṁ imiṇā apaḍiyāragōyarēṇa vatthuṇā pulōipaṇaṁ.

tajjāviō mattavāraṇō, gaō āvāsaṇiyābhūmi, ārāsiō saha kaḍaēṇaṁ, kayaṁ
uciyakaraṇijjaṁ.

lg.l: ēyāṇamēsa lōō karaṇa mōnaṇa sāsayaṁ dhammaṁ
sēvēi jīviyatthī visaṁ va pāvaṁ suhābhiraō
dukkhaṁ pāvassa phalaṁ nāsaō pāvassa dukkhiō niccaṁ
muhiō vi kuṇaü dhammaṁ dhammassa phalaṁ viyāṇantō
maṇḍukkō iva lōō tucchō iyarēṇa pannaēṇaṁ va
ettha gasijaï sō vi hu kurarasamāṇēṇa annēṇa
sō vi hu na ettha sabasō jamhā ayagarakayantavasagō ti

p.s: tā alaṁ yē aṇēyadukkhataruvīyabhūēṇa ahōpurisigāvikārapāraṇaṁ rajjēṇaṁ ti.

rajjaṁ hi nāma pāyālaṁ piva duppūraṁ, jiṇṇabhavaṇaṁ
piva sulahavivaraṁ, khalasaṁgayaṁ pica virasāvasāṇaṁ, vēsitthiyāhiyayaṁ piva atthavallahaṁ, vammīyaṁ pitra bahumuyaṅga, jīvalōyaṁ piva a
ṇiṭṭhiyakajja, sappakaraṇḍayaṁ piva jattaparivālaṇijja aṇabhinnaṁ visambhasuhāṇaṁ, vēsājōvaṇaṁ piva bahujaṇābhilasaṇīyaṁ, akāraṇaṁ ca
suddhaparalōyamaggassa tti.
tā ēvaṁ pariccaïya payajāmō dhīrapurisasēviyaṁ ubhayalōyasuhāvahaṁ samaṇattaṇaṁ ti.

aha kahaṁ puṇa patthuya
vavisaē lāghavaṁ na bharissaï? ahavā thēvamēyaṁ ēgajammapaḍibaddhaṁ ti.

ēvaṁ cintayantassa aïkkantā rayaṇī, kayaṁ gōsakiccaṁ,
païṭṭhaṁ mantimaṇḍalaṁ.

etthantarammi nivēiyaṁ sē vijayavaïnāmāē paḍihārīē-mahārāya! ēsō khu dummaī dēvaṁ sayamēva patthiyaṁ viyāṇiya caṇḍaṁ ca
dēvasāsaṇamakgacchiya sirōharāvaddhaparasū dēvasāsaṇāikkamaṇajāyapacchāyāvō kaïvayapurisaparivāriō ihēvāgaō dēvadaṁsaṇasuhābhilāsī
paḍihārabhūmīē ciṭṭhaï.

bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa ījiyāgārakusalēṇa-pavisaü,
kō etya dōsō? saraṇāgayavacchalā cēva rāiṇō havanti.

taō rāiṇā aṇunāō paviṭṭhō dummaī dēva ēsā sirōharā ēsō ya kuhāḍō
tti bhaṇiūṇa paḍiō calaṇēsu.
taō abhayaṁ dāūṇa bahu māṇiō rāiṇā, kaō sē ahiyayarasakārō.

tēṇa vi ya kiccam ēvēyam iha vaṁsasaṁbhavāṇaṁ rāyāṇaṁ sēsayāṇaṁ pi, kiṁ puṇa
tumhāṇaṁ jiṇavayaṇa bhāviyamaīṇaṁ ti, ubhayalōyasāhāraṇaṁ ca saphalaṁ jīviyaṁ dēvassa, vaṇadavasanihā ya kāmabhōgā indhaṇāō cēva jala
nti kiṁpāgaphalasamāṇā ya vivāgē, ayaṇḍamaṇōrahabhaṅgakārī ya pahavaï viṇijjiyamurāsurō maccu tti kaliūṇa bahu maniō.

tō
sadāviyā saṁvacchariyā, bhaṇiyā ya tēṇa-nirūvēha āṇandakumārassa rajjābhisēyadivasaṁ.

taṁ jahā-macchajuyalaṁ puṇṇa kalasō dhavala kusumāī mahāpaümā siddha
tyayā puḍhavipiṇḍō vasahō mahantayaṁ dahiyapuṇṇaṁ ca bhaṇḍayaṁ mahārayaṇāī gōrōyaṇā sīhacammaṁ dhavalāyavattaṁ bhadāsaṇaṁ cāmarāō duruyā
acchasurā mahādhaō gayamaō dhannāī dugullāṇi annāṇi ya ēvamāiyāī pasatthadavvāī ti.

etthantarammi paricintiyaṁ rāiṇā-kāūṇa
māṇandakumārassa rajāhisēyaṁ taō gamislāmi dhammaghōsagurusamī ti.
ēvaṁ ca cintayantō ahisēyadiṇaṁ paḍicchamāṇō ciṭṭhaï.
iō ya puvyakayakammadōsaō amuṇiyanarindāhippāō ghaḍiō dummaïṇā saha āṇandakumārō.

mantiyaṁ ca tēhiṁ kahaṁci vaścaṇā
paōēṇa vāvāēmō mahārāyaṁ ti.
micchāhinivēsēṇa sacittaduṭṭayāē ya viparīō pariṇaō āṇandassa.
cintiyaṁ ca tēṇaṁ-nūṇamahamaṇēga imiṇā vayaē sēṇa māriuṁ vavasiō.

ahavā saccaē vi ēyammi vuttantē
alaṁ mē rajjēṇa, jaṁ mē ēēṇa dinnaṁ saṁpajjaï.
taṁ puṇa salāhaṇijja, jamēyaṁ vāvāiūṇa balā gheppaï ti.
jāva necchaï āgantuṁ, tō paḍihāraduiō gaō kumārabhavaṇaṁ rāyā.

tēṇa vi ya na iō sundaratarō patthāvō ti kaliūṇa
puvāṇusayadōsēṇa sahasā haṇa haṇa tti bhaṇiūga ukkhāyāsiṇā akayaparirakkhaṇōvāō muvisatthacittō paḍihāraṁ vāvāiūṇa gāḍhappa
hārīkaōrāyā.

etthantarammi samuṭṭhāiō kalayalō, saṁjāō nayarasēnasaṁkhōhō, pariveḍhiō samantaō rāyasāhaṇēṇa āṇandō, pāraddhō
saṁgāmō.

kiṁ bhē iyāṇi jujjhiēṇaṁ? ahaṁ tāva vāvāiō cetra
davvō, mā ēyaṁ pi vāvāēha, tā karēha rāyābhisēyaṁ ēyassa, ēsa bhē rāya tti.

etthantarammi samāṇanō dummaī bandhēhi ṇa nibiḍa
bandhēhi.taō jaṁ kumārō āṇavēi tti bhaṇiūṇa āsannībhūō ya sē dummaī.
taō bandhāviūṇa pañcaïyapurisēhiṁ sukayaparirakkhaṇōvāō kō rāyā.

taṁ ca añcantanimmahamāṇapurīsakalamalagandhaṁ phuḍiyabhittipamuttasirīsivaṁ bhiṇi
bhiṇāyamāṇamasayamakkhiyājālaṁ darivivaramuhaviṇiggayamūsaükkaraṁ uparivilambamāṇōrayanimmōyaṁ lūyātantuviraïyaviyāṇayaṁ, vāsaharaṁ piva
dussamāē, līlābhūmi piva adhammassa sahōyaraṁ pitra sīmantayamsa, saṁhā viya sambadukkhasamudayāṇaṁ, kulaharaṁ pira savvajāyaṇāṇaṁ, vi
ssāsabhūmi piva maccuṇō, siddhikhettaṁ piba kayantassa tti.

taō mahācārayaṁ nīō dēvō tti sōūṇa sahasā vimukkakandabhēravaṁ
aṇavarayanivaḍamāṇēhi mahallamuttāhalasarisēhiṁ aphajalabāhabinduhiṁ saṁpāiyahārasōhaṁ dēvasōēṇaṁ cēva parimilāṇadēhaṁ nirujjhamāṇaṁ pi
niuttapurisēhiṁ maṅgalamaṇivalayajhaṇajhaṇāravuddāmaṁ sabhūyāhiṁ balāō pelliūṇa tē urapoṭṭakuṭṭaṇujjayaṁ taō ya aṇuiyadharaṇiparisakkaṇēṇaṁ
sāsasamājariyāṇaṇaṁ paricattakuḍilabhāvattaṇēṇa vi ya adaṁsaṇīyā dēvāvastha tisūyagēhiṁ piva lambālaēhiṁ niruddhanayaṇapasaraṁ cārayamēva
pattaṁ kusumāvalīpamuhamantēuraṁ ti.

taō asōyapallavāgārēhiṁ hatthēhiṁ aṇuci
yāsēvaṇabahulō saṁsārō tti daṁsayantaṁ piva hāralayāvahaṇajaṇiyakhēyaṁ pitra vacchatthalaṁ tāḍayantaṁ ahiyayaramakkandiuṁ pabattaṁ ti.

taō
rāiṇā ārakkhigēhiṁ ca kahakahavi nivāriyaṁ.
bhaṇiyaṁ ca rāiṇā-kimaṇēṇāyāsamettaphalēṇa ahammāṇubandhiṇā ya sōēṇaṁ.

aïbahuvi
cittarūvō khu ēsa saṁsārō, khēlaṇayabhūyā imassa savvē sarīriṇō, dunnivārō ya pasarō puvakayakammassa, jalaharantaraviṇiggayasōyāma
ṇīvalayacañcalā lacchī, suviṇayasamō saṁgamō.

tā kimēiṇā avivēyajaṇāṇusarisēṇa pala
viēṇa? pattamēva tubbhēhi jīvalōyasārabhūyaṁ jiṇavayaṇaṁ.
na taṁ mottūṇa annō dukkhakkhaōvāō tti.

taō
tamēyamāyaṇṇiya ēvamēvēyaṁ na annaha ti kaliūṇa ya aṇujāṇāviūṇa naravaī jīviyaniravekkhayāē balā cēvāṇandassa gandhavvadattāē
vijjāharasamaṇiyāē sayāsē pavanna pacanaṁ ti.
iō ya païdiṇaṁ kayatthaṇāē vi kōhavasabhagacchamāṇēṇa ēdahamettaṁ mē jīviyaṁ kālōiyaṁ saṁpayamaṇasaṇaṁ ti paḍivanna rāiṇā.

āra
kkhigēhiṁ nivēiyaṁ āṇandassa, kuviō ēsō, pēsiō tēṇa dēvasammō nāma niyamahallaō gaccha bhuñjāvēhi tti.

vattavvō ya ēsō abhu
ñjamāṇaṁ niyamā vāvāēmi tti.
gaō dēvasammō, diṭṭhō tēṇa rāyā, bhaṇiō ya-dēva! devvavasayāṇaṁ pāṇiṇaṁ visamā kajagaï tti.

ēsō
ya dēvō nāma aṇārāhaṇīō viṇaēṇa, aguṇagāhī guṇīṇaṁ, akālannū samīhiyassa, kēvalamaṇatyō jaṇāṇaṁ, mattahatthi vva sacchandayārī,
gaṅgāpavāhō va ujjukuḍilō mahāhavō vva nivāyadakkhō, visagaṇṭhi va nāṇukūlō rasāṇaṁ, paḍikūlō ya samīhiyāṇaṁ aṇukūlō asamī
hiyassa.
tā jaï vi ēsa ēvaṁbhūō tahāvi purisēṇa khaṇamavi na purisayārō mottavvō tti.

jēṇa mahārāya! pucōvajjiyāṇaṁ kammāṇaṁ
cēva ēvaṁ nāmaṁ devyō, taṁ ca purisayārajēyamēva vaṭṭaï ti.
tā āvalambēu dēvō purisayāraṁ, karēu āhāragahaṇaṁ.

jīvamāṇō hi purisō
laḍiūṇāvayaṁ avassaṁ dēva! saṁpayaṁ pāvēitti.
na mukō maē cēva ahākālāṇurūvō purisayārō.

aō na āhāra
gahaṇaṁ karēmi tti.
tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — akīramāṇammi āharagahaṇē suō tē kuppissaï.

rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — akāraṇō sē kōvō, saccapaïnnā
khu tavassiṇō havanti.
tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — dēva! viiyavuttantō cēva tuma kumāracariyassa; tā mā tē pamāyaṁ karissaï.

etthantarammi
cirāyaï dēvasammotti saṁjāyāmarisavēgō ghettūṇa khaggaṁ āgaō āṇandō.

bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa-jaï na āhāragahaṇaṁ karēsi, tā imiṇā
kayantajīhāṇugāriṇā karavālēṇa sīsaṁ tē chindāmi.

lg.l: kō udhiēja nara vara! maraṇassa avassa mantavvē
aṇusamayaṁ maramāṇaṁ jiyaï tti jaṇō kahaṁ bhaṇaï 1
jaï tattha kōi puraō vacaï bhayakāraṇaṁ kimiha 1
jīyamaṇiñcamavassaṁ maraṇaṁ ti maṇammi nicchayaṁ jassa
na gaṇēi pañcavāyaṁ na ya paḍiyāraṁ cirāṇuvati vā
sacchandasuhaṁ viharaï hari va maccū mayakulēsu
ēka cciya niviṇṇā puṇō puṇō jāiuṁ ca mariuṁ ca
maraṇaṁ magganti maṇōrahē hi dhīrā dhiisahāyā
jassa mayassēgayarō saggō mokkhō va hōi niyamēṇa
maraṇaṁ pi tassa naravara! ūsavabhūyaṁ maṇūsassa
kattha gaō vā muccaï kayanta kaṇhāhipōyassa
na vi juddhaṁ na palāyaṁ kayantahathimmi agghaï bhayaṁ vā
na ya sē dīsaï hatthō geṇhaï ya dadaṁ amokkhō ya
jaha vā luṇāi sāsāi kāsaō pariṇayāi kālēṇa
iya bhūyāī kayantō luṇāi jāyāiṁ jāyāī
jaï tāva maccupāsā sacchandamuhaṁ surēsa viyaranti
maccussa sō pamāō jaṁ jiyaï narō nimēsaṁ pi.
tā mā adhīrajaṇa sēviyassa ayasasta dēhi u(a)vayāsaṁ
na hu maccudāḍhalīḍhaṁ indō vi pahū niyattēuṁ.
iya mayamāraṇamettēṇa vaccha! mā niyakulaṁ kalaṅkēhi
geṇhāmi kahaṁ cattaṁ hanta! savāyāē āhāraṁ?
japaï ajjāvi kaha pahaō sīsammi khaggēṇaṁ
paricintiyaṁ ca tēṇaṁ namō jiṇāṇaṁ ti muṇiyatattēṇaṁ
avarāhēsu guṇēsu ya nimittamettaṁ parō hōi
ēvaṁ ca cintayantō puṇō vi hantūṇa pāvakammēṇaṁ
mariūṇa ya uvavannō saṇaṁkumārammi mukharō juimaṁ
iyarō vi ya kāūṇaṁ rajjaṁ mariūga rayaṇapuḍhavīē

div.trailer:
yākinīmahattarāsū nu-paramaguṇānurāgi-paramasatyapriya-bhagavat-śrīharibhadra rivararacitāyāṁ
samarāicakahāē bīō bhavō samattō

lg.l: vakkhāyaṁ jaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ sīhā-padā ya taha piyāputtā

p.s:
atthi ihēva jambuddīvē, avaravidēhē khettē aparimiyajaṇanivāsa, aṇaṇuhūyavāhivēyaṇaṁ, adiṭṭhaparacakkavinbhama, sundarapuranāyagabhūyaṁ
kōsaṁbanāma nayaraṁ.
jattha sarala sahāvō, thirasiṇēhāṇubandhō, aṇaṅgarāyahāṇī, dhammaphalakappō itthiyājaṇō.

jattha piyaṁvaō, sañcavayaṇō,
paḍhamābhibhāsī, dhammaniraō ya maṇussabaggō.

tattha ya aṇēyasamarasaṁghaṭṭaviṇijjiyadariyanarindāvaṇayapalhatthaviyaḍamaüḍakōḍirayaṇappa
hārajiyacaraṇajuyalō rāyā nāmēṇa ajiyasēgō tti.
tassa ya sayalarajacintaō, attāṇanivisēsō indasammō nāma māhaṇasacivō.

iō ya sō āṇandanāraō sāgarōvamantammi naraē khaviūṇa, annē vi kiṁcūṇē cattāri sāgarōvamē saṁsārē
samāhiṇḍiya indasammassa māhaṇassa muhaṁ karāē bhāriyāē kucchisi itthiyattāē upavanō ti.

kayaṁ sē nāma
jāliṇi ti kahāṇayavisē sēṇa.
dinnā tassa cēva rāiṇō buddhisāgarābhihāṇasacivaputtassa bambhadattassa.

iō ya sō sīhadēvō taō dēvalōgāō caviūṇa acintamāhappayāē kammassa, tīsē cēva jāliṇīē kucchisi puttattāē uvavannō
tti.

diṭṭhō ya tīē tīē cēva rayaṇīē sumiṇaō-jahā kira suvaṇṇamayapuṇṇakalasō mē uyaraṁ paviṭṭhō, sō ya asaṁjāyapariōsāē
viṇiggaō samāṇō kahakaha vibhaggō tti.
taṁ ca daṭhūṇa sasajjhasā vi ya viuddhā ēsā.

na sāhiō
ya tīē sumiṇō daïyassa.

cintiyaṁ ca tīē— vāvāēmitāva ēyaṁ pāva
gabhaṁ ti.

niuttō tēṇa pariyaṇō
pasūisamaē, jahā gambhavivattī na havaï tahā tubbhēhiṁ jaïyavvaṁ avi ya bhaṭṭiṇīpariōsanimittaṁ kaïṁci cittaṁ sē vañciūṇa mama nivē
iyavvō ti.

taō jāō sē dōhalaō-karēmi savvasattāṇamāṇandaṁ, saṁpāḍēmi dēvayāyayaṇāṇaṁ mahāpūyāō, pūēmi bhayavantē dhammaniraē
mahātabassī, muṇimō kiṁci paralōyamaggaṁ ti.

cintiyaṁ ca tīē-kahaṁ puṇa ēsa eddahamettapariyaṇasamakkhaṁ vāvāiyavvō tti? etthantarammi muṇiyataya
bhippāyāē bambhadattavayaṇaṁ sariūṇa bhaṇiya bandhujīvābhihāṇāē bālasahīē.

tā alamimiṇā
kilēsā— yāsakāraēṇa, varaṁ viiściō ēsō tti.

taō kasāyaparavasāē vāvāyaṇammi sahiyaṇalajjāluyāē bhaṇiyaṁ jāliṇīē
tumbhē jāṇaha tti.

nīṇiō lōgavāō vāvana
gabbhā bhaṭṭiṇi tti.

vināō ya vuttantō imiṇā sumiṇaya
dasaṇa-gabbhasāḍaṇāiō ya jaṇaṇīē.
etthantarammi muṇiyavuttantā puttassa kasāiyā sē jaṇaṇī.

lg.l: ettō kammavivuḍḍī, taō bhavō, tattha dukkhasaṁghāō
kalusaphalēṇa na jujjaï kiṁ cittaṁ tatya jaṁ vigayarāgō
santē vi jō kasāē nigiṇhaï sō vi tattullō

p.s:
ēyaṁ vā piyaṁ karēhi, mamaṁ vatti,
ēyammi aparicattē nāhaṁ pāṇasāhāraṇaṁ udayaṁ pi geṇhāmi tti.
cintiyaṁ ca tēṇa-peccha mē pāvapariṇaī, jēṇa jaṇaṇī vi ēvaṁ vaï ti.
ēyavaïyarēṇaṁ ca tāō vi mē duhiō.

tā na
juttaṁ mē iha acchiuṁ.

diṭṭhō ya tattha asōyapāyavatalaṁgō, sasissaparivāriō, ēgavihasaṁjamaraō, dōasajjhāṇavirahiō,
tidaṇḍarahiō, caükasāyamahaṇō paścindiyaniggahaparō, chajjīvanikāyavacchalō, sattabhayavippamukkō, aṭṭhamayaṭṭhāṇarahiō, navabambhacē
bhaṇitaṁ ca—
raguttō dasavihadhammamuṭṭhiyamaṇō, ekkārasaṁganāṇī, bārasatavacaraṇakammaniraō ya vijayasiṁhō nāmāyariō tti.

tō taṁ daṭṭaṇa samu
pannā tassa pītī.
cintiyaṁ ca tēṇa-dhannō khu ēsō, jō aṇavadviyasiṇēhavibhamē saṁsārē, ēvaṁ dhammē niraō ti.

tā pucchāmi
tāva ēyaṁ, kiṁ puṇa ēyassa nivvēyakāraṇaṁ, jēṇa ēsō ēvaṁ dhammē niraō tti.

pucchiō ya bhayavaṁ-kiṁ tē nivvēyakāraṇaṁ? jēṇaṁ ēvaṁ pi sabaṅgasundarāhirāmō,
sundarāhirāmayāō cēva pisuṇiyaniyavibhavavitthārō, vibhavavityārā saṁghiyasayaṇabaggō, sayaṇavagganiravekkhamimaṁ īisaṁ nissaṅgayaṁ
pavannō si.

guruṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — suṇa, kimiha aḍhimaṁsaruhirasaṁgaē sarīrē vi sundarataṁ? kō vā āyāsamētaphalē vihavavitthārē paḍi
bandhō, kō vā mumiṇayasamāgamacañcalē sayaṇē tti.

lg.l: sayaṇassa vi majhagaō rōgābhihaō kilissaï ihēgō
sayaṇō vi ya sē rōgaṁ na ’viriścaī nē ya nāsēi
majjhammi bandhavāṇaṁ ēkō maraï kaluṇaṁ ruyantāṇaṁ
na ya ṇaṁ dhārēi taō bandhujaṇō nēva dārāī
ekkō karēi kammaṁ phalamavi tassekkaō samaṇuhōi
ekkō jāyaï maraha ya paralōyaṁ ekkaō jāi
kō kassa jaē sayaṇō kō kassa va hōi anajaṇō?
mariūṇa vēriō vi hu jāyaï jaïṇagō, muō vi hum̐ rivū tti
tā agavaṭṭhiyabhāvē sayaṇē saṅgō ti mōhaphalaṁ

p.s: atthi ihēva vijaē laïcchinilayaṁ nāma nayaraṁ.

tattha sāgaradattō nāma satyavāhō, sirimaī sē bhāriyā, tāṇaṁ ahaṁ suō tti.
kumārabhāvē vaṭṭamāṇō gaō tannayarāsannamēva lacchipavayaṁ.

diṭṭhō ya tattha ēgammi vibhāgē siṇiddhapattasaṁcaō, dharāpaviṭhṭhadīhapāyagō,
nāliēripāyavō tti.
taṁ ca daṇi samuppannaṁ mē kōuyaṁ.

eddahamettassavi pāyavassa ēdaha
mettāō vibhāgāō ōyariūṇa pāyaō dharaṇiṁ paviṭṭhō tti.

etthantarammi ya ayaṇḍammi cēva saṁjāō mē pamōō, viyambhiō surahimāruō, vimukō sahajō vi vērāṇubandhō pasugaṇēhi,
bhuvaṇasirīē viya samaddhāsiō lacchipavvaō, sabbōuyakusumēhi vi puphiyāī kāṇaṇujjāṇāī, pamuiyā vihaṁgasaṁghāyā, maṇaharuttālaramma
ca guñjiyaṁ chappayāvalīhiṁ, visuddhapayāsamatāvaṁ ca tamuddēsamujjōiuṁ payattōravī.
tō maē cintiyaṁ aha puṇa kiṁ imaṁ bhuvaṇacchērayaṁ ti.

etthantarammi taruṇaravimaṇḍalanihaṁ, suvisuddhajaccakavaṇaṁ, aṇēyarayaṇamaṇḍiyaṁ, jayajayaravābūriyanahaṅgaṇaṁ, gijjantatiyasamaṅgalaṁ,
nivaḍantakusumavuddhi, aṇēyatiyasapariyariyaṁ, vijiyasaṁsāracakapisuṇaya, avara disāō samōvayanta bhayavaō ajiyadēvatitthayarassa
didaṁ maē dhammacakkaṁ ti.

tayaṇantaraṁ ca mahagdhaguṇarayaṇabhūsiyā siyambaradhāriṇō aṇēgē sāhayō, taō suradhariyakundadhavalāyabattō
dunduhiniṇāyabahiriyanahaṅgaṇō, virāyantadivyabhāmaṇḍalō, suravaïsamukhittacārucāmarō, surāsuramaṇuyavandrasaṁthuō, kālāyarupavaratu
rukkadhūvamahamahentagandhō, gandhavaṭṭibhūō añcantasōmō kañcaṇamayadivdhakamalāvalīē parisakkamāṇō bhayavaṁ, tilōyanāhō, nitthiṇṇa
bhavasamuddō ajiyadēvatitthayarō tti.
taṁ ca da ṭhūṇa samuppaṇṇō mē pamōō, paṇaṭṭhuṁ micchattatimirēṇaṁ, viyambhiyaṁ dhammavavasāraṇaṁ.
cintiyaṁ ca maē-dhannō ahaṁ, jēṇa maē tilōyacintāmaṇī bhayavaṁ uvaladdhō tti.

etthantarammi ya kaya tiyasēhiṁ bhayavaō maṇikaṇayakalahōyamayanimmiyapāyāratiyaṁ suvihattadivyatōraṇaṁ, rayaṇamayavicittaka
visīsaya, ūsiyamahākē univahaṁ, guñjantamahuyarāmōyasōhiyaṁ, ūsiyasiyāyavattamaṇaharaṁ, vēruliyadivasīhāsaṇaṁ, mahallasīhadhayacakama
ṇḍiyaṁ samōsaraṇaṁ ti.

taō taṁ
puvvakōuyaṁ samaṇussarantēṇa pucchiō bhayavaṁ maē tilōyanāhō.

bhaya! kiṁ puṇa tassa nāliēripāyavassa pāyaō ōiṇṇō, kiṁ
atthi tattha daviṇajāyaṁ kiṁ vā nahi (nihī), kiṁparimāṇaṁ vā, kēṇa vā taṁ ṭhaviyaṁ, kīisō vā tassa vivāgō tti? bhagavayā
bhaṇiyaṁ — muṇa, lōhadōsēṇa pāyō ōiṇṇō.

tumaē tēṇaṁ ca nāliēri
jīvēṇa ṭhāviyaṁ.

maē bhaṇiyaṁ — bhayavaṁ! kahaṁ puṇa maē imiṇā ya ṭhaviyaṁ, kahaṁ ca mama īdisō
vivāgō imassa vi īdisō tti.
atthi ihēba vijaē amaraüraṁ nāma nayaraṁ.

tāṇaṁ ca tubbhē duvē vi
upparopparajāyagā guṇacandabālacandābhihāṇā ya puttaya tti.

saṁpattajovvaṇā ya mahantaṁ cēlāibhaṇḍaṁ ghettūṇa vāṇijjavaḍiyāē āgayā
imaṁ dēsaṁ.

etthantarammi vijayavammanaravaïṇā āḍhattō lacchinilayasāmī sūratēō nāma
naravaī.
sō ya nayarē gajhaṁ chōga gahiyasāranayaralōō ārūḍhō imaṁ pavvayaṁ.

tumbhē vi tēṇēva naravaïṇā saha ghettūṇa daviṇajāyaṁ para
balabhaēṇa ārūḍhā lacchipavvayaṁ.
ṭhiyā ya ēyammi paēsē nihāṇīkayamālōciūṇa imaṁ daviṇajāyaṁ.

taō
lōhadōsēṇa bhāgiō tti kariya visapōgakaraṇēṇaṁ vāvāviō tumaṁ guṇacandēṇa.

guṇacandō
vi ya aparibhujiūṇa taṁ davvaṁ ettha cēva pacaē mahābhuyaṅgaḍakō mariūṇa uppanō rayaṇappahāē narayapuḍhavīē nāraō.

tō tuma dekhaṇa
paliōvamamahāuyaṁ pāliūṇa taō cuō etthēva vijaē ṭēkaṇāurē nayarē hariṇandissa satyavāhassa vamumaīē bhāriyāē kucchisi putta
tāē upavanō si.
païṭāviyaṁ ca tē nāmaṁ dēvadattō tti.

etthantarammi taō vi guṇacandō
naragāō udhvaṭṭiūṇa lōhadōsēṇametthēva lacchipavvaē ēyassa cēva nihāṇassa paccāsannapaēsē uppannō bhuyaṅgamō ti.
taō tumaṁ puvyabhavasiṇē hēṇaṁ rammayāē pavvayassa paribhamantō āgaō imaṁ uddēsaṁ.
taō lōhadōsēṇa ēsa ēyaṁ daviṇajāyaṁ geṇhissaï tti ḍakō caraṇadēsammi.
accuggayāē visassa takkhaṇā cēva nivaḍiō dharaṇivaḍhē.
pāsavattiṇā ya tē pariyaṇēṇa vāvāviō bhuyaṅgamō.

tuma pi mariūṇa etthēva vijaē kayaṅgalāē
nayarīē sivadēvassa kulaüttayassa jasōharāē bhāriyāē kucchisi puttattāē uvavannō si.

païṭāviyaṁ ca tē nāma
indadēvō tti.
iō ya tēṇa sīhajīvēṇa punvabhavanbhatthabhāvaṇāō ōhasannāē pariggahiyaṁ taṁ davvaṁ.
annayā ya vīradēvanakhaṇā niyasāmiēṇa pēsiō tuma lacchinilayasāmiṇō māṇahaṅgassa samīvaṁ.
taō lōhasannāvivajjāsiyacittaṇaṁ vāvāviō si imiṇā, imō vi ya tumaē ti.

uvavannā ya tubbhē etthēva vijayammi siritthalagē
paṭṭaṇē jakhadāsasanniyassa caṇḍālasta māijakkhāē bhāriyāē jamalabhāugattāē tti.

païṭāviyāī nāmāī tujjhaṁ
kālasēṇō, iyarasma caṇḍa sēṇō tti.
annayā āhēḍayanimittaṁ gayā lacchipavvayaṁ, vāvāiō kōlō.

sō ya ēyammi
vēva nihāṇakapaēsē visasiō.

etthantarammi kaṭṭārayaṁ nisāṇiūṇa kahaṁci aṇa
tthadaṇḍaō cēva dharaṇiṁ khaṇamāṇēṇa ukladō nihāṇayakalasassa ēgadēsō caṇḍasēṇēṇaṁ.

taō
dabalōhēṇaṁ vīsatthō tumaṁ vāghāiō tēṇa.

imō vi tahabalobhēṇa taṁ caïva
dēsaṁ amuścamāṇō aïkantēsu kaïvayavarisēsu anuciūṇa taṁ davvaṁ annavēriyacaṇḍālaviṇivāiō samāgō uppanō tamābhihāṇāē naraya
puḍhavīē aṭārasasāgarotramāū nāragō tti.
taō tuma paḍi puṇṇē ahāuē naragāō ubaṭṭhiūṇa etthē.

vijaē sirimaīē sannivēsammi
sālibhahassa gāhāvaïssa nandiṇīra bhāriyāē kucchisi puttattāē uvavannō tti.
etthantaramma sīladēvāṇagārasamīvē pattō taē apattapubbō jiṇavarapaṇīō dhammō.
upavannō lantayābhihāṇē dēvalōē kiṁcūga tērasasāgarōvamāū vēmāṇiō tti.

tattha paribhunniūṇa divyabhōē
ahāuyaparikkhaēṇa cuō samāṇō etthēva vijaē hathigāurē nayarē muhatthissa nagarasēhissa kantimaīē bhāriyāē kucchisi puttattāē
uvavannō si, iyarō vitaō naragāō uvvaṭṭiūṇa tatthēva nayarē tujjha cēva piuṇō sōmilābhihāṇāē gharadāsīē kuñchisi puttattāē
tti.
païṭāviyāī nāmāī-tujjha samudadattō, iyarassa maṅgalagō tti.
etthantarammi pavannō taē aṇaṅgadēvagaṇisamīvē jiṇadēsiō dhammō.

pariṇīyā ya lacchinilayaśasiṇō sāvayassa
acalasatthavāhassa dhūyā jiṇamaī.
annayā ya maṅgaladuiō jiṇamaīnimittamēva payaṭṭō lacchinilayaṁ.
taō bahulapattalayāē paēsassa vīsa miyō muhattayaṁ.

diṭṭhō ya taē pāmāḍajjhāḍayassa imammi paēsē
viṇiggaō pāyō.
bhaṇiyaṁ kōugēṇa-bhō maṅgalaga! ettha parasē kēṇaï daviṇajāēṇa hōyatvaṁ.
kōugamettamēva mē kahaṇanimittaṁ, na uṇa daïviṇalōhō.

tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — ahiyayaraṁ mē kōuyaṁ tā nihālēmō, kō
estha paramatthō tti? tō aṇabhippēyaṁ pi bhavaō payaṭṭō taṁ tahāvihēṇa tikkhasārakaṭṭēṇa khaṇium̐ ti.

jaï kahaṁci bhaṭṭidārayaṁ vaściu gi
hiuṁ pāviyaï ti.
etthantarammi diṭṭhō tumaē vi kalasa kaṇṭhagō.

bhaṇiō ya ēsō-bhada maṅgalaga! alaṁ imiṇā; ēhi, nayaraṁ gacchāmō
tti.
taō pūriūṇa tamuddēsaṁ hiṭṭhō viya payaṭṭō maṅgalagō.

bhaṇiō ya tumaē-bhadda! na taē kassaï puraō ēsa vaïyarō ahigaraṇa
hēubhūō jaṁpiyavvotti.
cintiyaṁ ṇēṇa-maē vi viṇā ēsa ēyaṁ geṇhissaïtti.
tā jāva cēva na geṇhaï ēsa ēyaṁ, tāva cēva ahaṁ kēṇaï uvāēṇa vāvāissaṁ ti.

bhada maṅgalaga! gaccha, sasurakulapaütti mē kuō vi uvalahiya saṁvāēhi,
jēṇa pavisāmō nayaraṁ ti.
cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ-paviṭṭhō khu ēsō lahuṁ cēva ēyaṁ geṇhissaï.

tā tahāṇuciṭṭhāmi, jahā
na ēsa etya pavisaï.

jahā, itthisahāvaō kulaviruddhamācari
ūṇa pavisiyā tē ghariṇī.
suyaṁ ca amhāṇamāgamaṇamēēhiṁ, aō ahiyayaraṁ lajjiyāṇi.

tā
na juttametya pavisiuṁ ti saṁpahāriya taō nayaraṁ pavisiūṇa kayakālakkhēvō māyācariēṇa vivaṇṇamuhacchāō āgō tē samīvaṁ.

cintiyaṁ ca tumaē-dhiratthu isthibhāvassa, jamēvaṁvihā vi sāvayakuluppannā vi suvinā
yajiṇavayaṇasārā vi ubhayalōyaviruddhamāyaraï.
tā alaṁ mē iyāṇi pi gihavāsēṇa.

iō cēva gacchāmi, jattha bhagavaṁ aṇa
ṅgadēvō.

ēsō vi maṅgalagō iō cēva vaccaü gharaṁ, krimimiṇā kilisiēṇaṁ ti saṁpahāriūṇa bhaṇiō jahācintiyamēva maṅgalagō.
cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ-ahō!! ēsa māyācariēṇaṁ maṁ vaściūṁ ujaō.

jāva
tuma na cintiyadēsaṁ pattō si, tāva kahamahaṁ bhavantaṁ pariccayāmi.
ēvaṁ kaïvayadiṇāṇi imiṇā saha gacchiūṇa vāvāissaṁ imaṁ ti.
bhada maṅgalaga! jaï tē nibbandhō, tā ēvaṁ havaü ti.

taō pucchissāmō
kaṁci sāhuṁ, kahiṁ bhayavaṁ aṇaṅgadēvō tti? mantiūṇa patthiyā tumbhē paḍipahēṇa.

annayā aïvisamaraṇṇama
jjhattinahayalasarantaramabhigaē diṇayaramma mahāsāhasa ti kaliūṇa accantakhuddahiyaēṇaṁ lōhadōsaō tahā vi aṇiyattamāṇēṇaṁ suvī
satthahiyō cēva pahaō tuma piḍidēsammi churigāē maṅgalagēṇaṁ ti.

etthantarammi adāṇapaḍivannō aṇēyasamaṇapariyariō tatthēva parasē
sahasā samāgaō agaṅgadēvō.

jōviyaṁ piṭṭhaō, jāka diṭṭhō sasaṁbhamāulaṁ pāyamāṇō maṅgalagō cintiyaṁ ca
tumaē-na ettha annē cōrā dīsanti, palāyaī ya ēsō.
tā kimēyaṁ ti? etthantaramni diṭṭhā sōṇiyāṇurañjiyā churiyā.

gahiyā ya
sā taē paccabhinnāyā ya taō saṁjāō tē viyapō.

kimēyaṁ maṅgalagēṇa vasiyaṁ bhavē? ahavā na ēyassa kiṁpi ēvaṁ vavasāyakāraṇaṁ
uspekkhāmi.

sadiō maṅgalagō, jāva ahiṁyayaraṁ palāiumāraddhō tō
avagaō tē viyappō.
tā kiṁ puṇa sē imassa vavasāyasta kāraṇaṁ.
cintiyaṁ ca tumaē-natthi akaraṇijja nāma lōhavasagāṇaṁ ti.
aō cēva nimittaō jiṇamaīvuttantī vi imiṇā vigappiō bhavē.
annahā kahaṁ tārisī mahākūlapasūyā suvināyajiṇāyaṇasārā ya tārisaṁ ubhayalōgaviruddhaṁ karissaï.

sāvaya! kipēyaṁ ti? sāhiō
tumaē tēsiṁ jahāvattō vuttantō.

cintiyaṁ ca tumaē-ahō!
maṅgalassa vañcaṇāpagārō, ahō! vicittayā mōhassa, ahō! aṇuvāēyayā saṁsārassa.

tā jaï vi akhaṇḍiyasīlā jiṇamaī, tahāvi
alaṁ gihāsamēṇa.
suvināyajiṇavayaṇasārā ya sā tullacittā ya mē pāēṇa.

tā sōūṇa imaṁ
vaïyaraṁ sā vi ya pavvaïssaï tti.
ēvaṁ ca kaē sā vi hu tavassiṇī imāō dukkhabahulāō bhavasamuddāō samuttāriyā havaï.

bahuvigdhā caraṇapaḍipattī, suhāvahā ya ēsā cēva tti cintiūṇa pavvaïō aṇaṅgadēvagurusamīvē.
aïkkantō kōi kālō.

kilēsāyāsabahulō ēsa saṁsārō, viōgāvasāṇō ya saṁgamō, dāruṇō ya vivāgō visayaparibhōgassa, dullahaṁ ca maṇuyabhāvaṁmi
jiṇamayaṁ, ubhayalōyasuhāvahaṁ ca ēvaṁ cēva tti.

taō sā ēvaṁ vicintiūṇa aṇunaviya jaṇaṇijaṇaē aṇunāyā tēhiṁ āgayā taṁ
annēsamāṇī, jattha tumaṁ.
pecchiūṇa nivvuipurapaṭṭiyaṁ tumaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ca aṇāē.
samuttāriyā ahaṁ appā ya imāō bhavasamuddāō tti.

niraïyāraṁ sāmaṇṇamaṇuvāliūṇa tumaṁ kālakkamēṇa maō samāṇō uvavannō paṇuvīsasā
garōvamāū gēvejjagasurō tti.

iyarō vi maṅgalagō tamatthaṁ pariggahiya mahāsilāsaṁcaocchāiyaṁ ca kāūṇa tammamattēṇa tatthēva dēsē kuṇi
māhārēṇa kilēsasaṁpāiyavittī ahāuyaṁ pāliūṇa maō samāṇō uvavanō tamābhihāṇāē narayapuḍhavīē bāvīsasāgarōvamāū nāragō tti.
tō ya mahayā parikilēsēṇa tamahāuyaṁ pāliūṇa uvyaṭṭō samāṇō etthēva vijaē rahabaddhaṇaē gāmē velliyagassa caṇḍālassa gēhē
chēlagattāē uvavannō tti.

annayā ya bahuchēlagamajjhagaō tō rahavaddhaṇāō jayatthalē nijamāṇō pattō imaṁ nihāṇa
guddēsaṁ.
samuppannaṁ ca sē tamuddēsamavalōiūṇa puvvabhavabbhāsaō jāissaraṇaṁ.

taō lōhadōsēṇa viyaṭṭō velliyagassa necchaï taō
uddēsāō annatthamabhigantuṁ, cōijjantō vi puṇō puṇō niyattaï tti.
pariggahiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa ōhasannāē taṁ davvaṁ.

annayā sōmacaṇḍō nāma jyāriō kahaci
parimbhamantō āgō tamuddēsaṁ.
taō annāṇalōhadōsēṇa tassa puraō sāmarisamiva paribhamiumāḍhattō.
samuppannō ya tassēva paṇaṭṭhasavaṇanāsigāē duggiligābhihāṇāē bhāriyāē kucchisi puttattāē tti.
païṭāviyaṁ ca sē nāma ruddacaṇḍō ti.

maō ya
samāṇō samuppannō sakkarābhihāṇāē nāyapuḍhavīē kiṁcūṇatisāgarōvamāū nāragotti.

tō ahāuyamaṇuvāliūṇa uvvaṭṭō samāṇō
samuppannō etthēva vijaē etthēva lacchinilaē asōgadattassa sēhissa suhaṅkarāē bhāriyāē kucchisi itthigattāē tti.
païṭāviyaṁ ca sē nāma siriyādēvi tti.
etthantaraṁmi tumaṁ gēvēja gēhitō caviūṇa imāē cēva kucchisi samuppannō puttattāē tti.

païṭṭā
viyaṁ ca sē nāma sāgaradattō tti.

annayā ya puttajammabhudayanimittēṇaṁ cēva saparivārō āgaō ujjāṇigāē
imaṁ cēva nihāṇaguhēsaṁ.
diṭṭhō ya tumaē puttajjhayanivēsaṇanimittaṁ khaḍḍē khaṇamāṇēṇaṁ nihāṇagakalasakaṇṭhēgadēsō tti.

taō tamannattha
nivēsiūṇa taṁ ca paēsaṁ puṇaravi tahēva kariūṇa bhuttuttarakālē paviṭṭhō nayaraṁ.
kimetya juttaṁ ti ambaṁ tāva pucchāmi.
pucchiyā ēsā kim ettha juttaṁ ti.

mama tāva taṁ paēsaṁ daṁsēhi, taō jaṁ juttaṁ, taṁ
bhaṇissāmi tti.

taō ya sō sēsadavāvahāraṁ pi
mā karissaï tā alaṁ tāva ēiṇā, avasarēṇa geṇhissāmō tti.

aïkantā
kaïvi diyadā tujhaṁ suhēṇaṁ, imīē puṇaṁ puyabhavanmatyalōhadōsēṇa tuha maraṇacintōvāyapajjāulāē dukkhēṇaṁ ti.

paricintiō uvāō
dēmi sē pōsahōvavāsapāraṇayabhōyaṇē visaṁ ti.

taō upāsalahusarīrō visappaōēṇa lahuṁ cetra na bhavissaï tti cintiūṇa paüttaṁ
visaṁ.
taō ahiyayaraṁ tē kūjiuṁ payattā jaṇaṇī.
taō ēkēṇa siddhaputtēṇa visāvahāramantasāmatthaō sāhammiō tti kaliūṇa jīvāviō.
mā pugō vi mē pamattassa ēvamēva pāṇāvagamō bhavissaï.
aō pavajjāmi pavaja ti cintiūṇa jahōciēṇa vihiṇā pavannō dēvasammagurusamīvē pavvaja ti.

parivāliūṇa niraïyāraṁ
kāūṇa ya kālamāsē kālaṁ unabannō tīsasāgarōvamāū gēvējagasurō ti.

ēsā ca tē jaṇaṇī tahavvalobhēṇa tattha cēva sahatyasippa
nimmiyaṁ mahāpeḍhē kāūga putta yahayariṇāmamaṇiyanarayāuyā abhuñjiūṇa taṁ davvaṁ mayā samāṇī dhūmappabhāē narayapuḍhavīē uvavannā
pannarasasāgarokmaḍhiī nāragō tti.

taō ubaṭṭā samāṇī nāṇātiriēmu āhiṇḍiya pubbabhavabhatyobhadōsaō ettha nāliēri
pāyavattāē upabanna tti.
tuma pi ya taō sāgaradatta seṭṭhigēhē sirimaīē kucchisi puttattāē uvavannō si.

doṇhaṁ pi tumhāṇaṁ saṁpayaṁ
imā avatthā.
tō mamēyaṁ sōūṇa samuppannō saṁvēgō, virattō bhavacāragāō magō.
aṇunnāō ya tēṇa tō taṁ gēhāviya sayaladuhi yasattāṇaṁ dāūṇa pabannā maē vijayadhammagagaharassa samīvē pabyajja tti.
sihikumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — bhayavaṁ! ēvamēyaṁ, īisō cetra ēsa saṁsārō.

aha kaïvihī puṇa
dāṇāibhēyaṁ paḍucca paṇīō bhayavayā dhammō.

lg.l: dāṇaṁ ca hōi tivihaṁ nāṇā'bhaya-dhammuvaggahakaraṁ ca
jaṁ tattha nāṇadāṇaṁ tamahaṁ vocchaṁ samāsēṇaṁ
dinnēṇa jēṇa jīvō vinnāyā hōi bandha-mokkhāṇaṁ
dinnēṇa tēṇa jīvō puṇṇaṁ pāvaṁ ca bahuvihamasēsaṁ
sammaṁ viyāṇamāṇō kuṇaï pavittiṁ nivittiṁ ca
puṇṇammi pabattantō pāvaï ya lahuṁ narāmarasuhāī
tiriyāṇa va maṇuyāṇa va amuramurāṇaṁ ca hōi jaṁ mukkhaṁ
ēvaṁ ihalōyammi vi paralōyammi ya suhāi nāṇēṇaṁ
pāvēi jēṇa jīvō tamhā taṁ dāṇapavaraṁ tu
jīvāṇa phuḍaṁ savvannubhāsiyaṁ dēi jō nāṇaṁ
ēyaṁ khu nāṇadāṇaṁ sundara! saṁkhēvaō samakkhāyaṁ
icchanti savvajīvā ninbharaduhiyā vi jīviuṁ jamhā
tamhā taṁ cēva piyaṁ tēsiṁ kusalēṇa vinnēyaṁ
jamhā ya naravarindō maraṇammi uvaṭṭhiyammi rajja pi
dēi sajī viyahēuṁ tamhā taṁ cēva iṭṭayaraṁ
dāyavvaṁ ca maīmayā jaṁ iṭṭhu hōi gāhagāṇaṁ tu
dīhāū u suruvō nīrōgō hōi abhayadāṇēṇaṁ
taṁ puṇa asaṇaṁ pāṇaṁ vatthaṁ pattaṁ ca bhēsayaṁ joggaṁ
dāyavvaṁ tu maïmayā tahēva sayaṇāsaṇaṁ pavaraṁ
kammalahuyattaṇēṇa ya sō appāṇaṁ paraṁ ca tārēi
kammagurū atarantō sayaṁpi kaha tāraē annaṁ 1
dāyavvaṁ puṇa taṁ kāraṇēhi caühi parisuddhaṁ
dāyagasuddhaṁ bhaṇṇaï jō dāyā dēi nāṇasaṁpannō
sukkhētammi va bīyaṁ vikkhittaṁ tassa bahuphalaṁ hōi
jō puṇa saddhārahiō dāṇaṁ dēi jasakittirēsammi
ahimāṇēṇa va ēsō dēha ahaṁ kiṁ na dēmi tti
taṁ saddhājalarahiyaṁ vīyaṁ va na hōi bahuphalaṁ tassa
dāṇaṁ bahuṁ pi pavaraṁ siyacittassa mōhēṇa
kāūṇa ya pāṇivaha jō dāṇaṁ dēi dhammasaddhāē
karmalaghutvēna ca sa ātmānaṁ paraṁ ca tārayati
mūḍhō lōyaviruddha dhammaviruddhaṁ ca dēi jō dāṇaṁ
sō appāṇaṁ taha gāhagaṁ ca pāḍēi saṁsārē
jāṇaha gāhagasuddhaṁ pañcamahavvayadharō u jō niyamā
taha khanti-madava-ujjavajuttō dhaṇiyaṁ ca vigayalōhō u
iha paralōē ya tahā savvattha dadaṁ apaḍibaddhō
mēru vva jō na tīraï uksaggasamīraṇēhi cālēuṁ
sīlanvayarahiyāṇaṁ dijaï jaṁ puṇa dhaṇaṁ kupattāṇaṁ
taṁ khalu dhōvaï vatthaṁ ruhirakayaṁ sōṇiēṇēva
dinnaṁ suhaṁ pi dāṇaṁ hōi kupattammi asuhaphalamēva
sappassa jaha va dinnaṁ khīraṁ pi visattaṇamuvēi
tucchaṁ pi supattammi u dāṇaṁ niyamēṇa suhaphalaṁ hōi
jaha gāvīē viiṇṇaṁ taṇaṁ pi khīrattaṇamuvēi
bhaṇṇaï ya kālasuddhaṁ dāṇaṁ kālōvavannayaṁ jaṁ tu
kālammi kīramāṇaṁ kisikammaṁ bahu phalaṁ jahā hōi
iya kālammi vi dinnaṁ dāṇaṁ pi hu bahuphalaṁ ṇēyaṁ
hōi ayālammi jahā avayāraparaṁ païṇṇaya bīyaṁ
dentassa gāhagassa ya ēvaṁ dāṇaṁ pi vinnēyaṁ
kayakiccaṁ mannentō appāṇaṁ dēi jō dāṇaṁ
aṭṭaksaṭṭōvagaō avi suddhaṁ dēi kalasiyamaṇō u
sanidāṇaṁ ca na ēyaṁ bhāvavisuddhaṁ havaï dāṇaṁ
mokkhatthaṁ jaṁ dāṇaṁ taṁ paī ēsō vihī muṇēyavvō
aṇugampādāṇaṁ puṇa jiṇēhi na kahiṁci paḍisiddhaṁ
ēsō u dāṇamaïō dhammō saṁkhēvaō samakkhāō
ettō ya sīlamaïyaṁ tu bhaṇṇamāṇaṁ nisāmēha
mēhuṇa-pariggahāṇa ya viraī jā savvahā sammaṁ
taha kōha-māṇa-māyā-lōhassa ya niggahō daḍhaṁ jō u
cittēṇa nirīhēṇaṁ mettī vi ya sabyajīvēsu
ēyaṁ ca sēviūṇaṁ dhammaṁ jiṇadēsiyaṁ susīlamayaṁ
mugaī pāvanti narā ṭhaenti saï duggaïduvāraṁ
ēsō u sīlamaïō bhaṇiō dhammō jiṇēhi savvēhiṁ
bhaṇṇaï tavōmaïō sa bāhira-’bbhantarassa ya tavassa
kāyakilēsō saṁlīṇayā ya bajjhō tavō hōi
jhāṇaṁ ussaggō vi ya abhintaraō tavō hōi
pāventi visālāī karenti dukkhakkhayaṁ taha ya
ēsō u tavōmaïō dhammō saṁkhēvaō samakkhāō
nisuṇaha ettō sundara! dhamma puṇa bhāvaṇāmaïyaṁ
vēraggabhāvaṇā vi ya paramā titthayaramattī ya
titthayarabhāsiyassa ya dhammassa pabhāvaṇā taha ya
mokkhasuhammi ya rāō aṇāyayaṇavajjaṇā ya supasatthā
saï appaṇō ya nindā garahā ya kahicikhaliyassa
ēyaṁ caünvihaṁ phāsiūṇa dhammaṁ jiṇēhi pannattaṁ

p.s:
bhaṇiō ya ṇēṇa bhayavaṁ vijayasiṅghō-bhayavaṁ! ēvamēva, īdisō
cēva ēsa dhammō, na ettha saṁdēhō tti.
kiṁ tu dāṇamaïyaṁ mottūṇa na sēsabhēyā imassa samma aviyalā tīranti gihatyēṇa kāuṁ.

tā
ācikkha bhayavaṁ! kērisō puṇa imassa mahāpurisasēviyassa, sayaladukkhāṇalajalassa, siddhivahusaṁgamēkahēuṇō samaṇattaṇassa jōgō tti.

bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — suṇa, samaṇataṇārihō āriyadēsuppaśnō, visiṭṭhajāikulasamaniō, khīṇappāyakammamalō, taō cēva vimalabuddhī
dullahaṁ māṇusattaṇaṁ, jammō maraṇanimittaṁ, calāō saṁpayāō, dukkhahēyavō visayā, saṁjōgē viōgō, aṇusamayamēva maraṇaṁ, dāruṇō
vivāgō tti ahigayasaṁsārasarūvō,taō cēva tamvirattō, payaṇukasāō, thēvahāsō, akōugō, kayanna, viṇīō, puvvaṁ pi rāyā-’macca
paürajaṇabahumaō, adōsagārī, kallāṇaṅgō, saddhāvantō, thirasaddhō samuvasaṁpannō ya.
tā ēvaṁ nivēiē bhayavaṁ pamāṇaṁ ti.

taō paricintiyaṁ bhayavayā-jahā khu ēsō
mahābhāgavantō suhumapasiṇēsu viyakkhaṇō, añcantapasantarūvō, aïṇiuṇabhaṇiikusalō vi ya lakkhijaï, tahā bhaviyaramaṇēṇaṁ mahā
kulapamaēṇaṁ bhavavirattacittēṇa ya.

tā imaṁ tāva ettha pattakālaṁ, jaṁ ēsō uvasaṁgahijjaï ti cintiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ-mahāsāvaya!
na sēsaguṇavippahūṇō ihaṁ uvasaṁpajjaï.
juttaṁ ca payaïnigguṇē saṁsāravāsē jamiṇaṁ samaṇattaṇaṁ, kiṁ tu dukkaramidaṁ.

ettha khalu savvakālamēva
samasattumittabhāvēṇa pāṇāivāyaviraī, appamattayāē aṇaliyabhāsaṇaṁ, dantasōhaṇamettassa vi adinnassa bajjaṇā, maṇa-vayaṇa-kārahi
abbambhacēranirōhō, vattha-pattō-vagaraṇēhiṁ pi nimmamattayā, caüvbiharāibhattaviraī, uggamu-ppāya-ṇēsaṇāvisuddhapiṇḍagahaṇaṁ, saṁjōṣaṇāi
paścadōsarahiyamiyakālabhōyaṇaṁ, pañcasamiyattaṇaṁ, tiguttayā, iriyāsamiyāibhāvaṇāō, aṇasaṇa-pāyacchitta-viṇayāisabāhiranbhinta
ratavōvihāṇaṁ, māsāiyā ya aṇēgāō paḍimāō vicittā ya davvādaō abhiggahā, aṇhāṇaṁ, bhūmisayaṇijja, kēsalobhō, nippaḍi
kammassarīrayā, savvakālamēva gurūṇaṁ nidēsakaraṇaṁ, khuhā-pivāsāiparīsahāhiyāsaṇaṁ, divvāiuvasaggavijaō, laddhāvaladdhavittiyā
kiṁ bahuṇā? accanta dubahamahāpurisavūhaaṭṭhārasasīlaṅgasahassabharavahaṇamavissāmaṁ ti.

tā tariyavvō khalu ayaṁ bāhāhiṁ mahāsamuddō,
bhakkhiyabbō nirāsāya (ē) ēva vālugākavalō, parisakkiyadhvaṁ nisiyakaravāladhārāē, pāyavvā muhuyahuyavahajālāvalī, bhariyavbō
sahumapavaṇakotthalō, gantavvaṁ gaṅgāpavāhapaḍisīpaṇaṁ, tōliyanvō tulāē mandaragirī, jēyavvamēgāgiṇā cāuraṅgabalaṁ, vidhēyavvā
vivarīyabhamantaddhacakōvarithiulliyā, gahiyanyā agahiyapuvvā tihuyaṇajayapaḍāgā.
taō ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa pahaṭṭavayaṇakamalēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ sihikumārēṇa-bhaya! ēvamēyaṁ, jahā tumbhē āṇavēha.

kiṁ tu viiyasaṁsārasa
rūvassa pāṇiṇō tandhiōgujayassa tasmucchēyakāraṇaṁ na kiṁci dukaraṁ ti.

bhayavayā bhaṇiya-ēvamēyaṁ, kiṁ tu taṁ cēva saṁsārasarūvaṁ
pañcakkhōvalabbhamāṇāsundaraṁ pi aṇēyabhavabhāvaṇāō mōhēi pāṇiṇaṁ, mūḍhō ya sō na cintēi taspta rūvaṁ, na gaṇēi āyaī, na mannaē
uvaēsaṁ, nābhiṇandaï guruṁ, na pecchaï kulaṁ, na sēvaï dhammaṁ, na vīhēi ayasassa, na rakkhaï vayaṇijja.

savvahā taṁ tamāyaraï, jēṇa jēṇa
sō ihalōē paralōē ya kilēsabhāyaṇaṁ hōī.
tā nihaṇiyabvō khalu ēsa mōhō tti.

sihikumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — bhayavaṁ! tassa vi ya
nihaṇaṇē ēsēva uvāō, na ya aṇāḍhattakajjō purisō phalaṁ sāhēi, āḍhattē ya saṁsaō, ahavā uvāyapabattō asaṁsayaṁ cēva sāhēi.
uvāō ya ēsa, jaṁ bhayavaō samīvē samaṇattaṇapava jaṇaṁ.
nittharanti khalu kāyarā vi pōyanijāmayaguṇēṇa mahaṇṇavaṁ.

na ya appa
puṇṇāṇaṁ kusalabuddhī havaï.
na ya samuppannāē vi imīē ēvaṁvihasayalaguṇasaṁpaōvavēyagurulāhō.

tā karēhi mē bhayavaṁ! aṇuggahaṁ ti.
bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — vaccha! kaō cēva tuha maē aṇuggahō.

kiṁ tu ēsā samayaṭṭiī amhāṇaṁ, jē saṁsiūṇa thēvamāgāstha, sikkhā
viūṇā''vasmayaṁ aïkantēṣu kaïbayadiṇēsu taō dikkhijjaï ti.
nikkhantēṇa vi maē samayahiī cēva pāliyabdhā.

ēvaṁ ca jāva mantayantā ciṭṭhanti, tāva āgaō kahiṁci tappaüni sōūṇa aṇēyalōyaparigō karēṇuyārūḍhō imassa cēva jaṇaō
bambhayattotti.

paṇamiūṇa
bhaṇiō sihikumārēṇa tāya! saṁpāēhi abhaggapaṇaïpatthaṇō mē ēgaṁ patthaṇaṁ ti.
sihikumārēṇa bhaṇiya-tāya! viiyavuttantō cēva turma saṁsārasahāvassa.

dullahaṁ khalu māṇusattaṇaṁ, aṇicā piyajaṇasamāgamā,
caścalāō riddhīō kumumasāraṁ jovvaṇaṁ, paralōyapañcatthiō aṇaṅgō, dāruṇō visayavivāgō, pahavaï sayā aṇivāriyapasarō maccū.
ēvamavasāṇē iha jīvalōē aṇunāō tumaē vīyarāyappaṇīyajaïdhammāsēvaṇēṇa karēmi saphalaṁ maṇuyattaṇaṁ.

tō
suyasiṇēhēṇa bāhajalabhariyalōyaṇēṇaṁ sagaggaya bhaṇiyaṁ bambhayattēṇa-putta! ayālō ēsa jaïdhammassa.

sihikumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — tāya!
maccuṇō viya natthi ayālō jaïdhammassa ti.

etthantarammi bambhayattaparicāragēṇa nāhiyavādiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ piṅgakēṇa-bhō kumāra! kēṇa tumaṁ vippayāriō? na khalu ettha
pañcabhūyavaïrittō paralōgagāmī jīvō samatthīyaï.

avi ya ēyāṇi cēva bhūyāṇi sahāvaō cēva ēyappagārapariṇāmapariṇayāṇi jīvō
tti bhaṇṇanti.
jayā ya ēyāṇi caïūṇa samudayaṁ paścattamuvagacchanti, tayā maō purisō ti ahihāṇaṁ pavattaē.

na uṇa etya kōi
dēhaṁ caïūṇa ghaḍaciḍaō viva parabhavaṁ gacchaī.

tā mā tumaṁ asantē vi paralōgē micchāhiṇivēsabhāviyamaī sahāvasundaraṁ visayamuhaṁ
paricayamu, daṁsēhi vā dēhavaïrittaṁ dēhiṇaṁ.
aō jaṁ taē bhaṇiyaṁ — jahā dullahaṁ maṇuyattaṇaṁ, tamasaṁbaddhamēva.

jaōna taṁ sukaya-dukkayāṇu
bhāvēṇa labbhaï, avi ya bhūyapariṇaīō, aō kimiyamāulattaṇaṁ.
tahā jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ aṇiccā piyajaṇasamāgamā, ēyaṁ pi akāraṇaṁ.
jaō na tē nikkhantāṇaṁ pi annahā honti.

tahā jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ cañcalāō riddhīō, ēyassa vi na nikkhamaṇamēva paḍivakkhō, avi
ya uvāēṇa parirakkhaṇaṁ ti.
tahā jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ kusumasāraṁ jovvaṇaṁ, ettha viya rasāyaṇaṁ juttaṁ, na uṇa nikkhamaṇaṁ ti.

tahā jaṁ
ca bhaṇiyaṁ paralōyapaccatthiō aṇaṅgō tti, ēyaṁ pi na sōhaṇaṁ, jō paralōō cēva natthi, na ya kōi taō āgantūṇamappāṇayaṁ daṁsēi.

tahā jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ dāruṇō visayavivāgō tti, ēyaṁ pi na juttisaṁgaya; jō āhārassa vi
vivāgō dāruṇō cēva, ēvaṁ ca bhōyaṇamavi paricaïavvaṁ.

na ya hariṇā vijanti tti jakā cēva na vuppanti. [jayahiī ya ēsa ti] na
ya uvāyannuṇō purisassa dāruṇattaṁ pi saṁbhavaï.

tahā jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ pahavaï ya sayā aṇivāriyapasarō maccu tti, ēyaṁ pi bālavayaṇa
yētaṁ; jēṇa nikkhantassa vi ēsa aṇivāriyappasarō cēva, tēṇa vi ya samaṇēṇa pajjantē mariyavvaṁ ti.

na ya pajantē mariyavvaṁ ti
masāṇē cēvāvatthāṇamukvanna.
na ya santē vi paralōē dukkhasēvaṇāō muhaṁ, avi ya suhasēvaṇāō cēva.

jaō jaṁ cēva abbhasijjaï,
tassēva pagarisō lōē diṭṭhō, na uṇa vivajaō tti.
ahavā na juttaṁ bhayavaō samakkhaṁ mama jaṁpiuṁ.
tā bhayavaṁ cēva ettha bhaṇissaï ti.

taō bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — bhō mahāmāhaṇa!
suṇa.

jaṁ taē bhaṇiya, jahā kēṇa tumaṁ payāriō ti, ēsa jammantarambhatthakusalabhāvaṇābhāviyamaī appāvaraṇasaṁjuō vīyarāgavayaṇā
vibhūyakhaōvasamabhāvēṇa samuppannatattanāṇō jahaṭṭhiyaṁ bhavasahāyamavayujjhiūṇa tō virattō, na uṇa kēṇaï vippayāriō tti.

tahā jaṁ
ca bhaṇiyaṁ — na khalu ettha pañcabhūyavaïrittō paralōgagāmī jīvō samatthīyaï, avi ya ēyāṇi cēva bhūyāṇi.

sahāvaō cēva ēyappagārapari
ṇāmapariṇayāṇi jīvō tti bhaṇṇanti, ēyaṁ pi na juttisaṁgayaṁ.

tā kahaṁ imāṇaṁ ēyappagārapari
ṇāmapariṇayāṇa vi ēsā pañcakkhapamāṇāṇubhūyamāṇā gamaṇāiceṭṭhānibandhaṇā cēyaṇā jujjaï tti.

na hi jaṁ jēsu pattēyaṁ na vijaē, taṁ
tēsiṁ samudaē vi havaï, jahā vālugāthāṇaē tellaṁ.

aha pattēyaṁ pi imāṇi cēyaṇāṇi tti, taō siddhamaṇēgavēyannasamudaō purisō,
ēgindiyā ya jīvā, ghaḍādīṇaṁ ca cēyaṇataṇaṁ ti.

aō atthi khalu paścabhūyavaïrittō cēyaṇāsvō para
lōgagāmī jīvō tti.

taō ya ja bhaṇiyaṁ — jayā ēyāṇi caïūṇa samudayaṁ pañcattamuvagacchanti, tayā maō purisō tti abhihāṇaṁ
pavattaï, ēyaṁ pi vayaṇamettaṁ cēva.
na yāṇubhūyamāṇasarūvā cēva cēyaṇā nisēhiuṁ pārīyaï.

tahā jaṁ
ca bhaṇiyaṁ — na uṇa ettha kōi dēhaṁ caïūṇa ghaḍaciḍaō viva parabhavaṁ gacchaï tti, ēyaṁ pi aō cēva paḍisiddhaṁ vēiyavvaṁ, cēyaṇassa
acēyaṇabhēyāō ti.

tahā jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ — tā mā tuma asantē vi paralōē micchābhiṇivēsabhāviyamaī sahāvasundaraṁ visayasuhaṁ
paricayasu, daṁsēhi vā mē dēhavaïrittaṁ dēhiṇa', ettha vi ya suṇa-cēyannabhēyasiddhīē kahaṁ natthi paralōgō? vijamāṇē ya tammi kaha
ēyassa micchābhiṇivēsō? kahaṁ ca pamugaṇasāhāraṇā viḍambaṇāmettarūvā cintāyāsabahulā maṇanivvāṇavēriṇō avinnāyavī
sambhasuhasarūvā sahāvasundarā visaya tti, kiṁ ca tēhiṁtō suhaṁ? jaṁ puṇa sō dēhabhinnō na dīsaï, ettha kāraṇaṁ suṇa-muhumō
aṇindiō ya sō vattaē, aō na dīsaï tti.

lg.l: siddhā passanti savvannū nāṇasiddhā ya sāhuṇō

p.s: ēvaṁ ca paryapirapi vijayasiṁhāyariē īsi vihasiūṇa bhaṇiya piṅgakēṇa-bhayavaṁ! savvamasaṁbaddhamēva bhaṇiyaṁ bhayavayā.

kahaṁ? suṇa
jaṁ tāva bhaṇiyaṁ — savvahā acēyaṇāṇi bhūyāgi, tā kahaṁ imāṇaṁ ēyappagārapariṇāmapariṇayāṇa vi ēsā paccakkhappamāṇāṇubhūyamāṇā
gamaṇāiceṭṭānibandhaṇā cēyaṇā jujjaï tti na hi jaṁ jēsu pattēyaṁ na vijjaē taṁ tēsi samudaē vi havaï, jahā vālugāthāṇagē tellaṁ,
ēyaṁ kahaṁ jujjaï tti? na hi kāraṇāṇurūvamēva kajja bhavaï.

kiṇṇa hōi siṅgāō sarō? kiṁ vā adissaparamāṇunippannaṁ ghaḍāi dessaṁ
ti? ēvaṁ cēyaṇā vi takajā ya bhavissaï, bhūyavilakkhaṇā ya tti kō virōhō? jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ — aha pattēyaṁ pi imāṇi
cēyaṇāṇi tti, taō siddhamaṇēyacēyannasamudaō purisō, ēgindiyā ya jīvā ghaḍādīṇaṁ ca cēyaṇa tti iccetramādi, taṁ pi na sōhaṇaṁ.
tēsiṁ cēva tahāvihapariṇāmabhāvaō, tadabhāvaō cetra na ghaḍādīṇaṁ ca cēyaṇa tti.

bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — suṇa, jaṁ bhaṇiya— kiṇṇa hōi siṅgāō sarō ti?, sō hōi, na uṇa kāraṇāṇaṇurūvō, iyarasaravilakṣaṇa
masiṇa-ghaṇa-laṇhāitaddhammasaṁkamāō tti.
aha manasē, na sō visēsō vahārijaï ti.

atthi tāva sō iyarasarahēusiṅgāṇamabhēyappa
saṁgaō, visēsāvahāraṇē ujjamō kāyanbō tti.
na hi ayaṁ thāṇussa abarāhō, jamandhō na parassaï tti.

jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ — adessaparamāṇu
nippannaṁ ghaḍāi dessa ti, ēyaṁ pi na juttikkhamaṁ.
jaō na ēgantēṇa addēsā paramāṇavō, jōgidaṁsaṇāō kajadaṁsaṇāō ya.

na ya
ēvaṁ bhūyadhammasaṁkramō cēyaṇāē tti, ayaṁ pi aō cēṣa paḍisiddhaṁ cēiyavvaṁ, cēyaṇaspa acēyaṇabhēyāō tti.

aha manasē, sattālakkhaṇa
dhammasaṁkamāō na dōsō tti.

taō saṁgayaṁ cēva maē bhaṇiyaṁ
ti.
tahā jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ — tahāvihapariṇāmābhāvāō cēva na ghaḍādīṇaṁ cēyaṇa tti.

eltha natthi pamāṇa; bhūyasamudayavaïrittapariṇāmabbhu
vagamē ya annābhihāṇō jīvanbhuvagamō ti.
taō saviliyaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ piṅgakēṇa-bhayavaṁ! jaï ēvaṁ aṇindiyaguṇō jīvō, tā sarīrāō vibhinnō.

ēvaṁ ca hontagē mama
piyāmahō mahupiṅgō nāma, sō aṇēyasattasaṁghāyaṇaraō āsi tti.

mamōvari aïsiṇēha
saṁgaō ya āsi, ihalōyākaraṇijanivāraṇasīlō ya.
tā kahaṁ sō taōṁ narayāō āgacchiūṇa diṭṭhavivāgō vimaṁ na nivārēi.

bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — suṇa, jahā mahāvarāhayārī, tikkhanaravaïsamāēsagahiō, rōdēhiṁ cārayapurisēhiṁ lōhasaṅkalānibaddha dēhō, ghōrandhayāra
cārayanivāsī, paratantaō suppiyaṁ pi sayaṇaṁ dalr̥ pi na lahaē, kimaṅga puṇāṇusāsiuṁ? ēvamēva tē nāragā pamāyāvarāhakāriṇō
tivvayarakammapariṇāmagahiyā caṇḍēhiṁ nirayapālēhiṁ vajjasaṅkalānibaddhadēhā tibandhayāraduruttaranarayanivāsiṇō kammaparatantā kaha
niksamiu lahanti, jēṇa dēvāṇuppiyaṁ aṇusāsenti.

lg.l: nirayāuē ajhīṇē nikkhamiuṁ nō lahanti naragāō

p.s: piṅgakēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — bhayavaṁ! jaï ēvaṁ, tā mamaṁ cēva piyā sōmapiṅgō nāma, sō accantaparalōyabhīrū, pāṇavahāiviraō, akasā.
yasīlō, aṇēgajāgayārī pacchā ya samaṇavayaṁ ghettaṇa kaści kālaṁ parivāliya maō.
sō ya tuha daṁsaṇēṇa niyamēṇa dēvēsu upavanō.
dhammaṁ ca mē dēsiyavvaṁ ti bhaṇiyamāsī.

tā kahaṁ sō aparatantō vi samāṇō ihāgacchiūṇa maṁ na
paḍivōhēi.

bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — suṇa, jahā nāma kōi daridapurisō, hīṇanāikularuṣō kvasāyaṁ kāūṇa gahiyakalākalāvō dēsantaramuva
gantūṇa tappasāyaō kahiṁci pattarajō, kayavivihasundarīpariggahō, mahānarindapūiō, saṁjāyāṇēgasundarāvaccō, mahāsokkhasāgarāva
gāḍhō na sumaraē lajjāvaṇijjassa kukalatta-puttabhaṇḍagasta, ēvaṁ cēva tē dēvā maṇuyattaṇamasāraṁ mannamāṇā dhammavavasāyaṁ kāūṇa gaïhiyaparalō
gakalākalāvā surālayaṁ pāviūga puvvasukayapasāyaō dēviḍḍi pāviūṇa tiyasamundarīpariyariyā, mahāṇēgadēvagaṇapūiyā, samuppannāṇēyara
inibandhaṇā, accantaraïsāgarāvagāḍhā na sumaranti vimaṇuyabhāvassa, kimaṅga puṇa āgacchanti? tā kahaṁ samaṇusāsaïnti? bhaṇiyaṁ ca—

piṅgakēṇa bhaṇiya-bhayavaṁ! jaï ēēṇa hēuṇā nāgacchanti, dēhabhinnō ya jīvō, tā imaṁ iha nayaravattaṁ cetra sabalōyapaccakkhaṁ
virujjhaï.

bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — kahēhi, kiṁ taṁ narakātaṁ ti? piṅgakēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — muṇa, ettha nayarē ēgēṇa takkarēṇa naravaïbhaṇḍāyāraṁ
muhamāsī.
sō ya kahaṁci niggacchamāṇō gahiō niuttapurisēhiṁ.
taō sō vahaniuttēṇa lōhakumbhīē pakkhittō pavikhaviūṇa ya ṭhaïyā lōhakumbhī.
na diṭṭhō suhumō vi sē niggamaṇamaggō tti.

aō avagacchāmō, na annō
jīvō tti.
bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — bhadda! jaṁ kiṁci ēvaṁ ti.

suṇa, ihēgammi nayarē ēgō saṅigō vināṇapagarisaṁ saṁpattō sīhadārē vi saṅkha
dhamentō savvanayaranaṇassa kaṇṇē vi ya dhamēi.

rāiṇā
bhaṇiyaṁ — kahaṁ mama ṭhaïyaduvārē vi vāsaharaē pavisaï tti? tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — natthi sē paḍighāō tti.

taō rāiṇā asaddahantēṇa sō
purisō sasaṅkhagō cēva uḍiyāē pakkhittō, vuttō ya vāējasi saṅkha. ṭhaïyā uḍḍiyā jaüsārīkayā ya.
viniggaō sē saddō, ubaladdhō rāiṇā nāyarēhiṁ.

ēvaṁ ihāvi bhavē, kō virōhō tti?
piṅgakēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — bhaya! na ēvamēyaṁ ti.

ihēvēgō takarajuvāṇaō mittēṇa mēṁ kāladaṇḍavāmiēṇa mama vayaṇāō tulāē
tōliūṇa galakaramōḍapaṇa vāvāiō.
sō ya puṇō vi tōliō jāva jattiō sajīvō, tattiō ajīvō vi.

aō avagacchāmō,
na annō jīvō; annahā ūṇagarūvō hontō tti.

suṇa, ihē gēṇaṁ gōvālēṇa vāyabhariō batthi
puḍagō tulāē tōlāviō, rikō puṇō vi tōlāviō, jāva jattiō bhariō, tattiō rikkō vi.
aha ya annō taō vāō tti.
aha mannasē, sō maṇāgaṁ uṇagō tti.
ēvaṁ ca hontagē iyarammi vi samō pasaṅgō.
piṅgakēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — bhaya! na ēvamēyaṁ ti.

suṇa,
ihēva nayarē mittēṇa mē kāladaṇḍavāsiēṇa mama vayaṇāō ēgassa takarassa sarīrayaṁ saṁvattuvvattaya karentēṇa vi maggiō jīvō, na ya
diṭṭō.
taō sē sarīraya khaṇḍakhaṇḍāī karentēṇa puṇō vi maggiō, na ya dihō tti.

bhayavayā
bhaṇiyaṁ — bhadda! jaṁ kiṁci ēyaṁ.
suṇa, ihēgēṇa maṇussēṇa araṇiṁ saṁvattuvvattayaṁ karentēṇa vi maggiō aggī, na ya diṭṭhō.

tō tēṇa
araṇiṁ khaṇḍakhaṇḍāī karentēṇa puṇō vi mangiō, na ya diṭṭhō tti.

tā kiṁ sō na tammi atthi tti? aha mannasē natthi tti,
ēvaṁ taō aṇuppāyapasaṅgō.

ēvaṁ ca bhaṇiē uttarappayāṇābhāvēṇa viliyamiva piṅgakaṁ pecchiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ bhayavayā-tā ēvaṁ rukkhasāhāpayalaṇanimittapavaṇō
vva adissamāṇō vi cakkhuṇā sarīracēvānimittabhūō jīvō atthi tti saddhēyaṁ.

hanta!
jīvō vi cittacēyaṇāiṁdhammāṇuha vēṇa gheppaï ti.
cittaṁ cēyaṇa sannā vinnāṇaṁ dhāraṇā ya buddhī ya.
īhā maī viyakā jīvassa u lakkhaṇā ēē.

ēvaṁ ca hontaē jaṁ tumaē bhaṇiyamāsi, jahā — dullahaṁ khalu ēyaṁ māṇusattarṇa ti, ēyamasaṁbaddhaṁ cēva jō
na taṁ sukayadukkhāṇubhāvēṇa labhaï, avi ya bhūyapariṇaīō tti, aō kimiyamāulattaṇaṁ tti, ēyamajutta.

na hi paralōgagāmuē jīvē
vijamāṇē cēva ēvaṁ samatthadhammārambhasāhagaṁ māṇusattaṇaṁ bhūyapariṇaïmettalabhaṁ ti.

tahā jaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ — aṇiccā piyajaṇasamāgama tti,
ēyaṁ pi akāraṇaṁ, jō na tē nikkhantāṇaṁ pi annahā honti, ēvaṁ pi na sōhaṇaṁ; jō nikkhantāṇamiha muṇīṇaṁ piyā-piyaviyappō
cēva natthi tti.

tahā jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ — cañcalāō riddhīō tti, ēyassa vi na nikkhamaṇaṁ caïva paḍivakkhō, avi ya uvāraṇa parirakkhaṇaṁ
ti, ēyaṁ pi bālavayaṇasarisaṁ cēva.

jaō na dhammamēva mottūṇaṁ annō parirakkhaṇōvāō, asārāō ya imāō davariddhīō aṇēyasattā
vayāriṇīō ya.
tahājaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ — kusumasāraṁ jovvaṇaṁ ti, ettha vi ya rasāyaṇaṁ juttaṁ, na puṇō nikkhamaṇaṁ ti, ēvaṁ pi na saṁgayaṁ.
jaō na nikkhamaṇadhammasāhaṇarasāyaṇāō paramatthacintāē annaṁ rasāyaṇaṁ ti.

tahā jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ — paralōyapaccatthiō aṇaṅgō tti,
ēyaṁ pi na sōhaṇaṁ; jō paralōō cēva natthi, na ya kōi tō āgantūṇamappāṇayaṁ daṁsēi, ēvamavi ya pariyappaṇē aïppasaṅgō tti,
ēyaṁ pi hu asāraṁ.

vicittakiriyāṇuhava-jāissaraṇōvalambhatakahiyapaccayā vijamāṇuppāyāisiddhō kahaṁ paralōō cēva natyi?
appāṇayādasaṇē ya bhaṇiyaṁ kāraṇaṁ.

taha jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ — dāruṇō visayavivāgō ti, ēyaṁ pi na juttisaṁgaya; jaō āhārassa vivāgō
dāruṇō cēva, ēvaṁ ca bhōyaṇamavi paricaïyavvaṁ na ya hariṇā vijanti tti javā cēva na vuppanti tti, na ya uvāyannuṇō purisassa dāru
ṇattaṁ pi saṁbhavaï tti ēvaṁ pi aṇālōiyavayaṇaṁ.
jaō savvaṁ cēva saṁsāriyaṁ vatthu vivāgadāruṇaṁ ti.

taṁ ca kamēṇa vajijjaē, ahippēō ya
pavvajāphalaṁ saṁsārakkhaō cēva tti.
na ya bandhuparivajaṇēṇa visayaparibhōgō tīraï tti.
aō cciya na tēsu dāruṇattaṁ pi saṁbhavaï tti.

taha jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ — pahavaï sayā aṇivāriyapasarō maccu tti, ēyaṁ pi bālavayaṇamettaṁ ti; jēṇa nikkhantassa vi ēsa anivāriyapasarō
cēva; na ya pajantē mariyavvaṁ ti masāṇē cēvāvatthāṇamuvavannaṁ, na ya santē vi paralōē dukkhasēvaṇāō suhaṁ, avi ya suhasēvaṇāō cēva,
jaō jaṁ cēva anbhasijjaï tassēva pagarisō lōra diṭṭhō na uṇa vivajjaē ti, tā virama ēyāō vavasāyāō tti, ēyaṁ pi muddhajaṇa
mōhaṇaṁ.

nikkhamaṇassa hi phalaṁ jamhā jammābhāvajaṁ nivāṇaṁ, nivvāṇa
pattassa ya imassa jīvassa na jammō, na jarā, na vāhī, na maraṇaṁ, na iṭṭhaviōgō, na aṇisaṁpaōgō, na bubhukkhā, na pivāsā, na
rāgō, na dōsō, na kōhō, na māṇō, na māyā, na lōhō, na bhayaṁ, na ya annō vi kōi uvaddayō tti, kiṁ tu samvannū savvadarisī niruvama
suhasaṁpannō tilōyacūḍāmaṇībhūō mokkhapaē ciṭṭhaï.
aō kahaṁ tattha maccuṇō pasarō? na ya apayaṭṭakajjārambhō purisō phalaṁ sāhēi.

kahaṁ ca païsamayamēva maraṇābhibhūyāṇaṁ kāpurisāṇaṁ tassa paḍiyāramacintayantāṇaṁ avatthāṇaṁ pasaṁsijjaï? aō na ya pajjantēmariyavvaṁ
ti masāṇē cēvāvatthāṇamuvavanna ti pahasaṇappāyaṁ.

na ya sayalasaṅgacāīṇa vīyarāgavayaṇēṇa kammakkhaüjjayāṇaṁ pariṇayacarittabhāvaṇāṇaṁ
samaṇāṇaṁ jaṁ muhaṁ, taṁ cakkavaṭṭiṇō vi na jujjaï tti.

bhaṇiyaṁ ca bhayavayā-"iha khalu saṁsārē na savahā muhamatthi, aṇabhinnāyasuhasa
rūvā ya ettha pāṇiṇō, kammasaṁjōē dukkhaṁ tannivittī muhaṁ, ājāī dukkhaṁ tannivittī suhaṁ, jarā dukkhaṁ tannivittī suha, icchā
dukkhaṁ tannivittī muhaṁ, piyaṁ dukkhaṁ tannivittī muhaṁ, saṁkilē sē dukkhaṁ tannivittī suhaṁ, maraṇaṁ dukkhaṁ tannivittī suhaṁ, 3.ṇāikamma
saṁjōgaō ṇaṁ imē pāṇiṇō aṇabhinnā ya suhasarūvassa tti bēmi.

sē jahā nāma kēi purisā ājāirōgakhettuppannā ājāirōgagahiyā adidvārōgapurisāiyā āmaraṇaṁ tabbhāvā aṇabhinnā ārogga
suhasarūvassa, ēvaṁ cēva samaṇāusō! aṇāiapajjavasāṇāvaṭṭakhettavāsī imē pāṇiṇō tti.

jēṇa daṭṭhūṇa vi ya ṇaṁ jahā tē arōgi
purisaṁ tēsu tēsu rōgipurisāṇukūlēsu samāyārēsu avaṭṭamāṇaṁ savvarōganigdhāyaṇi kiriyamaṇusāsayantaṁ atthēgē païussanti, atthēgē
uvahasanti, atthēgē avahīranti, atthēgē suṇanti, atthēgē na pariṇāmenti, atthēgē pariṇāmenti, atthēgē nāṇuciṭṭhanti, atthēgē
aṇuciṭṭhanti, atthēgē sajhaṁ virāhentiatthēgē kicchasajhaṁ virānti, atthēgē na virāhentiḥ avirāhaṇāē ya ṇaṁ atthi kēi saba
dukkhavimokkhaṁ karenti, karettā tabbhāvaṁ viuṭṭanti, taō aïkkantatabhāvē khalu ayaṁ purisē'viyaha abhinnāyāroggasuhasarūvē bhavaï,
samaṇapariṇāmagāmī vi aviyaṭṭamabhinnāyāroggasuhasakhyā bhavanti, ēvamēva samaṇāusō! āvaṭṭakhettavāsī imē pāṇiṇō daṭṭhūṇa vi
ya ṇaṁ bhāvāroggapurisaṁ tēsu tēsu kammasaṁjōgāīdukkhagahiyapurisāṇukūlēsu samāyārēsu aṭṭamāṇaṁ tadukkhanigyāyaṇi kiriya
maṇusāsayantaṁ atthēgē (jāva-) aviyaṭṭamabhinnāyāroggasuhasarūvā bhavanti, na puṇa annahati.
aō na dukkhasēvaṇaṁ sāhukiriyā, avi ya suhaṁ cēva.

lg.l: jaṁ pāvaï muttisuhaṁ kattō taṁ cakkavaṭṭī vi?

p.s: aō suhasēvaṇāō cēva suhapayarisō tti savvaṁ cēvōvavannaṁ ti.

etthantarammi āgandavāhajalabhariyalōyaṇēṇaṁ niyaḍiyahiya
yasabbhāvaṁ pavaṭṭamāṇasammattapariṇāmēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ bambhayattēṇa-bhayavaṁ! ēvamēyaṁ, na annaha tti.

bhāviō tēṇa jiṇadēsiō dhammō,
pavanna sammattaṁ, cintiyaṁ ca vigayasammōhaṁ — ahō! mē suyassa sōhaṇō vavasāō ti.

piṅgakēṇa vi ya pavanamuhapariṇāmēṇaṁ cēva
bhaṇiyaṁ — bhaya! ēvamēyaṁ ti.
aha kahaṁ puṇa puṇṇa-pāvāṇaṁ visēsō lakkhijjaï? bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — suṇa, paccakkhaṁ cēva—

lg.l: ekkē pūrenti maṇōrahāi jaṁ maggirāṇa pagatīṇaṁ
annē puṇa paragharahiṇḍaṇēṇa kucchi pi na bharenti
iya puṇṇā-puṇṇaphalaṁ pañcakkhaṁ cēva dīsaī lōē
taha vi jaṇō rāgandhō dhammammi aṇāyaraṁ kuṇaï
pugaṇēṇa mahāsōvakhā cakkī dēvā ya siddhigāmī ya

p.s:
piṅgakēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — bhayavaṁ! ēvamēyaṁ aha kiṁ puṇa puṇṇakāraṇaṁ, pāvakāraṇaṁ vā aṇuṭāṇaṁ ti? bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — suṇa, puṇṇakāraṇaṁ
tāva sayalapāṇivaha-musāvāyā-’dattādāṇa-mēhuṇa-pariggahāṇa viraī, nisibhattavajjaṇaṁ, rāgadōsādiniggahō ya.

pāvakāraṇaṁ puṇa iṇa
mēva vivarīyaṁ ti.
taō ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa pavannō sāvayadhamma samaṁ bambhadattēṇa piṅgakō.

bhaṇiyaṁ ca bambhadattēṇa-bhaya! ēsa mē sihi
kumārō suō hōivavasiō ya ēsō mahāpurisōciē aṇuṭāṇē.

aṇumayaṁ ca mē saṁpaya mimaṁ ēyassa vavasiyaṁ, tā kiṁ ēyassa aṇu
ṭṭhāṇassa uciō, aṇuciō tti vā? bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ — na rayaṇāyarappasūrya rayaṇaṁ paḍibandhassa aṇuciyaṁ.

taō harisavasuppulaïyaṅgēṇa
karēu ēsa imaṁ mama pi maṇōrahagōyaraṁ ti cintiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ bambhayattēṇa-vaccha! aṇunnāō maē tumaṁ karēhi tavasaṁjamujjōyaṁ ti.
taō saharisaṁ paṇamiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ sihikumārēṇa-tāya! aṇuggihīō mhi.

vambhayattēṇa vi ya
davāviyamāghōsaṇāpubdhayaṁ mahādāṇaṁ, karāviyā jiṇāyayaṇāīsu aāhiyā mahimā.

taō pasatthē tihi-karaṇa-muhutta-jōgē mahayā
pamōēṇa, divāra vibhūīē, pariyariō rāyanāyaraēhi, divaṁ siriyamārūḍhō, vajantēhiṁ maṅgalatūrasaṁghāēhi, pasaṁsijjamāṇō vibuhalō
ēṇaṁ, sadukkhamālōrajjamāṇō purasundarī hiṁ, dentō jahāsamīhiyaṁ atthijaṇāṇa dāṇaṁ niggaō nayarāō sihikumārō.
guruṇā vi kaē āvassaē taṁ vāmapāsē ṭhariūṇa vandiyā paramaguravō.
taō vihivandaṇaṁ dāūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ mihikumārēga-icchākārēṇa pabyāvēha.

taō guruṇā icchāmō tti bhaṇiūṇa namōkārapāḍhēṇa vihi
puvvayaṁ appiyaṁ sē syaharaṇaṁ sāhuliṅgaṁ ti.
taō icchāmō tti bhaṇiūṇa namōkārapuvvayaṁ atuṭṭāō guruṇā gahiyāō tiṇi aṭṭhāō.

taō vandiūṇa guruṁ, bhaṇiyaṁ
sihikumārēṇa-icchākārēṇa sāmāiyaṁ mē ārōvēha.

icchāmō tti bhaṇiṇa tadārotraṇanimittaṁ samaṁ sihi kumārēṇa kaō ṇēṇa kāussa
ggō, cintiō thaō, pāriō namōkārēṇa.

taō namōkārapuvyayaṁ tiṇṇi vārāō kaḍiyaṁ sāmāiyaṁ, mahāsaṁvēgasāraṁ aṇukaḍviyaṁ
sihikumārēṇa.
taō gahiyā guruṇā vāsā, dinnā paramagurupāēma, tahā sannihiyāṇaṁ sāhumādīṇa ya.

etthantarammi vandiūṇa gurūṁ
bhaṇiyaṁ sihikumārēṇa-saṁdisaha, kiṁ bhaṇāmi? guruṇā bhaṇiyaṁ — vandittu pavēēha.

taō vandiūṇa jaṁpiyamaṇēṇa-tumbhēhiṁ mē sāmāi
yamārōviyaṁ, icchāmi aṇusa (si) ḍiṁ ti.

taō vandiūṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ sihikumārēṇaṁ-tubbhaṁ pavēiyaṁ, saṁdisaha, sāhūṇaṁ pavēēmi.

taō vandiūṇa namōkārapāḍhēṇa kayaṁ payā
hiṇamaṇēṇa.
nitthāragapāragō guruguṇēhi baḍḍāhi tti bhaṇamāṇēhi dinnā gurumādīhiṁ vāsā.
āyariyassa ya nisaṇṇassa, kayaṁ niruddhaṁ, aṇusāsiō guruṇā.

ēvaṁ pavanō imassa pāyamūlē visujjha
māṇēṇaṁ pariṇāmēṇaṁ jiṇōvadiṭṭhēṇaṁ vihiṇā sayaladukkhaparamōsahi mahāpavvajja ti.
ahiṇandiō āṇandabāhanalabhariyalōyaṇēṇaṁ rāiṇā bambhayattēṇaṁ nayarajaṇavaēṇa ya.

aō kaïvayadiyahē tatthā''siūṇa samattē
māsakappē gaō bhagavayā saha khettantarammi.
ēvaṁ ca niraïyāraṁ sāmaṇṇamaṇuvālentassa aïkantā aṇēgē varisalakkhā.
hā! duṭhṭha maē vavasiyaṁ, jēṇa ēsō avāvāviō cēva niggaō tti.

tā pēsēmi sē pēsalavayaṇasāraṁ saṁdēsaya
puvvayaṁ kiṁci uvāyaṇaṁ, jēṇa ēsō puṇō vi kahaṁci ihāgacchaï, tō vāvāissaṁ ti.

gaō ya sō dēsavikkhāyāyariyapaüttipucchaṇēṇaṁ tamālasagnivēsasaṁṭhiyassa sihi
kumārassa (samīvaṁ).
diṭṭhō ya tēṇa paccuccāraēṇa sāhūṇa suttatthamaṇu māsayantō sihikumārō.

dhammalāhiō
kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — amba! aṇāyārō khu ēsō samaṇāṇaṁ, jaṁ mottūṇa mahuyaravitti ēgapiṇḍabhōyaṇaṁ ti.
ēvaṁ ca sō païdiṇaṁ sē karēi dhammadēsaṇaṁ.

cintēi ya jāliṇī ēyassa māraṇōvāē, na yāvaḍaï kōi muhumō uvāō
tti.

jaï kahaṁci
kallaṁ na ēsa vāvāijjaï, taō gamissaï pakkhasandhīē.
na ettha annō kōi uvāō; tā karēūṇa kaṁsāraṁ tālapuḍasaṁjuyaṁ cēgaṁ visamō.
yagaṁ gōsē uvaṇēmi ēyāṇaṁ, nibandhaō ya bhujāvissāmi ētē.
taō sahatthaparivēsaṇēṇaṁ tammōyagappayāṇēṇaṁ vāvāissaṁ ima ti.
gayā gōsē cēva bhōyaṇaṁ ghettūṇa tamujāṇaṁ jāliṇī.

diṭṭhā sihikumāraṇa, bhaṇiyā ya tēṇaṁ-amba! kimē
gāgiṇī kiṁpi aṇuciyaṁ ghettūṇa āgayā si?.
jāliṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ — jāya! attaṇō cēva puṇṇāhilāsiṇī tumhāṇa bhōyaṇaṁ ti.

sihi
kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — amba! ēsō vi khu aṇāyārō caïva samaṇāṇaṁ, jamāhākaḍaṁ āhaḍaṁ ca mujjaē tti.

taō tīē
bhaṇiyaṁ — jāya! na annahā mē hiyayanivuī hōi, aphalaṁ ca mannēmi asaṁpāiē imammi jāyassa āgamaṇaṁ.

tā avassaṁ taē imaṁ kāyavaṁ
ti bhaṇiūṇa nivaḍiyā calaṇēsu.

tō ya ujjuyasahāvaō pecchaha, sē dhammasaḍḍhā jāyasiṇēhō ya, tā mā sē vipariṇāmō bhavissaï
tti, tō gurulāghavamālōciūṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ sihikumārēṇa amba! jaṁ tuma bhaṇasi tti.

kiṁ tu na tumaē puṇō vi sāhunimittamārambhō
kāyayō.
jāliṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ — jāya! ēvaṁ jaṁ tuma bhaṇasi tti.

sihikumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — jaï ēvaṁ, tō dēhi ēyassa sāhuṇō bhōyaṇajāyaṁ,
taō bhunissāmi tti.
jāliṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ — jāya! daṁsiyaṁ cēva tumaē māivacchalattaṇaṁ, tā kiṁ imiṇā, mama hatthāō bhottavvaṁ ti.
sihikumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — amba! ēvaṁ āgacchaü pāraṇagavēla tti.

dinnō ya bhuttasēsakāsārasaṁgaō
cēva kumārassa tālapuḍalaḍḍuō, bhuttō ya tēgaṁ.
cintiyaṁ tēṇa kimēyaṁ ti? palōiyā ya sāhuṇō, jāva satthā ciṭṭhanti.

ēvaṁ ca jāva thēvā vēlā
aïkamaï, tāva paṇaṭā sē vāyā.
cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ-nūṇaṁ na bhavimsāmi tti.
cintiyaṁ ca tēhi-kimēyaṁ akajjaṁ jaṇaṇīē sē kvasiyaṁ bhavissaï?

lg.l: ghārijantō ya tō visēṇa kāūṇamaṇasaṇaṁ vihiṇā
paricintiuṁ payattō hanta! apuvaṁ kimēyaṁ ti?
jāva na saṁpanna miṇaṁ samīhiyaṁ avigalaṁ apuṣṇassa
taha pāḍiyā ya ēsā pamāyaō ayasapammi
saṅkissaï ya aṇajō lōō etyaṁ asaṅkaṇijjaṁ pi
ahavā ēvaṁviha ēva ēsa pāvō ti saṁsārō
pāventi ayasapay kēvi hu akaē vi ettha dōsammi
parabhavaniyāṇaō cciya kēi na pāventi hu kaē vi
jaṁ cittā kammagaī tā ēyaṁ ciya imīē pacchittaṁ
ahavā na sōyaṇijjā saṁpayamēsā vi jīvalōyammi
aha pañca namōkāraṁ saṁpaï ki sēsacintāē
iyarī vi kālasēsaṁ gamiuṁ mariūṇa sakkarappahāē

div.head: caütthō bhavō

p.s:
atthi ihēva jambuddīvē dīvē bhārahē vāsē sōhammasuralōyapaḍicchandayabhūyaṁ niccussavāṇandapamuiyamahājaṇaṁ avirayapavattapeccha
ṇayasōhiyaṁ surasariyāsalilaniddhōyapērantaṁ susammanaparaṁ nāma puravaraṁ tuliyasurasundarīyaṇalaḍa hattaṇarūbavēsavihavāhiṁ paüraṅgaṇāhiṁ
kaliyaṁ mayaraddhayapaḍāyāhi.

lg.l: jattha purisāṇa vaggō vahaï jahatthaṁ niyaṁ nāma

p.s:
tassa bahumaō savvanayarēka seṭṭhī dīṇāṇāhakiviṇajaṇavacchalō bandhavaku
