hassa samihiyayāē sāmiṇō alliyaṇiyāvavaēsēṇa asāhiūṇa kumārassa samāradō samaṁtaharō (samarō).

visamayāē
duggassa pīḍi jamāṇaṁ pi kumārasennaṁ abhaggamāṇapasaraṁ ti ahiyayaramāḍhattaṁ jujjhiuṁ.
iṭṭhā ya mē kulaüttayā, na bahumaō tēsiṁ nāsō.
appō ya ēsō viggahō bhuttō ya tāēṇaṁ ṭhiō saṁbandhipakkhē.
tā na juttagayaṁmi ēgapaē pōrusaṁ daṁsēuṁ.
aō mama sarīradōhayāē sāviyā tumbhē, jahā puṇō vi ērisa na kāyavvaṁ ti.
etthantaraṁmi kahaṁci paribhamantō samāgaō tamuddēsa vāṇamantarō.
ahō sē dhīraharuthayā, na tīraē ēsa amhārisēhiṁ vāvāiuṁ.

tā ēya
sāmiṇō sahāyattaṇēṇa avagarēmi ēyassa tti.
cintiūṇa diṭṭō ya ṇēṇa pāsāyatalasaṁṭhiō viggahō.

vēriō vi ya mē ēsa durāyāraguṇacandō, na
sakkuṇōmi ēyassa uyayaṁ pecchiuṁ.
addhavāvāiō ya chuṭṭō mahaṁ ēsa aojjhāē sanibhōgavāvaḍattaṇa.

diṭṭhō na antarālē, diṭṭhō ya
saṁpayaṁ malayapatthiēṇa.

jaï ēvaṁ, tā
thēvami yaṁ kāraṇaṁ.
nēhi mēṁ aja rayaṇīē guṇacandasamīvaṁ, jēṇa ajjēta samāmi viggahaṁ ti.
sāyattamēyaṁ, tō payaṅgavittikālō cetra ēsō tti.
saṁpahāriūṇa saha pahāṇapariyaṇēṇaṁ ṭhiō gamaṇasajjō viggahō.

bhō bhō guṇacanda, maē saha viggahaṁ
kāūṇa vīsatyō suvasi.
tā uṭṭhēhi saṁpayaṁ, kērēhi haïtthiyāraṁ ti.

sāhu, sāhu bhō vigāha, sāhu, sōhaṇō tē vavasāō ti bhaṇa
māṇō uhiō kumārō.
etthantaraṁmi imaṁ vaïyaramāyaṇṇiūṇa dhāviyā aṅgarakkhā, nivāriyā kumārēṇa.
bhō bhō sāviyā mama sarīradōhayāē; na ettha annēṇa pahariyavvaṁ.
kiṁ na āvajiyā tumbhē imassa imiṇā vavasāraṇa.

tā
tubbhē cēva ettha viggahasahāsayā, viggahō uga mamaṁ saha imēṇa.

etthantaraṁmi vāṇamantarēṇa arē khuddapurisa, kōisō tuha imiṇā vi
ggahō tti bhaṇamāṇēṇa samāhaō khaggalaṭṭhīē kumārō.
iṇa haṇa ti bhaṇamāṇō ya sapariyaṇō uvaḍiō vigga hō.

taō ukkaḍa yāē puṇgassa pagiṭṭayāra vīriyapariṇaīē duppadharisa
yāē sāmibhāvassa hīṇayāē viggahādīṇaṁ kēsarikisōraraṇa viya bhindiūṇa gaïyapīḍhaṁ vikkhi viya viggahapurisē uvayāri tti adāūṇa
khaggappahāraṁ kēsāya gēṇa pāḍiō vigahō.

etthantaraṁmi kumārapariyaṇēṇa pāḍiyā viggahapurisā, jayaï
kumārō tti samuddhāiō kalayalō.

ahō sē pāvakammassa aṇāulattaṇaṁ, ahō māhappapagarisō,
ahō kayannuyā ahō ēgasārattaṇaṁ; ahō mē ahamnayā, jamēvamavi ēsō na vāvāiō tti.

tā imaṁ ettha tāva pattayālaṁ, jamaojhāuriṁ
gantūṇa nivēēmi ēyassa viṇivāya, jaṇēmi ēyāriyaṇassa sōyaṁ.
ēvamavi kaē samāṇē avagayaṁ cēva ēyassa ti.
iō ya uṭṭhēhi bhō mahāpurisa udvēhi, kuṇasu hathiyāraṁ ti bhaṇiūṇa mukkō kumārēṇa viggahō.

pattē vi vāvāyaṇē na
vāvāiō ti ahiyayaraṁ vāvāiō tti.
ahavā kimettha accharīyaṁ, īisā cēva mahāvīrā havanti.

dēva, kīisā mama mahāṇubhāvayā mahāvīrayā yā kiṁvā
iyāṇi bahuṇā jaṁpiēṇaṁ.

dēu dēvō samāṇattiṁ niyanarindāṇaṁ, vāvārantu mēṁ ēē, pekkhaü ya dēvō mamāvi kāvurisa
ceṭṭhiyaṁ ti.
sōhaṇō kāvurisō, jō ēvamajhavasaï pasuttaṁ ca sattuṁ viṇā pahārēṇa bōhēi.
dinā taē mama pasuttāvāvāyaṇēṇa pāṇā, maē vi bhavaō ēsa visaō ti.

jaï ēvaṁ, tā
annaṁ pi dēvaṁ jāēmi.
sāhīṇaṁ bhavaō, jaṁ maē āyattaṁ ti.

karēu dēvō pasāyaṁ mama ōla
gagāē.
mā ēvaṁ bhaṇa; tāyabhiccō tuma mama jebhāugō.

tā jaï bhavaō vi bahumayaṁ, tā tāyasayāsaṁ cēva gacchasu
tti.

etthantaraṁmi samāgaō tattha bhayavaṁ samataṇamaṇimuttaleṭṭhukaścaṇō dayālū savvajīvēsu aṇuvagiyaparahiyaraō visuddhēhiṁ caühi nā
ṇēhiṁ paḍibōhasamaō guṇacandassa tti viyāṇiūṇa samaniō laddhimantasāhūhiṁ puṣvapariyāyamihilāhivō vijayadhammō nāmāyariō
tti.

dēva, mahātavassī iō nāidūrē tavōvaṇē cihaï ।
ēyaṁ sōūṇa dēvō pamāṇaṁ ti.
gaō tassa candaṇanimittaṁ saha viggahēṇa pahāṇapariyaṇēṇa ya.

lg.l: diṭṭhō ya ṇēṇa tadivasamēva guṇasaṁbhavaṁmi ujāṇē
dhammō va muttimantō āyariō vijayadhammō tti
uyahi ba dhīragaruō sūrō va paṇāsiyākhilatamōhō
candō va sōmalēsō jiṇindavayaṇaṁ va akalakō
daṇa ya taṁ jāō muhapariṇāmō dada kumārassa
paricintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇaṁ ahō ṇu khalu ēsa kayaüṣṇō
tā vandāmi ahamiṇaṁ bhayavantaṁ taha ya pajjuvāsāmi
sāhūṇa daṁsaṇaṁ pi hu niyamā duriyaṁ paṇāsēi
ēvaṁ ca cintiūṇaṁ vihiṇā saha vigahēṇa tō bhayavaṁ
ahivandiō ya ṇēṇaṁ āyariō saparivārō tti
tēṇa vi ya dhammalāhō tassa kaō mokkhasokhalāhassa
upavisasu tti ya bhaṇiō guruṇā caraṇantiē tō tassa
aha vandiūṇa ya guruṁ bhaṇiyamaṇēṇa bhayavaṁ mahantaṁ mē
kōḍaṁ tuha vuttantē kahiō jō saṁpayaṁ tumaē
ōhēṇa maē ēsō tanayarajēṇāu(ṇa) vimhayaṁ daṭṭhuṁ
tē pucchiūṇa nāō tō ya ahamāgēō iyaṁ
tā jaï na antarāyaṁ jāyaï anassa kusalōjōyessa
bhaṇiyamaha kumārēṇaṁ amha vi bhaya aṇuggahō ēsa
kīraü imassa vayaṇaṁ avā bhayavaṁ pamāṇaṁ ti
tō jaṁpiyaṁ bhayavayā nisuṇaha jaï tuma ettha kōḍaṁ ti
atthi iha bharahavāsē mihilā nayarī jaṇaṁmi vikkhāyā
tīē ahamāsi rāyā nāmēṇaṁ vijayadhammō ti
iṭṭhā ya aggamahisī dēvī nāmēṇa candadhamma tti
sā annayā ya sahasā itthīrayaṇaṁ ti kāūṇaṁ
kahiō ya majjha ēsō vuttantō kahavi vijayadēvīē
sōūma ya mōhāō gaōmi ahayaṁ mahāmōha
gahiō ya mahādukkhēṇa taha jahā vikkhiuṁ pi na caēmi
taha dukkhattassa ya mē vōlīṇā tiṇṇi'hōrattā
bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa naravaï kajjēṇa viṇāulō tumaṁ kīsa
mantavihāṇa nimittaṁ naṇu jāyā tuha maē nīyā
kappō ya tattha ēsō jēṇa tumaṁ jāiō na ta paḍhamaṁ
na tīē sīlabhēō jāyaï dēhassa pīḍā vā
tā mā saṁtappa dahaṁ chammāsā āraō tuma taüē
juji si niyamaō iya bhaṇiuṇamadasaṇī jāō
mōhavasayāṇa jē jē ālāvā honti taṁmi kālaṁmi
paricattarajaka jō ḍiō ahaṁ tattha vilavantō
kiṁ bahuṇā nirayasamaṁ majjha tayā dukkhamaṇuhavantassa
jāyā ya mahaṁ cintā anō viya majjha antarappā mē
jāō pasannacittō tā kiṁ puga kāraṇaṁ ettha
gantūṇa bhūmibhāyaṁ thēvaṁ puraō jiṇassa kāūṇa
sayamavi ya jiṇasayāsaṁ jāō aha gamaṇajoggī tti
bhuvaṇaguruṇō vi tāva ya pāraddhaṁ tiyasanāhabhaṇiēhiṁ
mēhakumārēhi taō surahijalaṁ sīyalaṁ pavuṭṭhuṁ ti
sīhāsaṇaṁ ca tassa ya rayaṇamayamahō ya pāyapīḍhaṁ tu
tēhiṁ ciya jayaguruṇō rūvi tavatēyavandraṁ va
iya tiyasē hi viraïē tihuyaṇagāhasta aha samōsaragē
puvadārēṇa tō tatya paviṭhṭhō jiṇō bhayavaṁ
kāūṇa namōkāraṁ tityasta payāhiṇaṁ ca uvaviṭhṭhō
sēsēsu vi tisu pāsēsu bhayavaō tatya tiṇi paḍimāō
pukhadārēṇa pavisiya muṇiṇō taha kappayāsi dēvīō
jōisiyā vantariyā dēvā taha bharaṇavāsī ya
tiya sahi vi jāṇāī maṇirayaṇa vihūsiyāi rammāiṁ
ēvaṁ ca niravasēsa siṭṭhuṁ tattō samāgaraṇa mahaṁ
kallāṇaēṇa navaraṁ dēvī tatva diṭṭa ti
thēvamiha bhūmibhāyaṁ turiyaṁ gantūṇa karibarāu ahaṁ
dārēṇa uttarēṇaṁ diṭṭhō ya jiṇō jaya khāyō
jaya tihuyaṇekkamaṅgala jaya naravara lacchivallaha jiṇinda
jaya guṇarahiya mahāguṇa jaya paramāṇu jaya guru aṇanta
jaya jaya nāha sayaṁbhuva jaya muhuma nirañjaga muṇīsa
gaṇaharapamuhē ya tō namiūgaṁ sāhuṇō samvē
tiyasāīē ya tahiṁ namiūṇa jahārihē sara ṭhāṇē
aha bhayavaṁ pi jiṇavarō niyaṭhāgaṭṭhiyāga sabyasattāṇa
pāvēṇa sayā duhiō muhiō uṇa hōi dhammēṇa
dhammō carittadhammō suyadhammāō taō ya niyamēṇa
kasacchēyatāvasuddhō sō cciya kaṇayaṁ va vinnēō
prāṇajjhayaṇāīṇaṁ jō ya vihī ēsa dhammakasō
bajāṇuṭāṇēṇaṁ jēṇa na vāhijjaï tayaṁ niyamā
sambhavaï ya parisuddhaṁ sō uga dhammami chēō tti
ēēhi jō na suddhō annayaraṁmi va na suṭṭhu nivvaḍiō
sō tārisaō dhammō niyamēṇa phalē visaṁvayaï
ēsō ya uttimō jaṁ purisatthō estha vaściō ṇiyamā
ettha ya apaściō ṇa hi vañcijaï tēsu jēga tēṇēsō
suhumō asēsavisaō sāvajjē jattha atthi paḍisēhō
jaha maṇabaïkāēhi parassa pīḍā dahaṁ na kāyayā
jhāpayatraṁ ca sayā rāgāivipakkha nālaṁ tu
thūlō na samvavisaō sāvajjē jattha hōi paḍi sē hō
rāgāiviuḍaṇa sahaṁ na ya jhāṇāi vi tayāsuddhō
jaha pañcahi bahuēhi vi ēgā hiṁsā musaṁ visaṁvāē
jā dhammiyassa vittī ēyaṁ bajhaṁ aṇudvāṇaṁ
ēēṇa na vāhijjaï saṁbhavaï ya taṁ durga pi niyamēga
ēēga jō visuddhō sō khalu chēēṇa suddhō tti
jaha pañcasu samiīsuṁ tīsu ya guttīmu appamatēgaṁ
sa ciya kāyanaṁ jaïiṇā saha kāigāī vi
jē khalu pamāyanaṇayā vasahāī tē vi vajjaṇīyā u
nō dhammiyassa vittī aṇaṇuṭāṇaṁ taya hōi
ēēṇaṁ vāhijjaï saṁbhavaï ya taṁ dugaṁ na niyamēṇaṁ
ēēṇa jō samēō sō uṇa chēēṇa nō suddhō
taha anammiyāṇaṁ ucchēō bhōyaṇaṁ gihē gēmaṇaṁ
jīvāibhāvavāō jō diveṭṭha [] nō khalu viruddhō
bandhāisāhagō taha ettha imō hōi tāvō ti
ēēṇa jō visuddhō sō khalu tāvēṇa hōī suddhō tti
santāsantē jīvē niccāṇiccē ya ṇēgadhammē ya
jaha suhabandhāīyā jujjanti na annahā niyamā
nicō vēgasahāvō sahāvabhūyaṁmi kaha nu sō dukkhē
piṇḍō paḍō vva na ghaḍō tapphalamaṇaīyapiṇḍa bhāvāō
ēvaṁvihō u appā micchattādīhi bandhaē kammaṁ
iharā kattā bhottā ubhayaṁ vā pāvaī sayā vi
na ya sō taō na annō paccakkhāippasiddhīō
na ya nāṇanō sō'haṁ ki pattō pāvapariṇaïvasēṇa
tassēva tahā bhāvā sabamiṇaṁ hōi uvavannaṁ
ēgantēṇa u niccō'ṇiccō vā kaha nu vēyaē sakaḍaṁ
ettha sarīrēṇa kaḍaṁ pāṇahāsēvaṇāra jaṁ kammaṁ
taṁ khalu cittavivāgaṁ vēēi bhavantarē jīvō
na u taṁ cēva sarīraṁ naragāisu tassa taha abhāvāō
ēvaṁ jīvēṇa kayaṁ kūramaṇapayaṭṭaēṇa jaṁ kammaṁ
na u kēvalaō jīvō tēṇa vimukkassa vēyaṇābhāvē
na ya sō cēva tayaṁ khalu lōgāivirōhabhāvāō
ēvaṁ ciya dēhavahē uvayārē vā vi puṇṇapāvāiṁ
tayabhinnami ya niyamā tannāsē tassa pāvaï nāsō
na puṇa amuttō muttasma appaṇō kuṇaï kiṁcidavi
akarentō ya na bajjhaï aïppasaṅgā sadēva bhāvāō
mokkhō vi ya baïddhassā tayabhāvē sa kaha kīsa vā na sayā
kiṁ vā hēūhi tahā kahaṁ va sō hōi purisatthō
tamhā baddhassa taō bandhō vi aṇāimaṁ pavāhēṇa
jaha u aīō kālō tahāvihō taha pāhēṇa
dīsaï kammōvacaō saṁbhavaī tēṇa tassa vigamō vi
kaṇagamalassa ya tēṇa u mukkō mukkō tti nāyavō
ēmāibhāvavāō jattha tō hōi tāvasuddhō tti
tā paḍivajaha sammaṁ dhammamiṇaṁ bhāvō mara bhaṇiyaṁ
iya bhaṇiūṇa jāē tuhikē tarakhaṇaṁ jiṇavaraṁmi
unnāmiyamuhakamalā puṇō vi ṭhāṇaṁ gayā niyayaṁ
tattha ya kēi pavanā sammattaṁ dēsaviraïvayamannē
annē u cattasaṅgā jāyā samaṇā samiyapāvā
etthantaraṁmi ya maē diṭṭhā dēvī tahiṁ samōsaraṇē
jāyā ya majjha cintā hanta kuō estha dēvi ti
sariyaṁ ca mantasiddhassa taṁ maē punamantiyaṁ vayaṇaṁ
paricintiyaṁ ca etthaṁ pucchāmi jiṇaṁ niyāṇaṁ ti
kiṁ puṇa maē kayaṁ parabhavaṁmi jassīisō vivāgō tti
paripucchiō ya ēvaṁ namiūga maē jiṇō nirava sēsaṁ
puvāyakammadōtaṁ taō vi iya kahi māḍhattō
atthi ihēva girivarō jambuddīvami bhārahē vāsē
nāmēṇa siharasēṇō tattha tumaṁ āsi sabararāō tti
dēvī vi ya tē ēsā tuha jāyā āsi sirimaī nāma
sa tuma imīē saddhiṁ sacchandaṁ giriniuñjadēsēsu
parikhīṇō hiṇḍantō taṁ dēsaṁ āgaō navaraṁ
daṭṭhūṇa sāhugacchaṁ aṇugampā tuha maṇami uppanā
hā ki bhamanti ēē aïvisapē vijhakantārē
gantūṇa pucchiyā tē kiṁ hiṇḍaha estha vijharaṇami
sāhūhi tō bhaṇiyaṁ sāvaya panthāu pabbhaṭṭhā
bhaṇiō ya sirimaīē taṁ sāmi mahātabassigō ēē
nūgaṁ nihāṇalambhō ēsa tuha pagāmiō vihiṇā
sāhūhi taō bhaṇiyaṁ sākkha nē yāṇi kappaṇi jāṇi
bhaṇiyaṁ tumaē taha vi ya tumbhēhi aṇugahō u kāyayō
sāhūhi tō bhaṇiyaṁ jaï ēvaṁ vigayavaṇṇagandhāī
tā amha dēha navaraṁ phalāi cirakālagahiyāī
iya bhaṇiēṇaṁ tumaē sigdhaṁ girikandarāu ghettūṇa
tēhi vi ya tujha dhammō kahiō jigadēsiō susāhūhiṁ
paḍivanā iya tumbhē kammōvasamēṇa taṁ dhamma
bhattibharōṇayavayaṇēhi sō ya tumbhēhi gahiō tti
muṇiūṇa taha ya tubhaṁ jammaṁ kammāṇuhāvacariyaṁ ca
sāhū hi samāiḍhē kāyacamiṇaṁ ti tubbhēhiṁ
tami ya diṇami tubhaṁ jaï vi sarīra viṇivāyaṇaṁ kōi
cintēja taha karejja va tahāvi tumbhēhi khamiyavvaṁ
ēvaṁ sēvantāṇaṁ tumbhaṁ jiṇabhāsiyaṁ imaṁ dhammaṁ
tumbhēhi vi bhattīē sōūṇamiṇaṁ susāhuvayaṇaṁ ti
ēvaṁ ti abbhuvayaṁ gaēhi sāhūhi ciṇṇaṁ ca
taha cēva kaṁci kālaṁ annonnavēḍamāṇa saḍḍēhiṁ
aha annayā ya tumbhaṁ pōsahapaḍimaṁ pavanāṇaṁ
taṁ daṭṭaṇaṁ tumaē tabbhīyaṁ sirimaī niēūṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ ca bhīru mā bhōyasu ti ēyassa mēṁ samallīṇā
tō sirimaīē bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ ēyaṁ ti kō'ttha saṁdēhō
kiṁ tu guruvayaṇamēyaṁ pāmukaṁ hōi amhēhi
jamhā gurūhi bhaṇiyaṁ sarīraviṇivāyaṇaṁ pi tubmāṇa
jaï kōi taṁmi diyahē karejja tumbhēhi khamiyavvaṁ
tā kaha gurūṇa vayaṇaṁ sumarantēhi guṇabhūsiyaṁ nāha
aha mottūṇa dhaṇuvaraṁ tumaē tō sirimaī imaṁ bhaṇiyā
saccaṁ gurūṇa vayaṇaṁ kaha kīraï annahā suyaṇu
tuha nēhēmōhiēṇaṁ maē vi ēyamiha vavasiyaṁ āsi
tā alamēēṇa piē guruvayaṇē āyaraṁ kuṇasu
uvayāri cciya ēsō amhāṇaṁ pasavanāhō tti
iya cintintō ya tuma naharēhi viyārilō sutikhēhiṁ
ahiyāsiō ya tumaē jāyāsahiēṇa sō ubasaggō
jō kupurisāṇa sāvaya accatthaṁ durahiyāsō ti
caïūṇa taō dēhaṁ visuddhacittāi dō vi samakālaṁ
paliōvamāuyāī tatya ya bhōē jahicchiē bhottuṁ
jāyāi jattha jaha vā saṁjōyaṁ sundaraṁ ca pattāī
jaha pāviō ya dukkhaṁ virasaṁ taha saṁpayaṁ suṇasu
avaravidēhē khettē cakkaüraṁ nāma puravaraṁ rammaṁ
tassāsi agamahisī dēvī nāmēṇa bālacanda tti
tīsē garbhami tumaṁ caïūṇa muhaṁmi uvavannō
dēvī vi ya tē ranō sālassa subhūsaṇassa gēhaṁmi
tāṇa bahuēhi doṇḍa vi maṇōrahasaēhi diṇē pasatthaṁmi
tattha ya samaramiyakō nāmaṁ tu ṭhāviyaṁ guruyaṇēṇa
dēvīē vi ya nāmaṁ asōyadēvi tti saṁgīyaṁ
pariṇīyā ya taē vi ya supasatyavivāhajōēṇa
bhuñjantāṇa payāmaṁ visayamuhaṁ nāra vaccaē kālō

p.s:
vacchē, saṁsārasamāvannā khu pāṇiṇō sabvē dukkhatarubīyanammasaṁgayā ahihavīyanti aṇusamayaṁ jarāē, utthā
rijjanti mōhatimirēṇa, vāhijjanti visayataṇḍāē, kayatthijjanti indiēhiṁ, pacanti kōhaggiṇā, avaṭṭhamanti māṇapavvaēṇaṁ, mōhi.

jjanti māyājāliyāē, palāvijjanti lōhasāyarēṇa, khaṇḍijjanti iṭṭaviōēhi, bhamāḍijjanti kālapariṇaīē, kavalijjanti maccuṇa
tti.
paramatthō na kēi suhiyā mottūṇa tappaḍivakkhujjaē mahāṇubhāvē.

tē uṇa, jahā kēi mahāvāhigahiyā pīḍijjamāṇā mahāvēyaṇāē
samāvannanivvēyā gavēsiūṇa kusalavejjaṁ nivēiūṇa appāṇayaṁ tassa vayaṇēṇa paḍibannā jahuttakiriyaṁ vāhijamāṇā vi tevvēyaṇāē vimu
camāṇā vāhiṇā antō-āroggalāhadhiīē agaṇēmāṇātaṁ bajjhadukkhaṁ īsi avimukkā vivāhiṇā saṁjāyavimokkhanicchayamaī ārogga
samēyā viya na khalu nō muhiyā vavahārēṇa tahā jē imē bhayavantō muṇivarā tē saṁsāramahāvāhigahiyatti paḍijjamāṇā jammāimahāvē
yaṇāē samāvannanivvēyā gavēsiūṇa bhāvaō kusalavēja bhayavantaṁ vīyarāyaṁ taduvaēsasamuṭṭiyaṁ vā guruṁ nivēiūṇamappāṇayaṁ tassa vayaṇēṇa
paḍivānā savvadukkhanivāraṇiṁ saṁjamakiriyaṁ vāhijjamāṇā vi parīsahōvasaggavēyaṇāē vimuccamāṇā mahāmōhavāhiṇā antōpasamārōgagalā
bhadhiīē agaṇēmāṇātaṁ parīsahādivajjhadukkha īsi avimukkā vi saṁkilēsavāhiṇā paramaguruvīyarāgāṇāsēvamāē saṁjāyavimokkhaniccha
maī sayalābāhākhayasamunbhūyaparamapaṇihāṇabhāvāroggasamēyā vīyarāyā viya na khalu nō suhiyā niccha ēṇa.

jō paṇaṭṭhuṁ tēsiṁ mōha
timiraṁ, āvibhūyaṁ sammanāṇaṁ, niyattō asaggahō, pariṇayaṁ saṁtōsāmayaṁ, avagayā asakiriyā, tuṭṭapāyā bhavavallī,thirīhūyaṁ śāṇarayaṇaṁ
āsannaṁ paramasivamuhaṁ.
tā ēvaṁ paramatthacintāē thēvā ettha muhiyā bahavē uṇa dukkhiya tti.
lōyadiṭṭhīē u vacchē annārisē muha dukkhē.

lōēhi jammajarāmaraṇaghatthā vi pāṇiṇō āhārāisaṁpattimettēṇa kūravāhasaragōyaragayā viya hariṇayā javasāisaṁpattīē cēva muhiya tti
vuccanti, annahā dukkhiyā.
ṇa ya imaṁ diṭṭhimahigicca tuha dukkhiyattē kāraṇamavagacchāmi.
sāhēhi vā, jaï akahaṇīya na hōi.
bhayavaï, jahā taē samāilaïṁ, tahēva paramatthō.

tahāvi ajja uttākusalasumaraṇamavi
pīḍēi maṁ mandabhāiṇiṁ.
vacchē, na tassa saṁpayamakusalaṁ ti, dhīrā hōhi.
bhayavaï, na taē kuppiyavvaṁ, bhaṇāmi kiṁci ahamāulayāē.

vacchē,
akōvaṇō cēva tavassijaṇō hōi, kimetra ma bhatthaṇāra.

bhayavaha, jaï ēvaṁ tā kō ettha pañcō, jaṁ bhayavaīē ā
iṁṭṭa ti.

tadāēsēṇa ya
jaṁpiyamiṇaṁ, na uṇa annahā; tahāvi ēsō etya pañcō ttisigdhaṁ tuhāvagamaṇanimittaṁ bhaṇāmi kiṁci ahayaṁ.
suṇa, ēvaṁviha saravaīē nārīē gujjhapaēsē masō havaï tti saramaṇḍalē paḍhiyaṁ.
ēvamēyaṁ kiṁ tu marisēu bhayavaī, jaṁ maē āulāē viyappiyaṁ.

na ettha
dōsō, nēhāulā hi pāṇiṇō ēvaṁvihā cēva havanti.
kiṁ tu taē vi marisiyavvaṁ, jaṁ maē tuha sigdhapaḍivattinimittamēvaṁ jaṁpiyaṁ ti.
avaṇīō mama mahāsōō bhayavaīē imiṇā jaṁpiēṇa.

kiṁ tu pucchāmi bhaga
vaī, kassa uṇa kammassa īisō mahārōdō vivāō tti.
suṇa, thēvēṇa kammuṇā jaṁ maē pāviyaṁ ti.
bhayavaï, mahantō mē aṇuggahō; dahamavahiya mhi.
aṁtya kō salāhiyō narasundarō nāma rāyā.

sō ya ēgayā gaō āsa
vāhaṇiyāē.

diṭṭā ya ṇēṇa majjhavhadēsayālē tīē mahāḍabīē ēgaṁmi vaṇaniujē aücca
dasaṇā isthiyā.
kāsi tuma kō vā ēsa paēsō ti.
maṇōharā nāma jakkhiṇī ahaṁ, vijharaṇṇaṁ ca ēyaṁ.

ahaṁ khu nanda
ṇāō malayaṁ gayā āsi saha piyayamēṇa.

tō āgacchamāṇīē iha paēsē nimittamantarēṇa kuviō mē piyayamō, gaō yamaṁ ujjhiuṁ
aō ēyāiṇi tti.

jamujjhiyā
piyayamēṇaṁ, tuma pi jaṁ tēṇa saha na gaya tti.

bhadē, na ēsa dhammō saīṇa.
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ.
kīisa taspa saïttaṇaṁ, jō aṇurattaṁ jaṇaṁ pariccayaï.

bhadē, kō'gurattaṁ viṇā dōsēṇa pariccayaï! tīē
bhaṇiyaṁ.
ēvaṁ ca bhaṇi kaṇa savilāsamavalōiuṁ pavattā.
mahārāya, iyāṇi cēva jaṁpiyaṁ taē, jahā kō'ṇurattaṁ viṇā dōsēṇa paricayaï.a gurattā ya ahaṁ bhavaō.
bhaddē, mā ēvaṁ bhaṇa; paritthiyā tumaṁ.
mahārāya, purisassa sabā parā cēva itthiyā hōi.
kimimi gā jāibāēṇa; paricaya imaṁ paralōyaviruddhamālāvaṁ.
jahā kō'ṇurattaṁ viṇā dōsēṇa paricayaï.rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ.
nāṇurattā tuma, jēṇa maṁ ahiē niuñjasi.

aō cēva na dōsajjiyā,
paralōyaṁ aveksasi.
jaï na māṇēsi maṁ, tō ahaṁ niyamēga bhavantaṁ vāvāēmi.

rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ ।
bhaddē, kō taē bābāīyaï.
jō raṇḍāē purisō vāvāijaï, tassa jalañjalidāṇaṁ na jujjaï tti.

taō paüṭā viya pahāviyā rāyasa
mmuhaṁ.
taō kimimīē ti payaṭṭō rāyā sanayarābhimuhaṁ.

samāgaō thēvaṁ bhūmibhāga, kāya aya
ṇḍaṁ mi cēva nivaḍiō kañcaṇapāyō.

arē
durāyāra, kettira vārē ēvaṁ chuṭṭihisi.
ā pāvē, agōyaratyā tuma; anahā avassamahaṁ tumaṁ niggahēmi.
devvajōēṇa turayamaggāṇulaggēṇa divō niyasennēṇa samāgamaō rāyā sanayaraṁ.

savatthāvī latyō ciṭṭhaï ti pu
cchiyaṁ maē ajjaütta, kiṁ nimittaṁ.

hā kahaṁ na kiṁci kahiṁ ajjaüttō, kahamīisī avīsatthaya
tti.
tā sāhēhi kāragaṁ, panjāulaṁ mē hiyayaṁ ti.
annaütta, kaha ṇu ēyaṁ, ahiṇiviṭṭhā khu ēsā.
jaï pōvēmi taṁ hatthagahaṇē saṁpayaṁ, tā taha kayatthēmi, jahā chaḍḍēi ahiṇivēsaṁ tiṁ.

annayā ya vāsamavaṇatyō rāya tti sōūṇa payaṭṭā ahaṁ
vāsabhavaṇaṁ.
gayā ēga kacchantaraṁ, jāva diṭṭhō maē rāyā mama samāṇarūbāē itthiyāē saha sayaṇīyamuvagaō ti.

taō hā kimēyaṁ
ti saṁkhuddhā ahaṁ, niyattamāṇī ya divā rāiṇā.
tēṇāvahīriūṇa majjha vayaṇaṁ samāhūyā sā itthiyā.

jārisaṁ taē mantiyaṁ ti, tārisaṁ
cēva imīē saṁpāḍiyaṁ.

ajjaütta, alamimīē dasaṇēṇa, niyāsēhi ēvaṁ mahāpāvaṁ ti ।
taō rāiṇā sadāviyā aṭṭhapāhariyā.

bhō bhō ēyaṁ dēvīsvadhāriṇi duṭṭanavikhaṇiṁ kayatthiūṇa
niyaṁ lahuṁ nivāsēha.

taō tēhiṁ jaṁ dēvō āṇavēi ti bhaṇiūṇa pubavēriēhi viya ā pāvē, ā pāvē tti bhaṇamāṇēhiṁ gahiyā ahaṁ
kēṇāvi kēsēsu, avarēṇa uttarīē, annēṇa bāhāhiṁ, kayatthiyā naravaïpuraō, nīṇiyā bāhiṁ.

tattha vi ya ahiyayaraṁ kayatthiūṇa, jahā
kāi duhrasīlā nivāsīyaï, tahā nivāsiya mhi.

ā pāvē, jaï puṇō gayabhavaṇaṁ pavi
sasi, taō muyā amhāṇa hatthō tti.

ahō mē pāvapariṇaī, peccha ki
(mē) pāviyaṁ ti.
ahō ṇu khalu niravarāhā vi pāṇiṇō pukhaducariēhiṁ ēvaṁ kayatthijanti.
tā alaṁ mē jīviēṇa, vāvāēmi attāṇayaṁ.

na anō vācāyaṇōvāō tti gantūṇa mēyamadūrōvalakkhijamāṇapabvayaṁ bhañjami attāṇayaṁ ti payaṭṭā girisamuha, pattā ya mahayā parikilēsēṇa ।
samāḍhattā ya āruhium̐.

samāgaō ya tō aṇēyaguṇarayaṇabhūsiō dippamāṇō tavatēēṇa muṭṭhiō para
lōyapakkhē bacchalō duhiyasattāṇaṁ samuppannadivbaṇāṇō dēsabhō saṁsārāḍavīē ciṁtāmaṇī samīhiyasuhassa aṇēyasāhupariyariō sugihīya
nāmō bhayavaṁ guru tti.
taṁ ca dadruṇa avagaō viya mē kilēsō, samaddhāsiyā viya dhammēṇa.

vandiō saviṇayaṁ, dhammalāhiyā ya ṇēṇa
bhaṇiyā sabahumāṇaṁ.

īisō ēsa saṁsārō, āvayābhāyaṇaṁ khu ettha pāṇiṇō; ahihayā mahāmōhēṇa
na pecchanti paramatthaṁ, na muṇanti paramamittāṇaṁ vayaṇaṁ, payaṭṭanti ahiēsu, bandhanti tivya kammayāī, viuḍi janti tēhiṁ, na chuṭṭanti punca
dakkaḍāṇaṁ viṇā vīyarāgavayaṇakaraṇēṇaṁ ti.

bhayatraṁ, ēvamēyaṁ aha kiṁ puṇa maē kayaṁ pāvakamma, jassa īisō vivāō
tti.

vacchē, suṇa ।
atthi ihēva bhārahē vāsē uttarāvahē visaē bambhaüra nāma nayaraṁ.

tassa bahumaō viurō
nāma māhaṇō, purandarajasā sē bhāriyā.
tāṇaṁ tuma iō aīyanavamabhavaṁmi candajasāhihāṇā dhūyā ahēsi tti, vallahā jagaṇijaṇayāṇaṁ.
jiṇavayaṇabhāviyattaṇēṇa tāṇi dēsanti tē dhamma, nivārenti ahiyāō.
aṇāibhavabhāvaṇādōsēṇa bālayāē ya na pariṇamaï tē samma.
samuppannā ya tē pīī jasōdāsasē dvibhāriyāē bandhusundarīē saha.

sā ya aïsaṁkiliṭṭhucitā saṁsārāhiṇandiṇī giddhā kāmabhōēmu nira
vekkhā paralōyamaggē.
vacchē, alamimīē saha saṅgēga, pāramittathāṇīyā khu ēsā, paḍisiddhō ya bhaya.
na paḍivannaṁ ca taṁ taē guruāyaṇaṁ.

piyasahi, virattō mē bhattā gāḍharatō maïrāvaīē, ajāyaputtabhaṇḍā ya ahayaṁ ।
tā na-yāṇāmō, kahaṁ bhavissaï tti daḍaṁ visaṇṇa bhiḍa.
alaṁ visāēṇa, uvāē jattaṁ kuṇasu tti.

na yāṇāmi
etthuvāyaṁ, suyaṁ ca maē, atthi iha uppalā nāma paridhāiyā, sā ēvaṁvihēsu kusalā, na ya ṇētaṁ pekkhiuṁ avasarō tti.
kahiṁ sā parivasaï, sāhēhi majjha; ahaṁ tamāṇēmi tti.
bandhusundarī tumaṁ dadrumicchaï tti bhaṇiūṇa āṇiyā tumaē, āṇiūṇa gayā tumaṁ sagihaṁ.

pūiyā sā bandhusundarīē, sā
hiō sē niyavuttantō.
karēmi ahamettha jōya, jēṇa sō tīsē paōsamā.

gayā parivāiyā, kōya ṇāē jasōdāsaseṭṭhiṇō mahāvaī paï vidēsa
ṇajōō.
acintasāmatthayāē ōsahīṇaṁ vicittayāē kammarariṇāmaspa virattō tīē seṭṭhī.

parivāliūṇa aghāuyaṁ mayā samāṇī takkammadōsēṇēva samuppanā karēṇuyattāē
appiyā jahāhissa; gahiyā vārimajjhē.

taō tattha mahantaṁ kilēsamaṇuhaviya mayā samāṇī takkammadōsēṇa samuppannā vāgarittāē
tti.
vicchūṭā jūhāō gahiyā jaraṭṭhakurēṇa, nibaddhā lōhasaṅkalāē.

mahādukkhapīḍiyā ahā
uyaṁ pāliūṇa mayā samāṇī takammadōsēṇēva samuppannā kukkurittāē.

tattha vi ya riukālē vi agahimayā sabakukkurāṇaṁ kīḍāniyara
khaïyaviṇahadēhā mahantaṁ kilēsamaṇuhaviya mayā samāṇī takkammadōsēṇēva samuppannā majārigattāē tti.
rāṇaṁ gēhāṇaladaḍḍadēhā ahāuya skhaē mariūṇa takkammadōsēṇēva samuppannā cakavāiyattāē tti.

tatya vi sayā piyayamaparivajjiyā kilē.
sasaṁpāiyavittī mahantaṁ dukkhamaṇuhaviya mayā samāṇī takammadōsēṇēva samuppannā caṇḍālaïtthigattāē ti.

tattha vi ya daḍhaṁ amaṇōramā
piyayamassa mayaṇadukkhapīḍiyā ahāuyakkhaēṇa mariūṇa takammadō sēṇēva samuppamā savaraïsthigattāē.

tattha vi ya amaṇōramā savvasa
varāṇaṁ vicchūḍhā ṇēhiṁ pallīō paribbhamantī ya visamasajjhakantārē kilēsasaṁpāiyasarīraṭṭhiī parikkhīṇakāyā addhāṇapaḍivanapahaparibhaṭṭhēhi
diṭṭhā tumaṁ sāhahiṁ, tē vi ya tu rāē ti.
tē ya daṭṭhūṇa samuppannō tē pamōō.

dhammasīlē, kō uṇa imō paēsō
kēdurē vā iō vattaṇi tti.
ahavā ēha, ahaṁ cēva daṁsēmi tti.
ahō imē amacchariyā piyabhāsiṇō pasantarūvā abhigamaṇīyā; dhannāṇamēvaṁvihēhi saha saṁgamō bhavaï.

ēvaṁ
visuddhacintaṇēṇa khaviō kammasaṁghāō āsagaliyaṁ bodhivīyaṁ.

etthantaraṁmi dhammalāhiyā sāhūhiṁ suhayarapariṇāmā ya paḍiyā tēsiṁ
calaṇēsuṁ.
esthantaraṁmi appārambhapariggahattaṇēṇa sahāvamaddavajayayāē sāhusannihisāmatthaō suddhabhāvayāē ya baddhaṁ sumāṇusā uyaṁ.
gaēmu vi ya na tuṭṭō tē tayaṇusaraṇasaṁgaō suhabhāvāṇubandhō.

ahāuyaparikkhaēṇaṁ ca mayā samāṇī takammadōsa
sēsasaṁgayā cēva samuppannā sēyaviyāhivassa dhūya tti.
pattavayā ya pariṇīyā kōsalāhivēṇa; takkammasēsayāē ya jakkhiṇīrūvadhippala.
ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa avagayaṁ ciya mē mōhatimiraṁ, jāō bhavavirāō, utpannaṁ jāisaraṇaṁ, baḍiō saṁvēgō.
bhayavaṁ, ēvamēyaḥ, aha kayā uṇa takkammavivāō nīsēsībhavissaï.

maē bhaṇiyaṁ ।
bhayavaṁ, kayā kaha vā taṁ jakkhiṇi viyāṇissaï annaüttō.

bhayatrayā bhaṇiya vacchē, ajjā rayaṇīē tuha saṁhāvāsarisayāē samuppannā
saṅkō nivēiuṇa mantiṇō takayavīyarāyapaḍimālavaṇapaōēṇa nīsaṁsayaṁ viyāṇiūṇa, jahā na ēsā dēvi tti; tō haṇa haṇa tti bhaṇa
māṇō khaggaṁ gahē ūṇa uḍhiō rāyā, jāva takkhaṇaṁ adaṁsaṇā jāya tti.

maē bhaṇiyaṁ bhayavaṁ, na tīē kiṁci akusalaṁ karissaï ajjaüttō
bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ.
vacchē, na hi, kiṁ tu kayatthiyā tumaṁ ti ahiyaṁ saṁtappissaï.

bhaya kō ettha dōsō ajja uttassa,
kammapariṇaī ēsa tti.
vacchē, ēvamēyaṁ tahāvi mōhadōsēṇa daḍha saṁtappissaï mahārāō.
taō saha taē accaṁtasuhiō havissaï tti viyāṇiūṇa na taē saṁtappiyavvaṁ.

bhayavaṁ, avagaō mē
saṁtāvō tuha daṁsaṇēṇa, virattaṁ ca mē cittaṁ bhavacāragāō.
vacchē, ēvamēyaṁ, kiṁ tu saha taē accantasuhiō havissaï ti.

saha taē jagaïdōsanigghāyaṇasamatthaṁ dukaraṁ kāvuri
sāṇa vīyarāgavayaṇāṇuṭṭhāṇaṁ karaïssaï.

ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa
ahō dhannō mahārāō ti harisiyā ahaṁ.

vacchē, tumaṁ pi geṇhāhi tāva savvamantaparama
mantaṁ aïdullahaṁ jīvalōē viṇāsaṇaṁ bhayāṇaṁ sāhaṇaṁ paramapayassa pūṇijja savāṇaṁ acintasattijuttaṁ māhagaṁ sayalaguṇāṇaṁ uvamāīyakallāṇa
kāraṇaṁ bhayavayā vīyarāgēṇa paṇīyaṁ pañcanamokkāraṁ ti.

tō uvaüttēṇa akkhaliyāiguṇasamēō dinnō
namōkārō, paḍicchiō maē suddhabhāvāisaraṇa.
tayaṇantaraṁ ca paṇamiva bhavabhayaṁ, samāgaya viya muttimuhaṁ ti.
bacchē, iṇamēva aṇusarantīē gamēyavvā taē imāē ēgapāsaḍhiyāē giriguhāē rayaṇī, na bīhiyadhvaṁ ca.

saṁpayaṁ gacchāmi ahayaṁ, muē
puṇō amhāṇaṁ saṇaṁ ti.
namōkāraparāē ya paramapamōyasaṁgayāē thēvavēlā viya aïkkantā rayaṇī.
pahāyasamaē ya āsasāhēṇa annēsagatthaṁ samāga bhō rāyā.
pattā ya ṇē' samīvē kaïvi āsavārā.
divā ya ṇēhi, harisanimmarē hiṁ sāhiyā rāiṇō.
dēvi, na mē kuppiyavvaṁ, annāṇa patthamavarajjhaï.

ajjaütta, kō etya avasarō kōvassa; niyaduccariya
vivāgarōsamēyaṁ.

ajja utta, janmantarē viōyapaḍibaddhaniyaduccariyasāmatthēṇa
pahr̥yayaramaṇubhūyaṁ, tatya kiṁ tumaṁ nimittaṁ ti.
sabahā maē kaō ēsa dōsō tti.

dēvi, sāmannēṇa viyāṇāmi aha
miṇaṁ, jamaṇādī saṁsārō kammavasagā ya pāṇiṇō.

ahō bhayavaō
nāṇāisaō ti vimhiō rāyā.
ahō asārayā saṁsārasta, ēihamettassa vi dukaḍassa īisō vivāō tti saṁviggō rāyā.
dēvi, kēdūrē iō bhayavaṁ guru tti.
gaō maṁ cettaṇa saha pariyaṇēṇa rāyā.

dihō bhayavaṁ, vandiō harisiyamaṇēṇa,
dhanmalāhiō bhayayayā.
bhayavaṁ, sāhiō mamaṁ bhayavantadaṁsaṇāiyō sayalavuttantō cēva dēvīē.

jāō ya mē saṁtāsō,
ahō ēhamettassa vi dukkaḍassa īisō vivāō tti.

suppaṇihāṇaṁ vaṭṭamāṇasayalasāvajja
jōyaviramaṇaṁ saṁviggayāē aīyapaḍikkamaṇaṁ accantamaṇiyāṇamaṇāgayapaccakkhāṇa ti.

ēvaṁ ca kara samāṇē mahantakusalāsayabhāvēṇa mahā
mēhabuṭṭihayāṇi viya khuddajalaśudittayāī pasamanti dukkaḍāī.

taō vittharaï kupalāsō, ullapaï jīvavīriyaṁ, visujjhaē antarappā,
pariṇamaï appamāō, niyattara micchāviyappaṇaṁ, avēi kammāṇubandhō, khijaï bhavasaṁtatī, pāvijaï paramapayaṁ.

tattha uṇa savvakālaṁ na
honti dukkaḍajōyā, accantiyaṁ ca nirupamamuhaṁ.

bhayavaṁ, ēva mēyaṁ, aṇuggihīō ahaṁ bhayavayā, kusa
lajōēṇa karēmi bhayavaō āṇaṁ ti.

uvāēō ya savvahā
dhammō sayamannaṁ saṁkilē sakāragaṁ.
na hōi dhammō gurumantarēṇa, tā saṁpāḍēmi bhayaraō āṇaṁ ti.

ajjaütta, juttamēyaṁ ।
taō davāviyaṁ rāṇā mahādāṇaṁ, kārāviyā aṭṭhāhiyāmahimā, sammāṇiyā paürajaṇavayā, ṭhāviōrajjē surasundarō nāma jeṭṭaputtō.

taō
aṇēyasāmantāmaccapariyō saha mara sayalantēurēṇa ya mugihīyanāmadhēyagurusamīvē suttabhaṇiēṇa vihiṇā patramāṇēṇaṁ suhapariṇāmēṇaṁ
pāiō rāyā.
tā ēvaṁ, bacchē, thēvēga kamnuṇā iyaṁ maē pāviyaṁ ti.

thēvassa anāṇaceṭṭiyassa, vacchē, ēsō
vivāō, pahūyassa u tiriyāirasuṁ havaï.

ēvaṁ ca kammapariṇaīē samāvaḍiyāra vi assā udaē pubdhakaḍamēyaṁ ti na saṁtappiyavvaṁ jāṇa
ēṇa.
sabahā kayatthā bhayavaī, nā samuttiṇṇā imāō kilēsanambālāō.
haṁ pi dhannā cēva, jīēmaē tuma diṭṭhā.
tā āisaü bhayabaī, naṁ maē kāyavvaṁ ti.

taō viyāṇiūṇa tīē bhāvaṁ sāhiō sāva
yadhammō gaṇiṇīē.
ēyamahaṁ caēmi kāuṁ ti harisiyā rayaṇavaī.

bhayavaï, kī isō majjha saravisēsō tti pucchiyāē jaṁ taē samāṇattaṁ
"jārisō paramānandajōē bhattuṇō havaï" tti tā kīisō ajjaüttassa paramāṇandajōō, kiṁ suyaṁ kuōi ajjaüttēṇa vīyarāyavayaṇaṁ.
etthantaraṁ guluguliyaṁ gandha hathiṇā, samāhayaṁ saṁjhāmaṅgalatūraṁ, paḍhiyaṁ ca bandiṇā.

lg.l: dhammōdaēṇa taṁ natyi jaṁ na hōi tti sundaraṁ lōē
iya jāṇiūṇa sundari saṁpaï dhammaṁ daḍhaṁ kuṇasu

p.s: ḍhōiyāṇi ya sē nandābhihāṇāē bhaṇḍāriṇīē mahānāyagasaṁjuyāṇi kaḍayāṇi, samāgaō siyakusumahatthō purōhiō.

na etya saṁdēhō, aṇukulō saüṇasaṁghāō tti
sammamāyaṇiyaṁ vīyarāgavayaṇaṁ annaüttēṇa, pāviyaṁ pāviyavvaṁ, ubaladdhō siddhimaggō.

kahaṁ ca annahā paramāṇandasadō muyadēvayākappāē
bhayavaīē muhāō nikkhamaï.
amahiyajāyaharisāē vandiyā gaṇiṇī, bhaṇiyā ya saviṇayaṁ.

bhayavaï, kiṁ kappaï, ettha bhayavaīē
raïyaṇīē cihium̐, na hi.
dhammasīlē, jattha tuma, tattha natthi virōhō.

pahāē ya āucchi
ūṇa sasuramaṇunāyā ya ṇēṇa gayā gaṇiṇīsamī.

samāgayā sagihaṁ bīyadiyahē dhammāṇusa
yō sagihatthiyāē cēva samāgayā gaṇiṇō.
ēvaṁ païdiṇaṁ gaṇiṇīpajjuvāsaṇaparāē aïkantā cattāri divasā.

nivēiō candasundarīē gaṇiṇīsamīvasaṁṭhiyāē rayaṇavaīē, jahā dēvi, na annahā bhayavaīvayaṇaṁ ti; samāgaō tē hiya
yaṇandaṇō.

etthantaraṁmi kumārō vi saha viggahēṇa daga naravaī sāhiūṇa viggahavutantaṁ rāiṇō sabahumāṇaṁ sammāṇiō gēṇa samāgaō
rayaṇavaïsamīvaṁ.
daṭhūṇa ya kaha kayatthā cetra dēvī saṁgayā gaṇiṇīē ti harisiō cittēṇaṁ.

bhayavaï, peccha mama puṇṇōdayaṁ, jēṇa paḍibōhiō ahaṁ bhayavayā sugihīyanāmadhēpaṇa guruṇā bīyahiyaya
bhūyā ya mē taē dēvī tti; diḥ ya bhavasayadullahadasaṇā bhayavaī.
ēēṇa pāṇiṇō pāvanti suhaparaṁparāē muttisuhaṁ pi, kimaṅga puṇa annaṁ.

jaï vi puṇṇapāvakkhaēṇa muttī
tahāvi tassa kusalāṇubandhipuṇṇamēva kāraṇaṁ.

na kusalāṇubandhipugṇavivāgamantarēṇa tārisā bhāvā labbhanti, jārisēsu pugṇapāvakkha
yanimittakusalajōyārāhaṇaṁ ti.
ēvaṁ ca dhammakahāvāvarēṇa kaṁci vēla gamēūṇa gayā gaṇiṇī paḍissayaṁ.
ēvaṁ ca païdiṇaṁ dhammajōgārāhaṇaparāṇa aïkkantō kōi kālō.
nattuyamuhadasaṇakayasthattaṇēṇaṁ ca kumāraṁ rajjē ahisiñciya pavāō mettībalō.

tassa ya dhammaguṇappahāvēṇa aṇuratta sāmantamaṇḍalaṁ rahiyaṁ kaṇṭa ēhi alaṁkiyaṁ rajaguṇēṇa samaddhāsiyaṁ lacchīē niccapamuiyajaṇaṁ muṭṭiyāē
tivaggaṇīīē sayalajaṇapasaṁsajjiṁ dēvagurupajjuvāṁsaṇēparayāē rē jamaṇupālentassa aïkkantō kōi kālō.

annayā samāgaō jalayakālō, otthariyamambaraṁ jalaharēhi, pavāiyā kalambavāyā, viyambhiō gajjiyaravō ullasiyā balā
yapantī, vipphuriyā vijjulēhā, harisiyā vappīhayā, jāya parisaṇaṁ, paṇacciyā sihaṇḍiṇō, paṇaṭṭhā rāyahaṁsā, pavvāliyā vasu
maī, bhariyā kutārā, parattō daduraravō, ubbhinnā kandalā, ukkaṇṭhiyāō pahiyajāyāō, nivvyaṁ gōmāhisakkaṁ.

pavaḍḍamāṇā
ṇubandhē ya jalayakālē sarasariyāpūradasaṇatthaṁ samaṁ ahāsannihiyapariyaṇēṇa niggaō rāyā.

diṭṭhā sariyā kaḍhataṇakalilēṇa pūriyā
jalōhēṇa vittharantī sabaō, nivāḍayantī kūlāṇi, viṇāsayantī ārāmē, kalusayantī appāṇaya, saṁgayā kūrajalayarēhi, rahiyā
buhajaṇasēvaṇijjēga jalēṇa, ahiṭṭhiyā kallōlēhiṁ, bajjiyā majjāyāē, accantabhōsaṇēṇaṁ mahāvattasaṁghāēṇaṁ bālāibhayajaṇaṇi tti ।
taṁ ca kaṁci vēlaṁ pulaśya paviṭṭhō nayariṁ rāyā.

pāya ra āsaparivāhaṇanimittaṁ vāhiyāliṁ gacchamāṇēga
puṇō payaïbhāvaṭṭhiyā saṁgayā sacchōdaēṇa vajjiyā kūrajalayarēhiṁ visiṭṭhanaṇōvabhōyasaṁpāyaṇasamatthā sa ccēva diṭṭha tti.

taṁ ca daṭṭhūṇa
sumariyapuvyavuttantasma rāiṇō tahāphammaparigaïbasēṇa samuppannō saṁvēō.

ahō ṇu khalu asārō bajjhariddhivi
ttharō, saparāvagāraō ya parama-thēṇa.

jahā imā vittharantī sacaō appaparāvagāriṇī pubōva
laddhavuttantēṇa, tahā purisō vi vittharantō bajjhavittharēṇa; sō khalu mahārambhapariggayāē nivāḍēi muhabhāvakulāṇi, viṇāsēi dhamma
caraṇārāmē, kalu sēi kammuṇā apāṇaya, saṁjujjaē kūrasattēhi, viujjaē nirīhasāhujaṇēṇa, sēvijaē ummāyakallōlēhi, vajijaē
kiccamajjāyāē.

ēvaṁ ca mahāmōhāva tamajhavattī niratthiyāē ahō purisiyāē aviyāriūṇa paramatthaṁ, aṇālōciūṇa tassa bhaṅgurattaṁ,
māindayālavibbhamē tami asaï pattē vi apariciē aśyāraē niyamēṇa accantagiddhō saparāvayāraē tti.

rahiō ya ṇēṇaṁ, jahā imī
sariyā payaïbhāvē vaṭṭamāṇī sōhaṇā, tahā purisō vi vijamāṇē vivēē niratyayaparikilēsarahiō saṁgaō suddhāsaraṇa vanjiō
pāvamittahiṁ jīvalōōvayārōvabhōyasaṁpāyaṇasamatthō havaï, avijamāṇē avāyagamaṇapaḍibandhē bajjhavihavavittharabhāvō uṇa vivēiṇō vi
mahantaṁ paralōyantarāyaṁ nibandhaṇaṁ micchāhimāṇassa ucchāyaṇaṁ cittanivvuīē saṁpāyaṇaṁ parikilēsāṇa paṇāsaṇaṁ nāṇapariṇaīē vēriyaṁ
saṁtōsāmayassa bandhavaṁ asañcavasāyāṇaṁ ayāṇayaṁ viyambhasuhassa viyāṇayaṁ kavaḍanīiṇaṁ vajiya kusalajōēṇaṁ saṁgayaṁ pāvāṇumaīē.

tahā
jaï vi kēsiṁci dabośyārasaṁpāyaṇasamatthamēyaṁ, tahāvi ittarōtaō na annapīḍāē viṇā paramasthō sō vi saṁbhavaï.

pahāṇō ya bhāvō
vayārō na-yāparicattārambhaparicattārambhapariggaḍō sacahā taṁ saṁpāḍēi.
juttaṁ ca maṇuyabhāvē tassa saṁpāyaṇaṁ, kimannēṇa niratthaēṇaṁ ti.

sāhiō ṇēṇa
ēsa vaïyarō raya gavaī pahiyāga manīṇaṁ.

ala ettha kālakkhēvēṇa
aïcaścalā jīvalōyaṭṭhiī, muhuttamētaṁ pi ya taṁ pasaṁsi jaē jaṁ pāmastha sāha gaparāṇaṁ.

tō kiccamēyaṁ ti cintiūṇa rāigā davāviya
māghōsaṇāpubdhayaṁ mahādāṇaṁ, kārāviyā sanyāyayaṇēsu pūyā, sammāgiyāō payāō, nivēsiō rajjē dhiibalō.

tō ya paüttipurisēhitō kāsiyāvisayasaṁṭhiyaṁ viyāṇiūṇa bhavantaṁ vijayadhammāyariyaṁ pahāṇa sāmantāmaccasaṁgō samaṁ rayaṇa
vaīē payaṭṭō gurusamīvaṁ rāyā.

vandiō pahaḍhavayaṇakamalēṇaṁ
dhammalāḍiō gurugā, pucchi bhō āganagapaōyaṇaṁ.

taō pasatyēṇa tihi
karaṇamuhutta nōēṇa vāṇārasīnayarisāmiṇā saṁpāḍiyamahādayōvayārō samaṁ pubbabhaṇiyapariyaṇēṇaṁ mahāvibhūīē visujjhamāṇēṇa pariṇā
mēṇaṁ saṁjāyacaraṇapariṇāmō pacāiō rāyā.

uciyasamaē ya jāyā sē icchā pavajāmi ahayaṁ ēga
llavihārapaḍima.pucchiō gurū, aṇu-nāō ya ṇēṇaṁ.

nibūḍhēṇa pabannō siddhantavihiṇā ēgallavihāra
paḍimaṁ ti.
niraïyārakappēṇa ya viharamāṇasta aïkkantō kōi kālō.
annayā ya gō kollāgamannivēsaṁ ṭhiō ya tattha paḍimāē.
peccha sō pāyō pāvapariṇaīē kīisō jāō ti.

ēvaṁ cēva saṁṭhiyasta muēmi uvari
mahāmahanti silaṁ ti.
tīē saṁcuṇiyajuvaṅgō vajjapahārabhinnō viya girī sayasikakarō gamissaï.

vāvāiē ya ēyaṁmi kayatyō ahaṁ,
saphalaṁ vijāvalaṁ.

cintiūṇa aïroddajjhāṇasaṁ gaēṇaṁ adūradēsavattigiriparāō gahiyā mahāśilā,
uppaïūṇa dūramambaraṁ bhayavaō upari mukkā ya ṇēṇa.
pīḍiō tīē bhayavaṁ kāraṇa, na uṇa bhāvēṇa.

jāva na
vāvāiō ti, kuvitrō vāṇamaṁtarō.

ahō sē mahāpāvassa sāmatyaṁ, ahō jīvaṇasattī, ahō mamōpari avannā, ahō
paralōyapakkhavāō.
tā tahā karēmi, jahā savvaṁ sē avēi.

pīḍiō tīē vibhayavaṁ kāraṇa
na uga bhāvēṇa.
annā vimukkā, tīē vi na vāvāiotti.

kaṁci gēhaṁ musiūṇa muēmi ēya
samīvē mōsa, payāsēmi ya lōē, jahā imiṇā mahāpāvēga iyamaṇuciṭṭhiyaṁ ti.

ēvaṁ ca kaē samāṇē pāvirūpaï mahāpāvō mahaī kayatthaṇaṁ
ti.
ciniūṇa saṁpāḍiyamaṇēṇaṁ! sāhiyaṁ daïṇḍavāsiyāṇaṁ gayā daïṇḍavāsiyā.

ahō
imassa pasannā muttī, tavasōsiyaṁ śarīraṁ, uvabhōyarahiō āgārō, agāulaṁ cittaṁ.

jāva na jaṁpaï tti,
tāḍiō ekkēṇa.
kimamhāṇamēiṇā, rāiṇō sāhēmō tti sāhiyaṁ vīsasēṇarāiṇō.
bhō bhō na tumbhēhiṁ bhayavaō kiṁci paḍikūlamāsēviyaṁ ti.

bhō ēsa bhayavaṁ amhāṇa sāmī mahārāyaguṇacandō niruvasaggaṁ mahiṁ pāliūiṇa sayalasaṅgacāī saṁpattajjhā
dēva, dhannō khu ēsō.
na diṭṭhō daṇḍavāsiēhiṁ, bhaṇiyaṁ ca ēhiṁ.
dēva, saṁpayaṁ cēva dihō, iyāṇi na dīsaï ti.
bhō jaï ēvaṁ, tā amāṇusō sō bhayavaō uvasaggakārī bhavissaï.

nivēraha tumbhē antē rāṇaṁ sayalanaṇavayasta ya, jahā samāgaō bhayavaṁ tumhāṇa paramasāmī, ṭhiō uttamavaē
muttimantō viya dhammō, pāvapasamagō daṁsaṇēga, vandaṇijjō sayāṇaṁ, nibandhaṇaṁ paramanivvuī ē mahārāyaguṇacandō; tā ēha, taṁattaṇō'ṇu
gahaṭāē bhattimantō vihavāṇurūvēṇamuvayārēṇa vandaha tti.
āṇandiyā ēē, payaṭṭā bhayavantavandaṇavaḍiyāē, pattā mahāvicchaḍḍēṇa.

pūiō bhayavaṁ vandiō harisanibbharēhi
thuō santaguṇadīvaṇāē.

etthantaraṁmi nivēiyaṁ rāiṇō silāvaḍaṇaniggaghāyamōhapaḍibuddhēṇa kaṭṭhuvāhaēṇa, jahā mahārāya, ēyassa bhayavaā uvāra kaṇāāva gaya
ṇacāriṇā vimukkā mahantī sigā; na cāliō bhayavaṁ taō vibhāgāō; tanivaḍaṇanigghāyaō samāgayā mē mucchā; taō paraṁ na
yāṇāmi, kiṁ kayaṁ tēṇa bhayavaō; ettiya puṇa jāṇāmi, ēyaṁ pi silāduyaṁ tēṇēva mahāpāvakammēṇa mukkaṁ ti.

ahō mahāduknamaguhūyaṁ bhayavayā, ahō kilittaṇaṁ khuḍḍajīvāṇaṁ, ahō vivēya
munnayā, ahō jahannattaṇaṁ, ahō nisaṁsayā, ahō alōiyattaṁ, ahō guṇapaōsō, ahō akallāṇabhāyaṇayā, ahō kammapariṇāmasāmatthaṁ,
jēṇa bhayavaō vi paricattasavvasaṅgasya savvabhāvayattiṇō sayalajaṇōvayāranirayassa appaḍibaddhavihāriṇō ēvamuvasaggakaraṇaṁ ti.
ēvaṁ vilaviūṇa ahō bhayavaō vi utrasaggō ti gahiō mahāsōēṇa.

taṁ ca tahāvihaṁ viyā
ṇaruṇa abhippēyajjhāṇasamattīē aṇāḍhaviūṇamannajjhāṇaṁ ōsaïriūṇa kāyaceṭṭhaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ bhayavayā.

lg.l: annaṁ ca suṇasu jīvō sakammapariṇāmaō vicittāī
tēṇēva u sappurisā kilē sabahulasta bhavasamudassa
mūḍhā tucchāṇa kaē daḍhaṁ kilissanti bhōyāṇa
taṁ natthi jaṁ na bahusō karenti visayāhilāsēṇa
taha vi ya puvvajjiyavivihakammapariṇāmaō u saṁpattī
pecchantā vi ya dhaṇiyaṁ vijjulayāḍōvacañcalaṁ jīyaṁ
ayarāmaraṁ va muṇiūṇa tahavi appāṇayaṁ mūḍhā
naraēsu kammavasaraṇa dāruṇaṁ suṇasu jaṁ maē dukkhaṁ
kandasu ya kumbhīmu ya lōhakavallīmu ya ghaṇāsu
sēsēsu vi narasu pavvaya jantēhi karagaēhiṁ ca
vahiō mhi mandabhaggō annēhi ya tivvasatthēhiṁ
kappēūṇa ya sahasā tilaṁ tilaṁ tattha nisyapālēhi
ukkhaṇiūṇa ya jīha virasaṁ bollāviō balā bhīō
taha pāiō rasantō tattāī ta uyatambasīsāī
tiriēmu vi saṁsārē asaī pattāi tivvadukkhāī
maṇuēmu vi ya narāhiba : parabasadāridda paṇḍagādīṇi
ēvaṁ na kiṁci ēyaṁ ti cayasu nikkāraṇaṁ sōyaṁ

p.s:
bhayatraṁ asōyaṇijō tuma, kō taē saphalō maṇuyajammō, pattaṁ vivēyāuhaṁ, niuttō vavasāō, thirīkō
appā, vijiō, bhāvasattū, vasīkayā tabasirī, ujjhiō pamāō, bōliyaṁ bhavagahaṇaṁ, pattappāō mokkhō ti.

sōyaṇijjō uṇa
sō kiliṭṭhusattō, jō bhayavaō uvasaggakāri tti.

mahārāya, iīsō ēsa saṁsārō; tā kimannacintāē, appā
ṇaya cintēhi.
āisaü bhayavaṁ, kassa uṇa samīvē ahaṁ sayalasaṅgacāyaṁ karēmi.

iō ya vāṇamaṁtarassa khīṇappāē ihabhavāuē udayābhimuhīhūyaṁ risivahapariṇāmasaṁciyaṁ amuhakamma, samuppannō tivyō vāhī, uva
hayāi indiyāī, paṇaṭṭhō niyasahāvō, uiṇṇā asuhavēyaṇā.

tō ya uvayarijamāṇō pasiddhōvakkamēṇa sahāvavivarīyayāē ahiyayaramakka
damāṇō aïniuṇavejjavayaṇēṇa appasiddhīvakkamēṇa viṭṭhāiviṭṭālaṇāikaṇṭayasayaṇīyasaṁgaō mahāmōhagamaṇēṇa paricattakandasadō gami
ūga kaṁci kālaṁ aïroddajjhāṇadōsēṇa maō samāṇō samuppannō mahātamāhihāṇāē niāyapuḍhavīē tettīsasāgarōvamāū nāragattāē ti.

bhayavaṁ pi vihariūṇa visuddhavihārēṇa sēviūṇa paramasaṁjama khaviūṇa kammarāsiṁ kāūga bhāvasalēhaṇaṁ bhāviūṇa bhāvaṇāō
khāmiūṇa savvajīvē gantūṇa pahāṇathaṇḍilaṁ bandiūṇa vīyarāgē rumbhiūṇa ceṭṭhāō kāūga mahāpayattaṁ pavannō pāyavōvargamaṇaṁ ti.

aṇupāliūṇa tamēgantaniraïyāraṁ vandijamāṇō muṇigaṇēhiṁ lōēṇa ubagijamā gō accharāhiṁ thuvyamāṇō dēvasaṁghāraṇa caïūṇa dēha
samuppannō savaṭṭhasiddhē mahāvimāṇē tettīsasāgarōvamāū dēvattāē tti.

atthi ihēva jambuddīvē dīvē bhārahē vāsē uttuṅgabhavaṇasaṁruddharavirahamaggā māṇikkamuttāhiragṇadhannāularundahaṭṭamaggā susanniviṭṭha
tiyacaükkacaṁcarā dēvaülavihārārāmamaṇḍiyā ujjēṇī nāma nayarī.

lg.l: pāyārēṇa piēṇa va piya vya gāḍhaṁ samavagūḍhā
sabō jīē surūvō sabō gugarayaṇabhūsiō niccaṁ
rēhanti jīē sīmā sarēhi naliṇīvaṇēhi ya sarāī
kamalēhi ya naliṇīō kamāi ya bhamaravandēhi
kitti vva tassa jāyā nimmalavamubhavā'kalaṅkā ya

p.s: ibhō ya sō savvasiddhamahāvimāṇavāsī dēvō ahāuyama gupāliūṇa taō cuō samāṇō samuppannō sundarīē kucchisi.

diṭṭhō ya tīē suviṇayaṁmi tīē cēva rayaṇīē pahāyasamayaṁmi paṇāsayantō timiraṁ maṇḍayantō nahasiri vibōhayantō kaïmalāyarē paṁgāsa
yantō jīvalōyaṁ vandijjamāṇō lōēhiṁ dhuvvamāṇō risigaṇēhiṁ ubagijjamāṇō kinnarēhiṁ agghijamāṇō lacchīē añcantapasanta
maṇḍalō nibandhaṇaṁ savakiriyāṇa cūḍāmaṇī udayadharāharassa savvuttamatēyarāsī diṇayarō vayaṇēṇamuyaraṁ pavisamāṇō tti.
taō sā ēvaṁ ti bhattāravayaṇamahiṇandiūṇa irisiyā cittēga.

tō visēsaō tivaggasaṁpāyaṇarayāē saṁpā
ḍiyasayalamaṇōrahāē abhaggamāṇapasaraṁ puṇṇahalamaṇuhavantīē pattō pasaïsamaō.

tō pasatthē tihikaraṇamuhuttajōē viṇā parikilē sēṇa
pasūyā ēsā.
nivēiō rāiṇō purisasīhassa harisanimbharāē siddhimahanāmāē sundaricēḍiyāē.

bhaṇiyā ya paḍihārī, jahā samāisamu ṇaṁ mama vayaṇēṇa jahāsannihiē paḍihārē, jahā
mōyāvēha mama rajjē kālaghaṇṭāpaōēṇa savvabandhaṇāṇi, davāvēha ghōsaṇāpuvvayaṁ aṇavekkhiyāṇurūvaṁ mahādāṇaṁ, visajjāvēha paümarāya
pamuhāṇa naravaīṇaṁ mama puttajammapaütti, nivēēha dēvīputtījammanbhudayaṁ paürāṇaṁ, kāravēha ayālachaṇanbhūyaṁ nayaramahasavaṁ ti.

samā
iṭṭhā ya tīē jahāiṭṭhaï paḍihārā.

ēvaṁ ca païdiṇaṁ mahantamāṇandasokkhamaṇuhavantassa samaï
cchiō paḍhamō māsō.
païṭāviyaṁ nāmaṁ dārayasta uciō ēsa ēyassa tti kaliūṇa sumiṇayadaṁsaṇēṇa piyāmahasantiyaṁ samarāiccō ti.

etthantaraṁmi sō vi vāṇamaṁtarajīvō nāraō taō narayāō uccaṭṭiūṇa nāṇāvihatiriēsu āhiṇḍiūṇa pāviūṇa dukkhāī
tahākammapariṇaïvasēṇa gōmāuattāē mariūṇa imīē cēva nayarīē pāṇavāḍayaṁmi gaṇṭhigābhihāṇassa pāṇassa jakkhadēvābhihāṇāē
bhāriyāē kucchisi samuppannō suyattāē tti.

sō ya kurūvō jaḍamaī
dukkhiō dāridō tti dukkhēṇa kālaṁ gamēi.

samarāiccō ya visiṭṭhuṁ puṇṇaphalamaṇuhavantō pubvabhavamukayavāsaṇāguṇēṇa bālabhāvē vi abālabhāvacariō sayalasatthakalāsaṁpattisundaraṁ
pattō kumārabhāvaṁ.

puvabhavamāsēṇa aṇurattō satyepnu cintaē ahiṇivē sēṇa, uppikśaē cittabhāvē nirūvēi samma gaḍēi tattajuttīē,
bhāvaē samabhāvēṇa, vaḍḍaē saddhāē, paüñjaē gōyaraṁmi, gacchaē saṁvēyaṁ.
ēvaṁ ca satyasaṁgayassa tattabhāvaṇāṇusaraṇavalēṇaṁ jāyaṁ jāisaraṇaṁ.

taō sō abhatthayāē kusalabhāvassa pahīṇayāē kammuṇō visuddhayāē nāṇassa hēyayāē visayāṇaṁ uvāēyayāē
pasamassa avijamāṇayāē dukkaḍayāṇaṁ ukkaḍayāē jīvavīriyassa āsanayāē siddhisaṁpattīē na bahu mannaē rāyalacchi, na ujjaō sarīrasa
kārē, na kīlaē cittakīlāhiṁ, na sēvara gāmadhammē, kēvalaṁ bhavavirattacittō suhajhāṇajōēṇaṁ kālaṁ gamēi ti.
taṁ ca tahāvihaṁ dadrūṇa samuppannā purisasīhassa cintā.

ahō ṇu khalu ēsa kumārō aṇanasarisē vi cittē sundarō vi rūvēṇa pattē
vipaḍhamajōvaṇē saṁgaō vi kalāhi pecchantō vi rāyakannayāōx nirubahaō vi dēhēṇa juttō vi indiyasirīē rahiō vi muṇidaṁsaṇēṇa
na chippaē jovvaṇaviyārēhi, na pecchaē addhacchipecchiēṇa, najaṁpaē khaliyavayaṇēhi, na sēvaē gēyāikalāō, na bahu mannaē bhūsaṇāī,
na gheppaē maraṇa, na muccaē ajavayāē, na patthara visayasokkhaṁ.

puṇṇasaṁbhārajuttō ya ēsō, jēṇa divō dēvīē
ēyasaṁbhavakālē pasatthamuviṇaō; gambhasaṁgaē ēyaṁmi natthi ja mē na saṁjāyaṁ.

aō bhaviyavvamēyassa mahāpaïṭṭhāē, pāviyanvamēyasaṁbandhēṇa
mamhēhiṁ pārattiyaṁ.

karēmi sē dullaliyagoṭṭhisaṁgaē nimmāē kalāhiṁ viyakkhaṇē raïkīlāmu ārāhaē paracittassa
addhāsiē mayaṇēṇa visiṭṭakulasamuppannē pahāṇamittē.
taō tēsiṁ saṁsaggīē saṁpāḍissaï mē paramapamōyaṁ ti.

cintiūṇa kayā kumārassa
dullaliyagōṭīcūḍāmaṇibhūyā muttimantā vitha mahumayaṇadōgundugāī asōyakāmakuralaliyaṅgayappamuhā pahāṇamittā.
tahā tumbhēhiṁ jaïyavvaṁ, jahā kumārō visiddhalōyamagaṁ pavajaï.

jaṁ dēvō āṇavēi ।
aïkkantā kaïi diyahā.

āḍhattō ya ṇēhiṁ mahurōvaka mēga, kumārō gāyanti maṇaharaṁ, pahanti gāhāō, pucchanti
vīṇāpaōē, pasaṁsanti nāḍayāī, viyārendhi kāmasatthaṁ, daṁsenti cittāī, vaṇṇēni sārasamihuṇayāī nindanti cakkāī, kuganti
itthikahaṁ, daṁsenti saravarāī, karenti jalakīḍaṁ, nivēsanti ujjāṇēsu, pasāhinti sundaraṁ, kīlanti ḍōlāhiṁ, raenti kusumasattharē
thuṇanti visamabāṇaṁ ti.

kumārō uṇa pavaṅkamāṇasaṁvēō ahō ēēsi mūḍhayā! kahaṁ puṇa ēē paḍibōhiyanca tti uvāyacintāparō
uparōhasīlayāē paḍikūlamabhaṇamāṇō ciṭṭhaï.

tēsiṁ paḍibōhaṇatthaṁ tu kiṁci nāḍayapecchaṇāi
abbhuvagayaṁ kumārēja, vaḍiyā pīī, nīyā ya paramavīsatthayaṁ.
annayā ya ēsa ettha visayāhiō uvāō ti mantiūṇa paropparaṁ kaō asōēṇa kāmasatthapasaṅgō.

kāmasatthabhaṇiyapaōyannuṇō
hi purisassa sadāracittārāhaṇa saṁrakkhaṇēṇa suddhasuyabhāvō visuddhadāṇāikiriyāpasiddhīē ya mahantō dhammō.

aṇurattadārasuddhasuēhitō
ya tayaṇubandhaphalasārā saṁpajjanti atthakāmā; vivajjaē uṇa tiṇhaṁ pi vivajjō.

jaō aṇārāhaṇēṇa dāracittassa na paramatthaō
saṁrakkhaṇaṁ, asaṁrakkhaṇē ya tassa asuddhamuyabhāvaō tēsi nirayāijōyaṇāē visuddhadāṇāikiriyābhāvō mahantō ahammō, aṇaṇurattadārā
visuddhasuēhitō ya paṇassanti atthakāmā, na ya kāmasatthabhaṇiyapaōyaparināṇarahiō niyamēṇa sadāracittaṁ ārāhēi tti.

ēēṇa kāra
ṇēṇaṁ tivaggasāhaṇaparaṁ kāmasatthaṁ ti.
yānidarisaṇaparaṁ ti; na jaō kāmābhāvē dhammatthāṇamannaṁ phalaṁ, na ya niṣphalattē tēsiṁ purisatthayā.

na ya mokkhaphalasāhagattaṇēṇaṁ saphalā
imē, jaō alōiō mokkhō samāhibhāvaṇājhāṇapagarisaphalō ya.

jaï ēvaṁ, tā karēu
pasāyaṁ kumārō; sāhēu, kimettha sōhaṇayaraṁ ti.
bhō na tumbhēhiṁ kuppiyadhvaṁ, bhaṇāmi ahamettha paramatthaṁ.

savvēhi
bhaṇiyaṁ kumāra, annāṇanāsaṇē kō kōyō.
karēu pasāyaṁ kumārō, bhaṇāu paramatthaṁ ti.

kāmasatthaṁ
khu paramatthō karentasuṇentaya ṇamannāṇapayāsaṇaparaṁ, jaō kāmā asundarā payaīē viḍambaṇā jaṇāṇaṁ visōvamā paribhōē vacchalā
kuceṭṭhiyassa.

ēēhiṁ ahihūyā pāṇiṇō mahāmōhadōsēṇa na pecchanti paramatthaṁ, na muṇanita hiyāhiyāī, na viyāranti kajja, na cintanti
āyaī.

jēṇa kāmiṇō sayā'suiēsu asuddanibandhaṇēsu kalamalabhariēsu mahilāyaṇaṅgēsu candakundendīvarēhitō vi ahiyayararammabuddhīē
ahilāsāirēgēṇa asuiē viya gaḍasūyarā dhaṇiyaṁ payaṭṭanti; aō na pecchanti paramatthaṁ.

jaō ya dullahē maṇuyajammē laddhē kanmapariṇaīē
sāhaē suddhadhammassa cañcalē payaīē saṁsārabaddhaṇēsu nivvāṇavērisu bālabahumaēsu buhayaṇagarahiēsu sajjanti kāmēsuḥ aō na muṇanti
hiyāhiyāī.

jaō ya asantēsu vi imēsu kāmasaṁpāḍaṇanimittaṁ niṣphalaṁ ubhayalōēmu kuṇanti cittaceṭṭhiyaṁ, khamanti akkhamāē,
kilissanti akilisiyavvaṁ thuṇanti athōyavvāī, jhāyanti ajjhāiyavvāī, aō na viyārenti kajjaṁ.

jō ya uvahasanti saccaṁ,
kuṇanti kandappaṁ, nindanti guruyaṇaṁ, cayanti kusalamaggaṁ, havanti ōhasaṇijjā, pāvanti, ummāyaṁ, nindijanti lōēṇaṁ, gacchanti
naraēmuaō na pecchanti āyaī.

ihalōē cēva kāmā kāraṇaṁ vahabandhaṇāṇa, kulaharaṁ issāē, nivāsō aṇuvasamassa, khētaṁ
visāyabhayāṇa, abhō cēva nindiyā dhammasatthēsu.

ēvaṁvaṭṭhiē samāṇē nirūvēha majjhatyabhāvēṇa, kaha ṇu kāmasatthaṁ avigalativagga
sāhaṇaparaṁ ti jaṁ ca bhaṇiyaṁ kāmasatyamaṇiyapaōyannuṇō hi purisassa sayāracittārāhaṇasaṁrakkhaṇēṇa suddhasuyabhāvaō visuddhadāṇāi
kiriyāpasiddhīē ya mahantō dhammo tti, ēyaṁ pi na juttisaṁgayaṁ.
jō na kāmasatyabhaṇiyapōyanna vi purisō niyamēṇa sadāraci.
dīsanti khalu imēsi pi vahicarantā dārā.

nayāsamprapaōyajaṇiō taō bahicārō tti juttamāsakiuṁ, na jaō
ettha nicchaē pamāṇaṁ.
dīsaï ya tappaōyannū ēgadāracittārāhaṇaparō vi annasa tamagārāhayantō, apaōyanna vi yārāhayantō tti.

jaṁ pi vejjagōdāharaṇēṇa ettha jāijutti bhaṇanti, sā vi ya payaïnigguṇa taṇēṇa kāmāṇa jīviyatthiṇō khagga
siracchēkiriyāvihāṇajuttitulla tti na bahumayā buhāṇaṁ.
ēvaṁ suddhasuyabhārī visuddhadāṇāikiriyāpasiddhī ya vabhicāriṇī dīsanti.
kāmasatthaparāṇaṁ pi suyā akulaüttayā payaīē bhupaṅgamāyā ceṭṭhiēṇa.

aṇurattadārāī pi ya niravekkhāṇi dāṇāikiriyāsu, tucchayāṇi
payaīē, ahiyaṁ vivajjayakārīṇi.

aō jaṁ pi jaṁpiyaṁ aṇurattadārāsuddhasuēhiṁtō ya tayaṇubaddhaphala sārā saṁpa janti atthakāma tti,
taṁ pi ya asamañjasamēva.

ēvaṁ ca ṭhiē samāṇē jaṁ pi bhaṇiya vivajaē uga tiṇhaṁ pi vivajaō tti iccēvamāi, taṁ pi parihariyamēva,
vabhicāradōsēṇa samāṇō khu ēsaü.
ihaī na hi na kāmasatthabhaṇiyapaōyannuṇō vi ēsō na hōi.

aō na tagvijayanimittō khalu
ēsō, avi ya akusalāṇubandhikammōdayanimittō, vivajaō vi akusalāṇubandhi kammōdayanimittō ti niratthayaṁ kāmasatyaṁ.

tahā jaṁ
ca bhaṇiyaṁ ēyaṁ tu sōhaṇayaraṁ, dhammatthāṇa sāphallayānidarisaṇaparaṁ kāmasatthaṁ ti, na jaō kāmābhāvē dhammatthāṇamannaṁ phalaṁ, na ya niṣpha
lattē tēsiṁ purisatyayā, na ya mokṣaphalasāhagattēṇa saphalā imē, jaō alōiō mokkhō samāhibhāvaṇājhāṇapagarisaphalō ya tti,
ēyaṁ puṇa asōhaṇayaraṁ.

jaō pāmāgahiyakaṇḍuyaṇapāyā kāmā virasayarā avasāṇē bhāvandhayārakāriṇō asuhakammaphalabhūyā kahēṁ
dhammatthāṇa phalaṁ ti, kaī vā tahāvihāṇaṁ dhammatthāṇa purisatthayā, jē jaṇenti kāmē nāsenti uvasamaṁ kuṇanti amittasaṁgamāṇi atra
ṇenti savvavasāya saṁpāḍayanti agāyaïṁ abapūranti sōyaṁ vihenti lāghavāī ṭhāventi appaccayaṁ haranti appamāyapāṇē kārenti aṇuvā
ēyaṁ ti.

jaṁpi ya sarīraṭṭhiihēubhāvēṇa āhārasadhammāṇō kāmā parihariyavvā ya etya dōsa ti mōhadōsēṇa bhaṇanti mandabuddhiṇō, taṁ
pi na hu buhanaṇamaṇōharaṁ.

jī viṇā vi ēēhiṁ muṇiyatattāṇaṁ pecchamāṇāṇa jahābhāvamēva bōṁdiviratāṇa tīē suddhajjhāṇāga risīṇa
dīsaha sarīraṭṭhiī sēvamāṇāṇa vi ya tē tajaṇiyapāvamōhēṇa accantasēvaṇaparāṇaṁ khayādirōgabhāṣaō viṇāsō tti.

tā kahaṁ tē sarīra
hiihēyavō, kahaṁ vā āhārasadhammāṇō ti.
na ya ēyasaṁgayā dōsā aparivattēhiṁ ērahiṁ abhinnanivandhamattēṇa tīranti parihari.
na khalu mottaṇa mōhē kāmāṇamaṇuvasamāīṇa ya annaṁ nimittaṁ ti cintēha cittēṇa.

ēvaṁvadvira samāṇē na hi hariṇā vijanti tti javā
na parijanti' ēvamādi pahasaṇappāyaṁ kāmasatyavayaṇaṁ.
tamhā na kāmaphalāṇa dhammatyāṇa purisatthayā, avi ya mokkhaphalāṇamēva.

na ya alōiō mokkhō; jō vibhiṭṭamuṇilōyalōiō, rahiō jammāiē hiṁ, vajiō āvāhāē, samattī sanaka jāṇaṁ, pagarisō muha
ssa.
samāhi bhāvaṇājhāṇādaō vi na hi na dhammasarūvā, avi ya tē cēva bhāvadhammō.

iyaśē vi nirōhaspa tapphalō cēva havaï, annahā
garahiyāṇi iṭāpūyāṇi ti bhāviyavvaṁ satthavayaṇaṁ.

payaīē pasiddhā tiriyāṇaṁ pi mālā sarū
vēṇaṁ.

jaṁ pi bhaṇiyaṁ vālāsaṁpaōō parāhīṇōti uvāyaṁ avekkhaḥ, uvāyapaḍibattī ya kāmasatthāō,
tiriyāṇaṁ tu aṁgāvariyā ithijāī riukālē ya niyamiyā pavittī abuddhipuyāya ti, ēvaṁ pi mōhapisuṇayaṁ; jō uvāēyā cēva
na havanti kāmā asundarā payaīē viḍambagā jaṇāṇa visōvamā paribhōē vacchalā kubēḍiyarasa tti daṁsiyaṁ maē.

aō adanādāṇagahaṇa
visayasatthakappaṁ khu ēyaṁ ti.

lg.l: taṁ nāma hōḍa satthaṁ jaṁ hiyamatthaṁ jaṇassa daṁsēi
jaṁ puṇa ahiyaṁ ti sayā taṁ naṇu kattoccayaṁ satthaṁ
ahiyā tō pavittō hōi ajaṁmi mandabuddhīṇaṁ
iharā pējalaï cciya vamaha jalagō jaṇasta hiyayaṁmi
tā jaṁ kāmuddīraṇasamatyametthaṁ na taṁ buhajaṇēṇa
sumiṇē vi jaṁpiyavvaṁ pasaṁsiyavvaṁ ca duvyayaṇaṁ

p.s: ēvaṁ ca ṭhiē samāṇē alaṁ dubbayaṇasaṁgayāē kāmasatthacintāē tti.
ahō vivēgō kumārassa, ahō bhāvaṇā, ahō bhavavirāō, ahō kayannuyā.
sacahā na īisō muṇijaṇassa vi pariṇāmō hōi, kiṁ tu phuḍaṁ pi jaṁpamāṇō dūmēē ēsa amhē tti.

kumāra,
ēvamēyaṁ, kiṁ tu savvamēva lōyamaggāīyaṁ jaṁpiyaṁ kumārēṇa.

na aṇāsē viē lōyamaggē imīē vi
ahigārō tti.
tā lōyamaggaṁ paḍucca kiṁparaṁ puṇa kāmasatthaṁ ti sāhēu kumārō.

sōhaṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ asōēṇa laliya
gaēṇa bhaṇiya.
bhada, aparamatthapicchō pāēṇa lōō bhinnaī ya.

tā na
taṁ maggēṇa imassa ahaṁ kiṁpi parayaṁ avēmi.

savvahā kandappiyāṇa bālāṇamaviṇōyaviṇōyapāyaṁ ēyaṁ, jō kāmasuhāī pi kammapariṇāma
nibandhaṇāī jīvāṇaṁ, viuṇē ya taṁmi na paramatthēṇa imiṇā paōyaṇaṁ ti.
tavassippāō kumārō, kahaṁ amhārisēhiṁ visaēsu payaṭṭāviuṁ tīraï.
uvarōhasīlō khu ēsō, paḍivanā ya amhē imēṇa mittā.

tā abbhatthemha ēvaṁ kalattasaṁgahamantarēṇa, kayāi saṁpāḍēi
amhāṇaṁ samīḍiyaṁ ti.
ṭhāviūṇa siddhantaṁ samāgaē avasarē bhaṇiyaṁ asōēṇa.

bhō kumāra, pucchāmi ahaṁ bhavantaṁ, kimettha jīvalōē
supurisēṇa mittavaccha lēṇa hōyavvaṁ kiṁvā nahi.

jō khalu saṁjōiō appaṇā dissamāṇō attāhiyaṁ aṇuyatti jamāṇō payaīē sēvijamāṇō
païdiṇaṁ lālijamāṇō jattēṇa viloṭṭara vihuraṁmi, nāvekkhaï sukayāī, na rakkhaï vayaṇijjaṁ, pariccaï khaṇēṇa; ēsa ēyārisō aṇusama
yasēviyaparicāī nāma jahannamittō.

jō uga jahākahaṁci saṁgaō dissamāṇō attabuddhīē aṇuyattijamāṇō ajattēṇa sēvijamāṇōṁ vibhāē
lālijjamāṇō ūsavāiēsu takkhaṇaṁ na visaṁvayaï, vihurē avekkhaï īsi sukayāī, rakkhaï maṇāgaṁ vayaṇijja, pariccayaï vilāvapubvayaṁ
vilambēṇa; ēsa ēyārisō chaṇasēviyapariccāī nāma majjhimamittō.

jō uṇa ajattēṇa diṭṭhābhaṭṭhō bahu mannaē sukayaṁ, uvāgacchaē metti,
payaṭṭaē uvayārē, mōyāvaē duhāō, jaṇēi gōravaṁ, vaḍi māṇaṁ, karēi saṁpayaṁ, vihēi sokkhaṁ, na paricayaï āvayāē; ēsa ēyārisō jō
kāramettēṇē sēviyāpariccāī nāma uttimamittō tti.

ēvaṁṣahiē samāṇē supurisēṇālōciūṇa niyamaīē savvahā uttimamittavacchalēṇa
hōyavvaṁ ti.
naṇu ēvamēva etyāhippāō, jaṁ jahannamajjhimē caïūṇa uttimō sēvijaï tti.

bhō na ēyamujjuyaṁ, gambhīraṁ khu
ēyaṁ na visēsaō avivariyaṁ jāṇīyaï.
tā vivarēhi saṁpayaṁ, kē uṇa imē tiṇṇi mittā.

bhō jaï nāvagayaṁ tumhāṇaṁ,
tā suṇaha saṁpayaṁ.
ettha khalu paramatyamittē paḍucca pasiṇō uttaraṁ ca junjaïtti jaṁpiyaṁ maē.

pasiddhaṁ tu lōiyaṁ,kō vā savē yaṇō tayatthaṁ na
yāṇaï.
tatya jahannamittō dēhō, majjhimō sayaṇō, uttamō dhammō tti.

jēṇa dēhō nahātahōvacarijamāṇō
vi aṇusamayamēva daṁsēi viyārē, aśyiākhasaṁgayaṁ aṇuyattaï jaraṁ, carimāvayāē ya ujjhaï nirālambaṁ ti; ēsa jahannamittō.

sayaṇō
uṇa mamattāṇurūvaṁ karēi paḍimamattaṁ, kilissaï gilāṇāikajjē, paricayaï gayajīyasāraṁ, sumaraï ya patthāsu, ēsa majjhimamittō tti.
dhammō uṇa saṁgaō jahākahaṁci vacchalō ēgantēṇa avisāī bhaēsu nimbāhaē mittayaṁ ti; ēsa uttamō.

ēvaṁ ca nāūṇa adhuvē visaya
sokkhē asārē payaīē mōhaṇē paramatthassa dāruṇē vivāē abahīriē dhīrēhiṁ, pāviē māṇusattē uttamē bhavāṇa dullahē bhavāḍavīē sukhettē
guṇadhaṇāṇa sāhaē nidhāṇassa ujjhiūṇa mōhaṁ cintiūṇāyaī acintacintāmaṇisannihē vīyarāyappaṇīē uvādēē niyamēṇa hōha vacchalā
sappurisasē viē uttamamittē dhammē tti ।.

ēyaṁ muṇamāṇāṇa tahābhabvayāē asōyāīṇa vicittayāē kammapariṇāmassa kumārasannihāṇasāma
tthēṇa visuddhayāē jōyāṇa ukaḍayāē vīriyassa viyambhiō kusalapariṇāmō, viyaliō kilikammarāsī, avagayā mōhavāsaṇā, tuṭṭā
asuhāṇubandhā, jāō kammagaṇṭhibhēō, khaōvasamamuvagayaṁ micchattaṁ, āvihūō sammattapariṇāmō.
kumāra, ēvamēyaṁ, na etya saṁdēhō, sōhaṇa samāiṭṭha kumārēṇaṁ.

ahavā iyamēva ēka
sōhaṇaṁ, natthi annaṁ sōhaṇaṁ ti.

kiṁ bahugā, annāṇanidāpasuttā paḍibōhiyā amhē kumārēṇa, daṁsiyāī hēōvā
dēyāī.

kumāra, sāhu jaṁpiyaṁ laliyaṅgaēṇa; tā samāisaü kumārō,
jamamhēhi kāyavvaṁ ti.

ujjhiyayō visayarābhō, ciniya bhavasarūpaṁ, vajjiyavvā kusaṁsaggī,
sēviyavvā sāhuṇō; tō jahāsattīē dāṇa pīlatabhāvaṇāpahāṇēhiṁ hōyavvaṁ ti.
bhō dhannā khu tumbhē pāviyaṁ tumhēhiṁ phalaṁ maṇuya jammasta.

kumāra sāhu, ēvamēyaṁ dhannā khu
amhē, na khalu ahanāṇa kumāradasaṇaṁ saṁpajaï.

ēvaṁ cāhiṇandiruṇa kumāraṁ saṁpūiyā visē sēṇa kumārēṇa uciyāē vē lāē gayā saṭṭhāṇāī
asōyāī.

etthantaraṁmi samāgaō mahusamaō, viyambhiyā vaṇasirī, mañjariśrō cūyaniyarō, kusumiyā tilayāī, ullasiyā aïmuttayā,
pavattō malayāṇilō, muiyaṁ bhamarajālaṁ, pasariō parahuyāravarē; jahiṁ ca mama mittara jamimaṁ ti uttugō kayatthēi bālavuṭṭhuṁ pi mayaṇō,
sisirasattuvigamēṇa viya viyasiyakamalava yaṇā kamaliṇī,mahusamāgamasu hēṇa viya paṇanamāō janti jāmigīō, uulacchidasaṇapasattā
viya tahā parimantharagamaṇā vāsarā; jahiṁ ca agdhaē navaraṅgaya, bahumayā pasannā, vahanti ḍōlāō, sēvijanti kāṇaṇāī, maṇaharō
candō, ahimaō gēyavihī, vaṭṭanti pēraṇāī, piyānō kāmiṇīō; jahiṁ ca visēsujala nēvacchāī kīlanti taruṇavandrāī, bhamanti mahā
vibhūīē dēvayāṇaṁ pi rahavarā, mayaṇavāha bhaēṇa viya saragāī alliyabhi piyayamēsu piyāō.

ēvaṁvihē ya mahusamaē rāigō purisasī.
hassa nayaricchaṇadasaṇanimittaṁ samāgayā nayarimahantayā.

dēva, dēvē naravaïṁmi niccacchaṇō nayarīē; tahāvi samā
gaō mahusamabhō tti vivihacacarīdaṁsaṇēṇa dēvapasāyalāliyāṇaṁ payāṇaṁ chaṇāō vi garuyaṁ chaṇantaraṁ karēu dēvō nāyarayāṇaṁ ti.

tā kumāraṁ ettha niuñjāmi, jēṇa tahā vicittasaṁsāraviyāradasaṇēṇa
saṁjāyarasantarō saṁpāḍēi mē pariyaṇassa ya samīhiyāhiyaṁ sokkhaṁ ti.

bhō saṁpāḍiyā mama tumbhēhiṁ bahusō
niyavibhūidaṁsaṇēṇa nivvuī, ahaṁ puṇa tumhāṇa kumāradasaṇēṇa ahiyaṁ saṁpāḍēmi.

annaṁ ca, saṁparya kumārō etya kāraṇapurisō; tā taṁmi
cēva bahumāṇō kāyayō tti.

annaṁ ca, dēvapasāyāō vi ēsa mahāpasāō jahiṁ kumāradasaṇaṁ
ti.
rāiṇā vi sahāviō kumārō, bhaṇiō ya sabahumāṇaṁ.

vaccha, ṭhiī ēmā imīē nayarīē, jaṁ mayaṇamahūsavē
daṭṭavvāō nayaricaccarīō rāiṇā, diṭṭhāō ya maē aṇēgasō.

saṁpayaṁ puṇa aṇugantavvō gurusamaṇugō maggō tti tēṇēva vihiṇā tuma
pi pecchāhi.
ēvaṁ ca kaē samāṇē mamaṁ pariyaṇassa nāyarayāṇa ya mahantō pamōō havaï.
tō hariliō rāyā, dinā samāṇattī paḍihārāṇaṁ.

harē bhaṇaha mama vayaṇāō nāṇagabbhapamuhē pahāṇasacivē, jahā nayaricchaṇaca
carīdaṁsaṇasuhaṁ saṁjattēha rahabarāiyaṁ kumārassa, mama vayaṇāō nāyarayāiparibhōsanimittaṁ rāyapayavattiṇā gantavvamajē ṇēṇē chaṇacaccarī
dasaṇanimittaṁ ti.

jaṁ dēvō āṇavēi tti bhaṇiūṇa kumārō ajja chaṇacaccarīō pekkhissaï, bhaviyāmamhāṇaṁ pikallāṇēṇaṁ ti hari
siyamaṇēhiṁ turiyaturiyaṁ nivēiyā samāṇattī paḍihārēhiṁ.
ahō bhaviyavamettha paramāṇandēṇaṁ ti āṇandiyā sacivāḥ.

tayaṇantaraṁ ca sajiō rahabarō, kayā jantajōyā, nivēsiyaṁ āyavattaṁ, dināō vējayantīō, nibaddhaṁ kiṅki
ṇījālaṁ, niviṭṭhāī rayaṇadāmāī, ōlambiyā muttāhārā, viraïyāō maṇitārayāō, uvagappiyaṁ āsaṇaṁ, lambiyā cāmarōūlā.

ettha
ntaraṁmi imaṁ vaïyaramavayacchiūṇa visēsujjala nēvacchāī saharisaṁ samāgayāī pāyamūlāī, kuṅkumakhōyabhariēhiṁ kacōlēhiṁ vasantanēvacchadhārī
maṇḍayantō viya chaṇaṁ miliō bhuyaṅgalōmō, vicittajāgārūḍhā saṁgaēṇaṁ pariyaṇēṇaṁ pamōyaviyapantalōyaṇaṁ kumāradasaṇūmuyatēṇa upatthiyā
rāyaüttā, dhavalaharanijjūhaēhiṁ chagāisayadasaṇatyaṁ ōisiyathalanaliṇisōhāī viṇiggayavayaṇakamalaṁ ṭhiyāī antē ugaī.
dēva, saṁpāḍiyaṁ kumāramantarēṇa dēvasāsaṇaṁ; saṁparya dēvō pamāṇaṁ ti.
vaccha, karēhi mahāyurisakaraṇijaṁ vaḍḍēhi ūsavaṁ nāyarayāṇaṁ.

paṇami
ūṇa saha aṁsōyāiēhiṁ payahō rahāhi puhaṁ ahigandi jamāṇō antēurēhiṁ paṇamijjamāṇō rāya uttēhiṁ thutramāṇō bhuyaṅgalōēṇa pulaïjjamāṇō
pāyamūlēhiṁ pattō raha pamīvaṁ, ārūḍhō rahavarē, uvaviṭṭhō pahāgāsaṇaṁmi.

ajja
sārāha, cāēāha āhamayadasagamaṇa paï turaṅgamē.
ja dēvō āṇa vēi tti bhaṇiūṇa cōiyā turaṅgamā.

etthantaraṁmi samuddhāiō jayajayāravō,
pahayaṁ gamaṇaturaṁ, caliyā rāyaüttā, paṇacciyāi, pāyamūlāī, ullasiyā bhuyaṅgā, khuhiō pecchayajaṇō, pavattā kēlī, vimbhiō kuṅku
maraō.
ēvaṁ ca mahayā vimadēṇa pecchamāṇō satyamēya saṁvēgabhāviyamaī samōigaṇō rāyamaggaṁ kumārō.

pattō pecchiuṁ caccarīō nāṇā
vihāō riddhivisēsasōhiyāō juttā viyaḍḍavinbhamēhiṁ tiyasacaccarīsamāō saṁgayāō harisēga vajantēhiṁ vivihatūrēhiṁ maṇaharāō
lōyasta saṁvēgajagaṇīō buhāṇa.

pecchamāṇō ahō mōhasāmatthaṁ, ahō ajadhīrayā, ahō pamāyaceṭṭhiyaṁ, ahō adīhadarisiyā, ahō
aṇālōyagataṁ, ahō asuhabhāṣaṇā, ahō apittajōō, ahō saṁsāravilasiyaṁ ti cintayantō pacaḍḍamāṇēga saṁvēēṇa viyārayantō kammāī,
bhāvayantō kusala jōē visujjhamāṇēṇa nāṇēga pulaï jamāṇō caccarīhiṁ jaṇintō tāsi tōsaṁ nirūvayantō pēraṇāī dēva peccha ēyaṁ
ti bhaṇi jamāṇō sārahiṇā aïga bhō kaṁci bhūmibhāgaṁ.

diṭṭhōya ṇēṇa dēvaülapīḍhiyāē aïbī icchadasaṇī asuiṇā dēhēṇa galantabhāsuravayaṇō saṁkuciēhiṁ hatthēhiṁ usmūṇacalaṇajuyalō paṇa
dvāē nāsiyāē viṇiggayatambanayaṇō pariṁgaō macchiyāhiṁ mahāvāhigahiō kōi purisō tti.

taṁ ca daṭṭhūṇa ahō kammapariṇatti
karuṇāpavannahiyaraṇa paḍibōhaṇanimittaṁ jaṇasamūhassa bhaṇiō sārahī.
ajja sārahi, aha kiṁ puṇa imaṁ pēraṇaṁ ti.

dēva,
na khalu ēyaṁ pēraṇaṁ, ēsō khu vāhigahiō purisō tti.
ajja, aha kō uga imō vāhī.

dēva, jō
sundaraṁ pi sarīraṁ ayālēṇa ēvaṁ viṇāsēi.
ajja, duṭṭhō khu ēsō ahiō lōyassa; tā kīsa tāō aïyaṁ visahaï.

arē rē
duvāhi, mucca, muśca, ēyaṁ ṭhēāhi vā jujjhasanjō tti bhaṇamāṇō uḍhiō rahavarāō, payaṭṭō tassa samuhaṁ.

hā kimēyaṁ ti uvasantāō
caccarīō, miliyā nāyarayā ।payaṁpiō sārahī.

dēva, na khalu vāhī nāma kōi duṭṭhupurisōniggahārihō naravaīṇa, avi ya jīvāṇamēva
sakammapariṇāmajaṇiō saṁkilēsavisēsō.
tā appaha ēyassa rāiṇō, sāhāraṇō khu ēsō sabajīvāṇa.

kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ana sārahi, ēēṇa gahiō vi ēsō caïūṇa niyabalaṁ amaṇōramāē
ēyamavatthāē kīsa ēvaṁ ciṭṭhaï.

dēva, īisō, cēva ēsō vāhī; jēṇa ēēṇa gahiyassa paṇassaï balaṁ, asōhaṇā
avatthā, dukkhaphalaṁ ceṭṭhiyaṁ ti.
kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ajja sārahi, kassa uṇa ēsō na pahavaï.

sārahiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ dēva, paramatyēṇa dhamma
paccha sēviṇō ahammāpacchavirayassa kassaï mahābhāgassa.
ajja sārahi jaï ēvaṁ, tā kō uṇa iha uvāō.
dēva, khettaṁ vāhiṇō pāṇiṇō, paramatthēṇa natthi uvāō maüttūṇaṁ dhammatigicchaṁ.

bhō jaï ēvaṁ, tā sabyasāhāraṇē payaīē avayāraē ēgantēṇa vijjamāṇō
vāē acintiūṇa ēvaṁ alamimiṇā nacciēṇa, uvāē cēva khalu juttō jattō ti.

dēva, ēvamēyaṁ tahāvi lōyadiī ēsā
tā na juttaṁ dēvassa sayalanāyarayāṇa pattē mahūsavē atyāṇē rasabhaṅgakaraṇaṁ.

dēva, juttaṁ bhaṇiyamēēhi tā vihipē
raṇāī tāva pekmaü dēvō tti.
taō pavattāō caccarīō, pecchamāṇō ya kumārō gaō kaṁci bhūmibhāga.

diṭṭhaṁ ca ṇēṇa niyagharōvariṭṭhiyaṁ nimaṇaṁ savvaṅgaēsu accantasiḍhilagattaṁ paṇaṭṭhēhiṁ sirōruhēhiṁ pagalantalōyaṇaṁ kampamāṇēṇa dēhēṇa
vajiyaṁ dasaṇāvalīē saṁgayaṁ kāsasāsēhiṁ parihūyaṁ pariyaṇēṇa jarāpariṇayaṁ seṭṭhimihuṇayaṁ ti.

taṁ ca dadrūṇa ahō asārayā saṁsārassa tti
pavaḍḍamāṇasaṁvēēṇa paḍibōhaṇanimittamēva bhaṇiō sārahī.
ajja sārahi, aha kiṁ puṇa imaṁ pēraṇaṁ ti.

dēva, na khalu ēyaṁ
pēraṇaṁ, ēvaṁ khu jarāpīḍiyaṁ sēhimihuṇayaṁ ti.
ajja, aha kā uṇa ēsā jarā bhaṇṇaï.

dēva, jā
ajiṇṇaṁ pi sarīraṁ kālēṇa ēvaṁ karēi.
ajja, duṭṭā khu ēsā ahiyā lōyassaḥ tā kōsa tāō ēyaṁ uvekkhaï.

jaṇapaḍibōhaṇatthaṁ ca maggiūṇa khaggaṁ
ā pāvē duṭṭajarē, muśca muśca ēyaṁ seṭṭhimihuṇayaṁ, itthiyā tuma, kimavaraṁ bhaṇiyasi tti bhaṇamāṇō samuḍiō rahavarāō, payaṭṭō taya
bhimuhaṁ.
hā kimēyamavaraṁ ti uvasantāō caccarīō, miliyā puṇō jaṇā.

dēva, na hi jarā nāma kāi vigga
habaī itthiyā, jā ēvamuvalambhārihā dēvassa, kiṁtu sattāṇamēvōrāliyasaïrīriga kālabasēṇa pariṇaī ēsā.

aō na uvalambhārihā
dēvassa, pāhāraṇā ya ēsā ēēsi dēhīṇaṁ.
ajja sārahi, aō paraṁ avagaō mara imīē bhāvatyō abhavaṇavihī ya, tā bhaṇāmi ajja nayarijaṇaṁ ca.

na kāyavvō
khēō,kiṁ juttamēyāē paṇāsaṇīē pōrusassa avayāriṇīē dhammatyakāmāṇa jaṇaṇīē parihavassa saṁbaddhaṇīऍōhasaṇijabhāvāṇa pahavantīē
vi mottūṇa dhammarasāyaṇaṁ iyamēvaṁvihaṁ asamañjasaṁ ceṭṭhiyaṁ ti.

ēyaṁ ca saüūṇa ahō kumārassa vivēō, ahō paramatthadarisiyā; na ettha
kiṁci annārisaṁ, kēvalaṁ pahavaï mahāmōho tti cintiūṇa samaṁ nayarijaṇavaraṇa saṁviggō sārahī.
tahāvi aṇādibhavanbhatthā mōhavāsaṇā na tīraē caïḍaṁ ti.

dāru
ṇavivāō vāhī rōhā ya pāvā jarā havanti kilēsapāyaō niyāmēṇa pāṇiṇō bhaṇiyamajjēṇa, atthi ya paḍivakkhō ēyāsi dhamma
caraṇaṁ ti.
tō divivāyāṇa vi na taṁmi jattō tti aüvyā mōhavāsaṇā.

etthantaraṁmi diṭṭhō kumārēṇa nāidūrēṇa nīyamāṇō samārōviō jarakhaṭṭāē samotthō juṇṇavatthēṇa ukkhi tō dīṇapurisēhiṁ sadukkha
kaïvayabandhusaṁgaō ruyamāṇēṇa itthiyājaṇēṇa akendamāṇāē pattīē pulōijjamāṇō jagēṇa pañcattamuvagō dariddapurisō tti.
ajja sārahi, alaṁ tāva mōhavāsaṇācintāē; sāhēhi majjha, kiṁ puṇa imaṁ pēraṇaṁ ti.
na ya na-yāṇaï imaṁ pavañca pēsō.
amhārisajaṇavibōhaṇatthaṁ tu tatkēmi ēsa ēvaṁ ceṭṭaï.
tā imaṁ etya pattayālaṁ, sāhēmi ēvaṁ jahaṭṭhiya ti.
dēva, na khalu ēyaṁ pēraṇaṁ, ēsō khu maccupatthō purisō tti.
ajja, aha kō uṇa imō maccū.

sārahiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ ।
dēva, jēṇa ghatthō purisō bandhavēhi pi ēvaṁ paricayaï.

ajja, duṭṭō khu ēsō ahiō laüyassa; tā kīsa tāō ēvaṁ
na vahēi.

arē rē dudrumaccu, muśca muśca ēyaṁ ṭhāhi vā jujjhasajjō tti bhaṇamāṇō uḍhiō rahavarāō, payaṭṭō tassa saṁmuhaṁ
bhaṇiō ya sārahiṇā.

dēva, na khalu maccū nāma kōi duṭṭhupurisō nimgaḍārihō rāīṇaṁ, avi ya jīvāṇamēva sakammapariṇāmajaṇiō dēha
paricāyadhammō.
tā appahū ēyassa rāyāṇō, sāhāraṇō khu ēsō sambajīvāṇa.
ajja sārahi, ēēṇa ghattha pi kīsa ēē bandhavā ēvaṁ pariccayanti.

dēva,
kimēiṇā saṁpayaṁ, gaō khu ēsō ettha kāraṇabhūō.

ajja sārahi, jaī ēvaṁ,
tā kīsa ēē bandhavā vilavanti.
kumāra, piō khu ēsō ēēsiṁgō dīhajattāē adaṁsaṇamiyāṇi.

ēēṇa sari
ūṇa sukayāī sōyabharapīḍiyā acayantā nirumbhiuṁ avijamāṇōvāyantarā ya ēvaṁ vilavanti.

kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ aja sārahi, jaï
piō, kīsa imaṁ nāṇugacchanti.

dēva, asakamēyaṁ na kahēi gacchantō, nāvekkhaē siṇēhaṁ, na dīsaï appaṇā, na
najjaē thāma, vicittā kammapariṇaī, agavaṭṭhiyā saṁjōyā, na īisō aṇubandhō; aō nāṇugacchanti.

ajja sārahi,
jaï ēvaṁ, tā niratthayā taṁmi piī.

ajja sārahi, jaï ēvaṁ, tā kō uṇa
ihōvāō.
dēva, jōgigammō uvāō, na amhārisēhiṁ najaï.

bhō jaï ēvaṁ, tā sabbasāhāraṇē ēyaṁmi asōhaṇē payaīē avayāraē ēgantēṇa vijjamāṇō
vāē acintiūṇa ēyaṁ alamimiṇā naciēṇa, ēōvāē cēva khalu ēsa juttō jattō tti.

ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa saṁviggā nāyarayā, pavanā
kēi mangaṁ, nibaddhāī bōhibīyāī.

avekkhiūṇa kumārassa mahāṇubhāvayaṁ vimhiyā cittēṇa paḍibaddhā kumārē, uvarayā nacciyavāō,
vāvaḍā sāhuvāē, payaṭṭā hōciyaṁ karaṇija.
etthantaraṁmi dēvasēṇamāhaṇāō imaṁ vaïyaramāyaṇṇiūga ahiyayarabhīēṇa rāiṇā kumārāhavaṇanimittaṁ pēsiō paḍihārō.
kumāra, mahārāō āṇavēi, jahā kumārēṇa sigghamāgantavvaṁ ti.
ja kumārō āṇavēi ti niyattiō sārahiṇā rahavarō.

kumāra, bhaṇissāmi kiṁ ci ahaṁ kumāra; tā avassamēva taṁ kāyavvaṁ kumārēṇa ।
kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ.
tāya, alakṣaṇīyavayaṇā gurakhō, na ēvaṁ santatabhārārōvaṇē kāraṇamavagacchāmi.

ahavā kiṁ mamēiṇā, amīmaṁsā
gurū, savvahā jaṁ tumbhē āṇavēha.
vaccha, ērisō cēva tumaṁ ti, kēvalaṁ mama nēhō avarajjhaï.

tā bhaṇisaṁ avasarēṇa;
saṁparya karēhi uciyaṁ karaṇijja.

paṇamiūṇa saviṇayaṁ niggayō kumārō, gaō niyayagēhaṁ,
kayaṁ uciyakaraṇijjaṁ.
abhayā samaṁ asōyāīhiṁ dhammakahāvāvaḍassa niyabhavaṇasēviṇō visuddhabhāvassa samāgaō paḍihārō.

kumāra,
mahārāō āṇavēi, jahā āgayā etya tuha māulasayāsāō kēṇāvi pōyaṇēṇa amahiyā mahantayāḥ tā kumārēṇa sigdhamāga
ntabvaṁ ti.
jaṁ gurū āṇavēi tti bhaṇiūṇa uḍhiō kumārō, gaō saha asōyāī hiṁ rāyasamīvaṁ.

vaccha, pēsiyāō tuha māmaēṇaṁ mahārāyakhaggasēṇēṇaṁ sabahumāṇaṁ āsattavēṇi(ya)vimuddhāō niyasuyāō
vinbhamavaïkāmalayāhihāṇāō jīviyāō vi īṭṭayarāmō sayaṁvarāō duvē kannayāō.

ēyāō ya bahumāṇēṇa tassa rāiṇō aṇuvattamāṇēṇa
visiṭṭalōyamaggaṁ aṇurāēṇa kannayāṇaṁ āṇāē guruyaṇassa avassaṁ kumārēṇa īṁdvatyasaṁpattīē āṇandiyabyāō.

ēvaṁ ca kara samāṇē tassa
rāiṇō visiṭṭhalōyassa kannayāṇaṁ gurusayaṇassa ya niyamēṇa nivvuī saṁjāyaï.
dukkhahēyavō saṁjōyā, niōyavayaṇaṁ ca ēyaṁ, abhatthiō ya pubdhi, taṁ pi mannē imaṁ cēva.

alakhaṇīyā guravō, iṭṭatthasaṁpattīē niya
mēṇa nivvui tti sōhaṇā ya vāṇī, na yāvi bhāvaō guruāṇāparāṇa saṁjāyaē asōhaṇaṁ.
vaccha, alamettha cintāē, sumarēhi mama patyaṇaṁ.

na etya bhavaō kallāṇaparaṁparaṁ mōtūṇa annārisō
pariṇāmō.

taō ēyamāyaṇṇiya ahō sōhaṇayarā vāṇi tti harisiyamaṇēṇa aṁpiyaṁ kumā
rēṇa.

sāhu vaccha sāhu, uciō tē vivēō, sōhaṇā guru
bhattī, bhāyaṇaṁ tuma kallāṇāṇaṁ.
annaṁ ca, jāṇāmi ahaṁ bhavaō visuddhadhammapakkhavāya, juttō ya ēsō saṁyāṇa.

asārō saṁsārō, niyāṇaṁ
nivvēyasta; tahāvi kusalēga aṇuyattiyanbō lōyadhammō, kāyavvā kusalasaṁtatī, jaïyavvaṁ parōvayārē, aṇuyattiyanvō kulakkamō.

ēvaṁ ca
abbhatthē lōyadhammē pariṇaē ēgantēṇa nipphannē pōrusē païṭṭhiē vaṁsaṁmi jāṇiē lōyasārē pariṇaē vayaṁmi avagaēhi ubaddavēhiṁ guṇabhāya
ṇīkaē appāṇē juttaṁ visudhammāsēvaṇaṁ.

etthantaraṁmi
kacchantaragaēṇa harisavisēsaō mahayā sadēṇa aṁpiyaṁ siddhatthapurōhiēṇa.

aṇantaraṁ ca viya
mbhiō maṅgalatūrasaddō, guluguliyaṁ matahathiṇā, ugghuṭṭō jayajayārakhō bandilōēṇa.
bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa kumāra, avassametra ēyaṁ ēvaṁ havissaï, aṇugūlō saüṇasaṁghāō.

annaṁ ca, visuddhadhammō viya kāraṇaṁ cēva tumaṁ
paramasundarāṇa.

lg.l: niṇṇāsiūṇa timiraṁ mōhaṁ ca jaṇassa saṁpayaṁ sūrō
majjanti jaṇā kēī dēvāṇa karenti kēi pūyāō

p.s: taō ēyamāyaṇṇiya aē kahaṁ majjhaṇhasamaō ti jaṁpiyaṁ rāiṇā.

jaṁ tāō āṇavēi tti
paṇamiūṇa niggaō kumārō.
bhō bhō amaccā, karāvēha tumbhē samantabhō kumāravi ddhirisaṁ baddhāvaṇāi.

pāraddhaṁ ca ṇēhiṁ, davāviyaṁ mahādāṇaṁ, karāviyā nayarisōhā, pūiyāō dēvayāō, nivēiyaṁ paürāṇa, sadāvi
yāī pāyamūlāī, davāviyā āṇandabhērī, pūrāviyā harisasaṅghā, viśnattamantēurāṇa, samāhūyā rāiṇō, niuttāī pecchaṇayāī.

taō thēva
vēlāē cēva pahaṭṭhapaürakalayalaravaṁ paṇaccantē hiṁ pāyamalē hiṁ vajantapuṇṇāhatūraṁ gambhīrabandimaṅgalaravēṇa pavattapiṭṭhāyayarayaṁ sōhiyaṁ sindūra
dhūlīē āulaṁ antēurēhiṁ milantarāyalōyaṁ mahayā vimadēṇa visēsiyatiya salōyaṁ jāyaṁ mahāvaddhāvaṇayaṁ.
dēva, dhannō kumārō, kayā cēva saṁjattī.

tahāvi jaṁ dēvō āṇavēi।āiṭṭhō
ṇēhi bhaṇḍāriō.
bhadda, rayaṇāyara, nirūvēhi pahāṇamuhapantīō, samappēhi dēvīṇa, nīṇēhi nāṇāharaṇaṁ, niuṭhnēhi dāyaē.
jaṁ amacā āṇaventi, na ettha mē vilambō.

bhadda dēvaṅganihi, païyaḍēhi dēvaḍaāīṁ, saṁpāḍēhi pariyaṇasta, saṁjattēhi
rāyadēvīṇa joggāī, kārāvēhi ullōyaṁ.
tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ jaṁ amacā āṇati, savvaṁ saja mēyaṁ.

bhadda mahāmāyali,
nirūvēhi mahāpahāṇāuhāī, samappēhi narakēsarīṇaṁ nīṇēhi rahavarē, niuñjēhi vivihasōhāē.

bhada gayacintāmaṇi, payaḍēhi vēyaṇḍē, saṁpāḍēhi pariyaṇassa, saṁjattēhi vāruyāō, karāvēhi
savvamuciyaṁ.
ja amacā āṇaventi, na etya vikkhayō.

bhaha kēkāṇadhūli, gaccha nirūvēhi vandurāō,
bhūsēhi turaē, pēsēhi uciyāṇa, ṭhāvēhi narindagōyarē.

ēvaṁ ca āēsasamaṇantaraṁ jāva
ēyaṁ saṁpajjaï, tāva avarēhi mahayā riddhisamudaēṇa bahuyājannāvāsē saṁpāḍiyaṁ uciyakaraṇija, niyattiō mahāullōvō, asiyāī
maṇitōraṇāī, nibaddhā kaścaṇadhayā, ṭhaviyā kaṇayavēī, kayā kaścaṇamaṅgalakalasā, saṁjōiyaṁ ṇhavaṇayaṁ, paüttō kulavihī, hāviyāō
vahuyāō, pūyāviyāō mayaṇaṁ, karāviyāōraïti, bhūsāviyāō maṇaharaṁ.

etthantaraṁmi āsannaṁ pasatyaṁ laggati pahāṇajōisiyavayaṇāśrō
saṁpāḍiyasayalakulavihī pūjiūṇa kuladēvayāō vandiūṇa guruyaṇaṁ saṁmāṇiūṇa mittē pecchiūṇa maṅgalāṇi vivāhagamaṇanimittaṁ samaṁ
asōyāīhiṁ samārūḍhō rahabaraṁ kumārō.

uḍiō āṇandakalayalō, pahayāī maṅgalatūrāī, paṇaciyāō vāravilāsiṇībhō, pagāiyāī
maṅgalamantē urāī, caliyā mahārāyāṇō, paviyambhiō bhuyajalōō, āṇandiyā nagarī, harisiō rāyā.

taō mahayā vimadēṇa
saṁvēgabhāviyamaī cintayantō bhavasarūvaṁ thunyamāṇō bandīhiṁ pasaṁsijjamāṇō lōēṇa pattō vivāhabhavaṇaṁ, ōiṇṇō rahavarāō, saṁpāḍiō sē
vihī, kiyamaṇēṇōciyaṁ divāō bahūō aïsundarāō rūvēṇa.

tattha vinbhamavaī kaṇayāvadāyā, kāmalayā uṇa sāmalā, siṇiddhadaṁsa
ṇāmī ya dō vi niyavaṇṇēhiṁ.

vibbhamavaī gayadantamaī viya dhīulliyā kuṅkumakayaṅgarāyā accantaṁ virāyaē, kāmalayā uṇa dhōinda
ṇīlamaṇimaī viya sarasahariyandaṇavilēvaṇa tti.

ahō ēyāsi kallāṇā āgiī, pasatyāī aṅgāī,
nikkalaṅka lāyaṇaṁ, visuddhō ābhōō, uvasantā muttī, sundarāī lakkhaṇāī, aṇahā dhīrayā, uciō viṇayamaggō; aō bhaviyavva
mēyāhiṁ pattabhūyāhiṁ.

etthantaraṁmi battō hatthaggahō, jāliō aggī, kayaṁ jahōciyaṁ, bhamiyāī maṇḍalāī, saṁpāḍiyā jaṇōvayārā, dinaṁ
mahādāṇaṁ, ghōsiyā varavariyā, battō vivāhajannō, saṁpāḍiyā sarīraṭṭhiī.

pariṇaōvāsarō, sīyalīhūyaṁ ravibimba, saṁhariō kiraṇaniyarō,
samāgayā saṁjñā, kaṇayarasarajjiyaṁ piva jāyaṁ nahaṅgaṇaṁ, viyambhiyā puvadisā, samuggaō candō, ullasiyā nahasirī, uvārūḍhō pōsō.

etthantaraṁmi samaṁ asōyāīhiṁ virāyantamaṇipadīvaṁ saṁgayaṁ kusumokkhārēṇa sēviyaṁ bhamarāvalīē palambamāṇacampayadāmaṁ vāsiyaṁ paḍa
vāsēhiṁ saṁgayaṁ pavarasaïyaṇīēṇa viyambhamāṇasurahidhūvaṁ vihaïsiyaṁ saparivārāhi vahahiṁ vāsabhavaṇamaïyaō kumārō.

uvaviṭhṭhā saṁsayapoṭṭasabhihē cittāvaḍimasarayami vinbhamavaī
kāmalayā ya.

navaraṁ vinbhamavaīē kundalayā kāmalayāē ya māṇiṇī sannihāṇē uvavi
ṭṭhāō.
iṅgiyāgārakusalāhiṁ muṇiyakālakāyavvayāhiṁ uvaṇīyamēyāhiṁ kumārassa tambōlaṁ, samappiyā ya kundalayāē baülakusumamālā.
kumāra, añcantāṇurāyō sahatthagutthā khaṁ ēsā tuha piyayamāē ti.

kumāra, ēyaṁ pi ēvaṁ cetra; tā nihēu ēyāī jahājōyaṁ kumārō,
karēu ēyāsi saphalamaṇurāyaṁ ti.

jayappabhīimēva bandiṇā samugghōsijjamāṇaṁ suyaṁ kumāranāmayaṁ rāyadhūyāhiṁ, taïyappabhīimēva gahiyāō pamō
ēṇa visāēṇa ya thuṇanti rāyakannayājammaṁ nindanti ya, abbhasanti kalākalāvaṁ cayanti ya, kuṇanti kumārasaṁkaha na kuṇanti rya,
jhijanti dēhēṇa, vaṭṭhuṁnti vibbhamēhi, muccanti lajjāē, gheppanti uvvēvaraṇa.
ēyaṁ ca pecchiūṇa kimēyaṁ ti visaṇṇō rāyā.

niuṇa
sahiyāyaṇāō ya nisuō ēsa vaïyarō.
taō thāṇē ahilāsō tti harisanibbharēṇa pēsiyāō iha.

āgacchamāṇīō ya saṁpannama
mhāṇa samīhiyabhahiya ti mayaṇagōyarādīyadhiyārasuhasamēyāō pavaḍamāṇēṇa muhāisaraṇa iha saṁpattāō tti.

hanta atthi ēyāsi mamōvarimaṇurāō, aṇura tā ya pāṇiṇō āyaī na gaṇenti, āyaṇṇanti
vaïyaṇaṁ, gēhanti nintriyappaṁ, payanti bhāvēṇa, saṁpāḍenni kiriyāē.
bhōīō, kimēvamē yaṁ, atyi tumhāṇa mamōpari aṇurāō tti.

ēyamāyaṇiūṇa harisavisāyasāraṁ hanta kimēyaṁ
ti gambhīraṁ mantiyaṁ ti cintiūṇa vāmacalaṇagudrayālihiyamaṇikoṭṭhimaṁ savisēsabandhurāhiṁ na jaṁpiyamimīhi.
kumāra, abhaṇamāṇīhipi vāyāē sāhiyamimīhiṁ kumārassa ahippēyamimiṇā saṁbhamēṇa divyabuddhīē avahārēu kumārō.

kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ।
bhōīō, jaha ēvaṁ, tā suṇēha.
jassa jaṁ paī ahiyapavattaṇicchā, tassa taṁ paï kī isī aṇurāō tti.

tāṇaṁ ca visayasuhamaṇuhavantāṇa
aïkkantō kōi kālō.

īē ya viittanijjūhaṭṭhiyāē disāvalōyaṇasamayaṁmi diṭṭhō rāyamagga
vattī dēvayāyayaṇapatthiō vimalamaïsatyavāhaputtō suhaṁkarō nāma seṭṭhī juvāṇaō ti.

taṁ ca daṇa avivēyasāmasthaō abbhatthayāē
gāmadhammāṇa samuppannō tīē tassōvari ahilāsō.

ēsā vi ya samāgayā tassa didvigōyaraṁ, mōhadēsēṇa nirū
viyā, ajjhōvavannō tīē.
ṭhiō sō ēgadēsē mōhadōsēṇa, dunnivāraṇīō mayaṇapasarotti.

halā,
āṇēhi ēyaṁ suvaïjaṇamaṇasuhaṁ juvāṇayaṁ ti bhaṇiūṇa pēsiyā raīē abhinnarahassā jāliṇī nāma cēḍī.

subujjñāva(vi)yāṇi ettha vaïyarē
kāmihi yayāī ti payāriūṇamāṇiō ya ṇāē, pēsiō vāsaharē, uvaviṭhṭhō pallaṅkē.
na ettha annō uvābhō ti pēsiō vacaharaēṁ.

paviṭṭhō rāyā,
uvaviṭhṭhō pallaṅkē, ṭhimaō kaṁvi vēlaṁ.
arē saddāvēha vaïriyaṁ, pavisāmō pavikkhālayaṁ ti.

niyamaō vāvāijjāmi tti añcantabhī ēṇa jīviyābhilāsiṇā agāhē vaccakūvē nindhayāraṁmi añcantadurahigandhē nivāsē
kimiulāṇa pavāhiō appā.

nivaḍiō vaccaharayāō kaṇṭhaē, bhariō asuiēṇa, vidhiō kimīhi, niruddhō diṭṭhipasarō, saṁkōḍiyaṁ
aṅga, uiṇṇā vēyaṇā, āulīhuō dada, gahiō saṁmōhēṇa.
iō ya sō rāyā paccuvekkhiyaṁ aṅgarakkhēhi paviṭṭhō vaccaharayaṁ.
niggō baccaharāō, ṭhiō raīē saha cittavigōēṇa.
halā jāligi, kēhaṁ puṇa sō bhavissaï.

dēvi, bhayāhihūō nūṇaṁ
pavāhiūṇa appāṇayaṁ vacakūvē maō bhavissaï.
ēvamēyaṁ, kahamanahā adaṁsaṇaṁ ti avagayā taccintā.

iō ya sō suhaṁ
karō taṁmi vañcakūvē tahādukkhapīḍiō bhaviyavvayāniōraṇa viittakammavasavattī asucirasapāṇabhōyaṇō gamiūṇa kaṁci kālaṁ visōhaṇa
nimittaṁ phōḍiē vaccaharaē asuiniggamaṇamaggēṇa vācanadēhacchavī paṇaṭṭhanaharōmō niggaō rayaṇīē.
kō ēsō amāṇusō tti bhīō sē pariyaṇō.
putta, kiṁ taē kayaṁ, jēṇa īisō jāō; kiṁvā tujjha vimokkhaṇaṁ kīraü.
taṁ ca kayaṁ, jēṇa īimō jāō mhi taṁ sāhēmi mandabhaggō tāyassa.

na etya annō ucāō, jahaṭṭhiya mēva sāhēmi tti cintiūṇa sāhiyamaṇēṇa (pavēsāiniggamaṇapajjavasāṇaṁ niyayavu
tantaṁ).
ahō akajjāsēvaṇasaṁkappaphalaṁ ti saṁviggō sē piyā.

kō nivāyathāmē, saṁtappiō sahassapāgāīhiṁ,
kālapariyāraṇa samāgaō puvvāvatyaṁ.
uciyasamaēṇa payaṭṭō dēvayāyayaṇaṁ, āiṇṇō rāyamaggē, diṭṭhō raīē.

puṇō
paüṇō puṇō diṭṭhō, puṇō pēsiyā puṇō vi hampiō.
tō pucchāmi tumbhē, kiṁ tīē raīē taṁmi muhaṁkarē aṇurāō atthi kiṁ vā natthi tti.
buddhirahiyā ya sā raī jēṇa na nirūvēi vatthu, na nihālaē niyabhāvaṁ, na pecchaē saparatantayaṁ, na cintēi tassāyaī ti.
bhōi, jaï ēvaṁ tā mamaṁmi vi natthi ēyāsimaṇurāō, buddhirahiyāyō ya ēyāō.

jēṇa asuṁdarē payaīē nibandhaṇē issā
īṇaṁ cañcalē sarūvēṇa icchanti tucchabhōē tti; aō na nirūventi vatthu.

tahā savvuttamaṁ māṇusattaṁ dullahaṁ bhavasamuddē pasāhaṇaṁ nevyāṇassa
na niubjenti dhammē tti; aō na nihālenti niyamāvaṁ.

tahā bhuvaṇaḍāmarō maccu aïkūrō payaīē, gōyarē tassa ēyāō na cinta
yanti attayaṁ ti; aō na pecchanti saparatantayaṁ.

tahā'sundaraṁ visayavisaṁ aïmōhaṇaṁ jīvāṇaṁ hēū gambhanirayassa, niuñjanti maṁ tattha
tti; aō na cintenti majjhāyaī.
tā ēvaṁ vavatthiē ahiyapavattaṇēṇa bhaṇa kahaṁ ēyāsiṁ paramatyaō mamōvari aṇurāō tti.

ēyamā
yaṇiūṇa saṁviggāō bahūō, jāyā visuddha māraṇā, khaviō kammarāsī, pāviyaṁ dēsacaraṇaṁ.

taō saddhāisaēṇa sabahumāṇaṁ paṇamiūṇa
kumāracalaṇajuyalaṁ jaṁpiyamimīhiṁ.
ajja utta, ēvamēyaṁ, na etya kiṁci annārisaṁ.

ajjaütta, mama uṇa imaṁ sōūṇa
avagaō viya mōhō, samuppannamiva sammaṁ nāṇaṁ, niyattō viya visayarāō, saṁjāyamiva bhavabhayaṁ ti.
tā ēvaṁ vavatthiē aṅgī kayanaṇōciyaṁ sarisaṁ niyāṇurāyassa āṇavēu ajjaüttō, jamamhēhiṁ kāyavvaṁ tiṁ.
sāhu bhōīō sāhu, uciō vivēō,suladdhaṁ tumhāṇa maṇuyattaṁ, jēṇa īisī kusalabuddhi tti.

ēē khu visayā
mōhajaṇiyā mōhahēyavō mōhasarūvā mōhāṇubandhā, saṁkilē sajaṇiyā saṁkilēsahēyakō saṁkilēsarūvā saṁkilēsāṇubandha tti paricayaha jāva
jīvaṁ, chaḍḍēha mōhaceṭṭhiyāī, aṅgīkarēha pasamaṁ, bhāvēha kusalabuddhiṁ, nirūvēha bhavaviyārē, ālōcēha cittēṇa, saṁtappēha gurūṇaṁ, ujjamēha
dhammē tti.

paricattā jāvajjīvamēva
amhē hiṁ ajjaütta tumhāṇumaīē visayā, sēsē u sattī pamāṇaṁ.

ahō ēyāsi
dhannayā, ahō sudhīrattaṇaṁ, ahō niravekkhayā ihalōyaṁ paï, ahō samuyāyārō, ahō haluyakammayā, ahō ubasamō, ahō paramatthannuyā,
ahō vayaṇavināsō ahō mahatthattaṇaṁ ahō gambhīraya ti.

sāhu bhōīō sāhu, kayatthā khu tubbhē, aṇumayaṁ
mamēyaṁ tumbha kusalāṇuḍhāṇaṁ.
paricattā maē vi jāvajīvaṁ visayā, aṅgīkayaṁ bambhacēraṁ.

ahō sōhaṇaṁ ahō sōhaṇa ti jaṁpiyaṁ asōyā
īhiṁ.

etthantaraṁmi ahō dhannayā
ēyāsiṁ, ahō mamōpari suhittaṇaṁ ti pavaḍamāṇasuhapariṇāmassa tayāvaraṇakammakhaōvasamaō vaḍḍamāṇayaṁ samuppannamōhināṇaṁ kumārassa ।
pavikkhiī tīyāibhāvō.
suō ēsa vaïyarō āṇandapaḍihārāō rāiṇā dēvīē ya.

etthantaraṁmi gahiyakhaggarayaṇā dipyamāṇēṇa maüḍēṇaṁ kuṇḍalālayavihūsiyamuhī ēkāvalīvirāiyasirōharā hāralayāsaṁgaēṇaṁ thaïṇajuēṇaṁ
maṇi kaḍa yajuttabāhulayā rōmāvalīsaṇāhēṇaṁ majjhēṇa rasaṇādāmasaṁgayaniyambā parihiēṇaṁ dēvadūsēgaṁ maṇinēurasaṇāhacalaṇā cacciya hari
yandaṇēṇa suratarukusumadhāriṇī mahayā ābhōēṇa parihavantī maṇipadī añcantasōmadaṁsaṇā samāgayā tattha dēvayā.

ahō kimēyamaccha
rīyaṁ ti vimhiyamaṇēhiṁ harisavisāyagabhiṇaṁ paṇamiyā ēēhiṁ.

parivattaṁ visaṁ, gahiyamamayaṁ; ujhiyā kilīvayā, paṁyaḍiyaṁ pōrusaṁ; bahatthiyā khuīyā, aṅgīkayamuyārata chinnō bhavō, saṁdhiō
mokkhō tti.

dēvi! tuma pi chaḍḍēhi sōyaṁ, asōyaṇijjō kumārō, paricattamaśēṇa bhavadukkhaṁ, aṅgīkayaṁ sāsayamuha
tumaṁ pi dhannā, jīē īisō suō samuppannō.
tā paricaya visāyaṁ, ālōcēhi kajja ti.

mahārāya, khaggapaharaṇōvalakkhiyā suṁdarisaṇā nāma dēvayā ahaṁ, tuha puttaguṇāṇurāiṇī
ihaṁ bhavaṇē parivasāmi.
ahō puttassa guṇā, jēṇa dēvayāō vi aṇurāyaṁ karenti.

bhaṇiyaṁ ca ṇāē
mahārāya, īisō kumārassa pahāvō, jēṇa dēvayāō vi ēvaṁ mantenti.

tā ēhi, gacchamha tassa antiyaṁ, pecchāmō dhammapiṇḍaṁ, karēmō
tayaṇuciṭṭhiyaṁ, savvahā juttamēyaṁ ti.

taō paṇamiūṇa dēvayaṁ visujjhamāṇapariṇāmāī gayāī kumāra
samīvaṁ.
muṇiyaṁ kumārēṇa, abbhuṭṭiyāiṁ saharisaṁ, paṇamiyāī viṇaēṇa, niviṭṭhāī āsaṇāī, kō āsaṇapariggahō.
tāya, kimēyamaṇuciyamivāṇuciṭṭhiyaṁ, ambāē vi, kīsa na sadāviō ahaṁ.

guravō khu
tubbhē, guruāēsasaṁpāḍaṇamēva kāraṇaṁ guṇapagarisassa.

diṭṭhā ya ṇēhiṁ kahiṁci
udēsē maṇirayaṇasuvaṇṇapuṇṇā duvē mahānihī tiyasasundarisamāō ya dō cēva itthiyāō.

pāviyaṁjaṁ pāviyavvaṁ ti pahaṭṭhā cittēṇa,dhāviyā
ahimuhaṁ.
bhō bhō purisā, mā sāhasaṁ mā sāhasaṁ ti.

nirūvēha uparihattaṁ, nivaḍaï tumhāṇa upari mahā
pavvaō, ēyagōyaragayāṇaṁ ca alamaïiṇā ceṭṭiēṇa.

diṭṭhō ya nāidūrē samaddhāsiyanahaṅgaṇō rōdō daṁsaṇēna akka
mantō jahāsanajīvē aṇivāraṇijjō sugaṇaṁ pi sāmatthēṇa duyaṁ nivaḍamāṇō pancō tti.

bhō ēvaṁ kvatthiē kō uṇa
iha uvāō.

kiṁ tu icchanti jē atyavisaē, tē saṁpattēhiṁ asaṁpattēhiṁ vā jahāsannayāē aba
bhanti ēēṇaḥ tahā avaṭhṭhaddhā ya pāventi puṇō puṇō ēvamēvāvē?haṇaṁ ti.

jē uṇa nirīhā atthaksirasu bhāventi tayasārayaṁ, tē vi
jahāsannayāē avaṭṭhabhanti ēēṇatahā abaḍhaddhā ya na pāventi puṇō puṇō ēvamēvāvaṭṭhahaṇaṁ ti, avi ya muccanti kālēṇa imāō uvadda
vāō.
sabahā payaṭṭamha atthavisapamu, jaṁ hōu taṁ hōu ti.

annē u hā hā ēvaṁ paripanthiē ēyaṁmi niyamanassarēhiṁ asundarēhiṁ vivāē kimettha atthavisaēhiṁ ti cintiūṇa
niyattā atthavisayāhi, bhāvanti tayasārayaṁ, jujjanti niyaniyaphalēhiṁ.
tā ēvaṁ vavatthira nirūvē u tāō, kē ettha dukarakārayā kē vā nahi.

jē payanti atthavisaēma, tē dukkarakā
rayā; jaō tahā paripanthiē pabaē niyamaṇasparēhiṁ asundarēhiṁ vivāē kimatthavisarahiṁ kīisī vā tahābhaē pavattī? aṇālōcayattamē
gantēṇa kiṁvā tīē tahādadvājjantāē upahāsaṭṭhēṇiyāē atyavisarthapatyaṇāē? paramatthēṇa nivēyakāraṇamēyaṁ sayāṇaṁ ti.
kumāra, jē payaṭṭanti, tē dukkarakārayā; apavattaṇaṁ tu juttijuttamēva, kimettha dukaraṁ ti.

tāya, jaï ēvaṁ,
tā paḍantē maccupacaē vāśayaē tihuyaṇassa aïbhīsaṇē paryaīē dujaē payārantarēṇa avibhāvijjamāṇasarūvē viōjaē idvabhāvāṇa sayā
paḍaṇasaṁgaē kāraē asamañjasāṇa kilēsāyāsakāragā atyavisayā visavivāyasarisā yā visayacāō ya avvābāhō payaīē kāraṇaṁ ama
yabhāvassa salāhaṇijjō sayāṇa akilēsasēkaṇi jō sēvijjaï ti kimettha dukaraṁ.

kahaṁ vā ēvaṁ vihē jīvalōē na dukkaraṁ atthavisayāṇu
vattaṇaṁ ti.
tāya, asammālōcaṇaṁ puṇa na hōi ālōcaṇaṁ.
vaccha, ēvamēyaṁ, kiṁ tu durantō mahāmōhō tti.

tāya, īisō aïsa durantō, jēṇa ēyasāmatyēṇa pāṇiṇō
ēvaṁvihē jīvalōē pahavantē vi uddāmamaccumi pecchamāṇā vi ēyasāmatthaṁ gōyaragayā vi ēyassa ghēpamāṇā vi jarāē viujjamāṇā vi
iṭṭhēhiṁ parigalantē vi vīriē cōijjamāṇā vi dhīrēhiṁ na amhāṇa vi ēvamēyaṁ pariṇamaï, annō va amha cintaō, jaṁ kiñci vā ēyaṁ,
acintaṇīyaṁ ca dhīrāṇaṁ, atthi vā āyattamuvāyantaraṁ, mōhacavasāyasajhaṁ vā imaṁ, avahīraṇā vā uvāō, accantiyā vā atthavisaya
tti agaṇiūṇa jarāidōsajālaṁ savvāvatthāsu bālā kāūṇa ganimīliyaṁ paricaïya savvamannaṁ kusalapakkhaceṭṭiyaṁ mahayā payattēṇa nivvaḍiya.
bhāvasāra payaṭṭanti atyavisaēsu, na payanti jarāidōsanigghāyaṇasamatthē hiē savvajīvāṇa acintacintāmaṇisagnihē sāhaē nevyā
ṇassa vīyarāgadēsiē dhammē tti.
vaccha, ēvamēyaṁ, na ettha kiṁci annaha tti.

kiṁ tu na saṁpannaṁ bālāṇē ahilasiyaṁ ti uciggā viya
mhi.

dhannāō imāō, saphalaṁ māṇusattaṇamēyāṇaṁ, saṁgayāō
mokkhabīēṇa.
annahā jahā uvaïṭṭhamajjaüttēṇa, tahēva ēvaṁ; saphalaṁ māṇusattamamhāṇa, pāviō ajjaüttapariṇisadō guruyaṇāṇuhāvēṇa tayaṇuruvaṁ ca sēsaṁ pi.
tā saṁpannamamhāṇa ahilasiyāhiyaṁ ti, pariccayaü uvvēvamambā.

ahō ēyāsiṁ rūvaṁ, ahō uvasamō, ō para
bhatyannuyā, ahō vayaṇavinnāsō, ahō gurubhattī, ahō mahatthattaṇaṁ, ahō gambhīrayā, ō samuyāyārō ni.
uciyamēyaṁ khagga sēṇadhūyāṇa, jamēvaṁ guruyaṇō aṇuvattīyaï.
etthantaraṁmi nāiṭrē purandara bhaṭṭagēhami samuddhāiō akkandō pavitthariō bharēṇa.

addhaü
varaō purandarabhaṭṭō ti tannimittaṁ pavattō tassa gēhē akkandō.
vaccha, na kōi ēyassa vāhī ahēsi; tā kahaṁ puṇa ēsa ubaraō.

tāya,
avattavvō ēsa vaïyarō garahiō ēgantēṇē.
vaccha, īisō ēsa saṁsārō, kimetya agarahiyaṁ nāma.

mahantaṁ ca mē
kōuyaṁ ti sāhēu vacchō na ya etya kōi asajjaṇō.
sajjaṇakahiyaṁ ca garahiyaṁ na vittharaï pāēṇa; saṁpayaṁ vacchō pamāṇaṁ ti.
tāya, mā ēvamāṇavēha; jaï ēvaṁ nibbandhō, tā suṇāu tāō.

addhavāvāijō ēsa niyamahiliyāē nammayābhi
hāṇāē visappaōēṇa.
tā pēsēhi tāva ettha visanigghāyaṇasamatthē vejjē, jīvaï taō ōsahapaōēṇa.

taggēhapōli
dakkhiṇāvaradisābhāē imiṇā cēva visappaōēṇa tīē daraghāiō kukkurō.

tassa vi imō cēva ōsahavihī paüñjiyayō; jī vissaï
sō vi imiṇā.
jahābhaṇiyamāisiūṇa pēsiyā vējā, bhaṇiyaṁ ca rāiṇā.

kumāra, kiṁ
puṇa tīē imassa asavvavasāyassa nimittaṁ.

tāya, avivēō nimitta tahavi puṇa visēsaō imaṁ.
vallahā sā purandarassa mōhadōsēṇa pasattā ajjuṇābhihāṇē niyadāsē.
annayā ya mā saṁtāṇaviṇāsō havaü ti sāhiyaṁ sē jaṇaṇīē.
putta, na sundarā tē mahiliyā; tā mā uvekkhasu tti.
abhinnacittā mē piyayamā, ambā ya ēvaṁ vāharaï! nibaddhavērāō ya pāyaṁ sāmuyāvahūō.
amacchariṇī ya ambā, piyayamā uṇa pagarisō guṇāpa.
cavalāō ya itthiyāō tti risivayaṇaṁ, na ya annahā havaï.

sundari, rāyāēsēṇaṁ gantavvaṁ maē māhēsaraṁ, āga
ntavaṁ ca sigdhamēva.
tā sundarīē kahavi diyahē sammamāsiyav ti.

ajjaütta, ahaṁ pi gacchāmi kīisa maïma taē
viṇā sammaṁ ti bhaṇamāṇī paruiyā ēsā.
sundari, alaṁ siṇēhakāyarayāē, na mama tattha khēvō tti.
biiyadiyahē ya niggaō purandarō, gō māyāpaōēṇa.
diṭṭhā ya ṇēṇa surayāyāsakhēyasuhapamuttā samaṁ ajjuṇaēṇa nambhayā.
muhāhāratullāō itthiyāō, jattēṇa ētāsiṁ bhōō pālaṇaṁ ca.

duṭṭō ya durāyārō
ajjuṇaō, jō mē kalattaṁ ahilasaï tā ēyaṁ vāvāēmi tti.
pecchāmi, ki mē piyayamā karēi tti.
hā hā vivannō mē piyayamō, hā haya mhi mandabhāiṇī.
aha kēṇa uṇa ēvaṁ kvasiya kūrō khu sō pāvō.
