kīsa vā ahaṁ na vāvāiyā, kiṁvā mamaṁ jīvaï (jīviēṇa) avaṇīyaṁ hiyayabandhaṇaṁ ।
niyattā raïsuhakahā.
cintiūṇa vāsagēhabhittimūlē khayā dīhakhaḍḍā, nihō tahiṁ ajjuṇaō.

kayā ya pāē tahiṁ paēsē thalahiyā, kappiyā tassa bondī, pūēi païdiṇaṁ,
karēi bēlibihi, nihēi nēhadīvaṁ, āliṅgaï siṇēhamōhēṇa.

na daṁsiō tēṇa viyārō, na
lakkhiō nammayāē.
ahavā agahīyasatthō īisō cēva ītthiyāyaṇō hōi.

tā karēu ēsā
jaṁ sē paḍihāyaï.
puci va tīē saha visayasuhamaṇuhavantassa aïkkantā duvālasasaṁghaccharā.

iō ya aīyapañcamadiṇē patthuyāē
paṁkkhāiyāē uvagappiē vivihadiyabhōyaṇē abhuttēsuṁ diēmuṁ samāsannāē bhōyaṇavēlāē diṭṭhā purandarēṇa tīē thalahiyāē piṇḍavihāṇa
muvagappayantī nammayā.
hanta ēēṇa mē piyayamō vāvāiō, annahā kahaṁ ēsa ēvaṁ jaṁpaï.

tā imaṁ ettha pattayālaṁ;
vāvāēmi ēvaṁ hiyayanandaṇasattuṁ, karēṣi vēranijāyaṇaṁ.
ēsō ya etthuvāō, dēmi sē visabhōyaṇaṁ ti.
abasarō tti kayamaja visabhōpaṇaṁ paüttaṁ ca ṇāē.
tāya, tassa vi imīē cetra thalahigāsaṁṇivipiyayamōvadavagārī imō ti taṁ cēva visabhōyaṇaṁ paüttaṁ.

lg.l: sō cēva satta vārē ēsa haō ajjuṇō tāya
mariūṇa jāyaï kimī tatthēva kalēvarē niyaē
jahiyaṁ tahiṁ cēva raī aïyaṁ pi hu mōhasāmatthaṁ

p.s:
ahō dāruṇayā saṁsārassa, ahō vicittayā
kammapariṇaīē, ahō visayalōluyattaṁ jīvāṇaṁ, ahō aparamatthannuyā; savvahā mahāgahaṇamēyaṁ ti.
dēva, dēvapasāēṇa jīvāviō purandarabhaṭṭō kukkurō ya.
dēva, dāūṇa chaḍḍāvaṇāī chaḍḍāviō visaṁ, tō jīvāviō tti.

etthantaraṁmi bālāyavasarisō payāsayantō naïyariṁ viyambhiō ujjōō, paṁjiyāō dēvadunduhīō, pasariō pāriyāyāmōō,
subvaē dibbagēyaṁ, vaḍiō harisavisēsō.

vaccha
kō ūṇa ēsa dēvō, kiṁnimittaṁ vā ayaṇḍē uppāō.

tāya, ēsa khalu guṇadhammaseṭṭhiputtō jiṇadhammō nāma seṭṭhika
mārō ajjēva dēvattamaṇupattō.

taō dēvalōyagamaṇanimittaṁ
daṁsēmi ēyāsiṁ niyayariddhiṁ ti uppaïō iyāṇi.

vaccha, kahaṁ puṇa ēsa ajjēva dēvattamaṇuppattō kahaṁ vā vivōhiō
ṇēṇa mittō bhāriyāṁ yēṁ.

tāya, ēsō vi vaïyarō kammaparatantasattaceṭṭāṇurūvō; tahāvi tāraṇa pucchiō tti
sāhīyaï.
annahā kahaṁ iisamēva ihalōyaparalōyaviruddhaṁ sāhiuṁ pārīyaï.

vaccha, īīsō ēsa saṁsārō, kimettha
nokkhayaṁ ti.
ēsa khalu jiṇadhammō jiṇavayaṇabhāviyamaī virattō saṁsāravāsāō nirīhō visaēmuṁ bhāvaē kusalapakkhaṁ.

mittō ya sē dhaṇayattō
nāma, bhāriyā bandhulā.
ihalōyaṁ paï asāhiūṇaṁ pariyaṇassa niyagēhāsanagēhē ṭhiō sabbarāiyaṁ paḍimaṁ.

ēsā vi viiṇṇadhaṇayatta
saṁkēyā ghettūṇa lōhakhīlayasaṇāhapāyaṁ pallaṅkaṁ gayā taṁ sunnagēhaṁ.
samāgaō dhaṇadattō, nivannō pallaṅkē, nisaṇṇā bandhulā, āliṅgiyā dhaṇayattēṇa, pabattaṁ mōhaṇaṁ.

bhārāyāsēṇa pīliō
khīlaō tāva jāva pāyatalaṁ vibhindiūṇa nimiō dharāē.

vēyaṇāisaēṇa mucchiō jiṇadhammō, ōyallō bhittikōṇē, na
lakkhiō īyarēhiṁ.
samāgayā cēyaṇā, ābhōiō vaïyarō, vaḍḍiyā kusalabuddhī.

ahō khalu īisā imē visayā
mōhenti kusalabuddhiṁ, nāsenti sīlarayaṇaṁ, pāḍenti duggaīē, sabahā duccigicchā ēē jīvāṇa bhāvavāhiṇō.

tā dhannā mahāmuṇī tahō
vasamaladdhijuttā tihuyaṇēkaguravō bhayavantō titthaṇāhā, jēsiṁ sannihāṇaō vi joggadēsāvatthiyāṇaṁ avisē sēṇa pāyaṁ na hōi pāvabuddhī
pāṇiṇaṁ ti.
ahaṁ puṇa adhannō añcantasaṁgayāṇa payattēṇa vi sabahā na caēmi bhāvōpayāraṁ kāuṁ mittabhāriyāṇaṁ pi, kimaṅga puṇa annēsiṁ.

ahō mē appaṁbharittaṇaṁ, ahō dukkhahēuyā, ahō akayatthattaṇaṁ, ahō kammapariṇaī, jēṇa maē vi saṁgayāṇaṁ aïēsiīīsa kiliṭṭhaceṭṭhiya uva
hāsapāyaṁ lōē nibandhaṇaṁ kugaïvāsassa.

sabahā virāhiyaṁ maē suhāsiyarayaṇaṁ, jamēvaṁ suṇīyaï, na khalu niṣphalō kallāṇamitta
jōō tti.
kīisī vā mama kallāṇayā, jēṇa ēvamēyaṁ havaï.

imaṁ puṇa bhayavantō kēvalī viyāṇanti
savvahā paramamantasumaraṇē karēmi payattaṁ ti.

ēvaṁ bhāvasāraṁ
cintayantō vimukkō jīviऍṇaṁ, uppannō bambhalōē.

lg.l: kō ’hamimō kiṁ dāṇaṁ kā dikkhā kō va mē tabō ciṇṇō
jēṇa ahaṁ kaya puṇṇō uppannō dēvalōgaṁmi

p.s:
akāūṇa dēva kiccaṁ pahāṇakaruṇāsaṁgaō vivōhaṇanimittaṁ mittabhāriyāṇa sayarāhamēva
samāgaō ihaī.

na ēvaṁvihāṇa aīvarāyapaïḍibaddhāṇaṁ viṇivāyadaṁsaṇamantarēṇa saṁbhavaï bōhō tti paüttā dēvamāyā, kayā bandhulāē visa
iyā.
gahiyā mahāvēyaṇāē, vēubviyaṁ asuinambālaṁ aïcikkaṇaṁ phāsēṇa pagiṭṭhadurahigandhaṁ amaṇōrama asuibhakkhaṇarayāṇaṁ pi.

bhijaē puṇō puṇō dhaṇayattō vi tēṇa pāvēṇa viya lippa
māṇō jambālēṇa.
ahō ēyassa nēhō, saṁpayaṁ cēva ubviyaï.

hā hā marāmi tti, mahaī mē vēyaṇā, bhajjanti
aṅgāī.
ahō kiṁpi ēyaṁ aïhapuvyamamhēhiṁ muttimantaṁ viya pāvaṁ, pagarisō asundarāṇaṁ.
piē, kimahamettha karēmi, na vahanti mē hatthā.
mahantamēvēmaṁ pāvaṁ, jaṁ paramadēvayākappō siṇēhālū vaściō bhattārō, kayamiṇaṁ ubhayalōyaviruddha.

samā
gayā saṁvēyaṁ, hā ajjaütta rōviuṁ payattā.

hā aṇajja dhaṇayatta, ēvaṁvihē jīvalōē ēdahamettē asārē sarīraṁmi
sōūṇa piyavayaṁsāyaṇaṁ upajīviūṇa tāpasāē kimiyamuciyaṁ ti.
ēvaṁvihāṇa ceṭṭhiyāṇa īisā cēva pariṇaï tti.

hā piyavayaṁsa, ḍhō
maïpa tumaṁ ti.

etthantaraṁmi ēsa ettha paḍibōhaṇasamaō tti jāṇiūṇa ōhiṇā tēsiṁ vippalōhaṇēṇa
divvarūvadhāriṇā saṁvēgavuḍḍinimittaṁ savapūyaṇāvabaēsēṇa dinna darisaṇaṁ.

avahariyā tīsē vēyagā iyarassa ya sōyā
ṇalō.

ahō ṇē ēyapahāvēṇa avagā vēyaṇayā, ahō sē sattī, ahō rūvaṁ, ahō
dittī, ahō kantī.
bhayavaṁ, kō tuma, kiṁ nimittaṁ vā ihāgaō si.

tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ।
dēvō ahaṁ jiṇadhammapaḍimāyaṇatthaṁ samāgō mhi.
jiṇadhammavivaśnapaḍimā viya dīsaha tti saṁkhuddhāṇi hiyaēṇa.

bhayavaṁ, vigayajīvā viya ēsā lakkhīyaï,
tā kō ettha paramatthō, sāhēu bhayavaṁ ti.
bhō bhō kiṁ nimittaṁ tubbhē attāṇayaṁ vāvāēha.
bhayavaṁ, alamamhāṇa nimittasavaṇēṇa divyanāṇanayaṇō bhayavaṁ kiṁ vā na yāṇaï.

tā imaṁ cēva amhāṇa pattayālaṁ dēvēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ.

bhayavaṁ, aoggāṇi amhē taduvaēsassa, gaō ya sō bhayavaṁ
amhāṇamadaṁsaṇīyamavatthaṁ ti.

na khalu kililukammāṇa āsēviē vi akajjē
kayāi pacchāyāvō hōi, sundarō ya ēsō, pakkhālaṇaṁ pāvamalassa.

na yāvi sō gaō tumhāṇamadaṁsaṇīyamabatthaṁ ti, jō sō cēva
ahayaṁ ti.
īisī ēsā kammapariṇaī, dāruṇaṁ mōhaceṭṭhiyaṁ, roddā visayavattaṇī savvahā, kimēiṇā.

saṁpayaṁ
pi dhammamettasaraṇāī hōha, paricayaha savvamannaṁ.

kiṁ tu assamēva ujjhiyavvā amhēhiṁ pāṇā, na
sakuṁṇēmō akajjāyaraṇakalakadūsiyaṁ bondi tuha vayaṇāō jaṇiyapacchāyāvāī saṁpayaṁ khaṇamavi dhāuṁ.

kayā sabaviraī, pañcakkhāyamaṇasaṇaṁ, jāō visuddhapariṇāmō, nindiyāī punbadukaḍāī,
pariṇaō saṁvēō, bhāviyaṁ bhavasarūvaṁ, paḍibuddhāṇi tti.

kayakiccabhāvēṇa pakkhiviya niyakaḍēvaraṁ uppaïō dēvō ti.
ēyamāyaṇṇiruṇa saṁviggōrāyā.
ahō na kiṁci ēyaṁ, māindajālasarisaṁ bhavaceṭṭhiyaṁ.

dullahō khalu ihaṁ kalla mi
tajōō, hiō ēgantēṇa; na iō kiṁci hiyayaraṁ, jēga ēyāṇa vi ēvaṁ pahāṇaguṇalāhō tti.
vaccha, kahiṁ puṇa ēyāṇa upavāō bhavissaï.
tāya, saccamēyaṁ viruddhayārīṇi, kiṁtu paḍivanamēēhiṁ pacchāyā.
tīē ya ēvaṁ vihaṁ cēva sāmatthaṁ, jamavirāhiyāē paḍivattikālaō na doggaī pāvijjaï.
tahāvi viruddhayārīṇi ēyāṇi, kahaṁ dēvalōyasaṁpanī ēyāṇa jujjaï tti.

tāya, sundarā viraïpariṇaī
saṁgayā appamāraṇa chēdaṇī dukkhāṇa jaṇaṇī suhaparaṁparāē.
imīē saṁgayā pāṇiṇō natyi taṁ kallāṇaṁ jaṁ na pāuṇanti.

rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ ।
vaccha, iyamēva kahamēyārisāṇaṁ saṁjāyaï, kaha vā imīē paḍivattinoggā ēvaṁ vihēsu akusalēsu payanti.

kiṁ tu na ēēsi aïsaṁkilēsasārā akusalapavittī tahāvihakammapariṇāmaō pavittimēta rahiyā aṇubandhēṇa, kusa
lapakkhē u accantabhāvasārā rahiyā aïyārēhiṁ saṁgayā āgamēṇa niravekkhā bhavapavañcē tti.

vaccha, ēvamēyaṁ, kaïhamantrahā
īisī pavittī bhavaṁ chindaï.

na khalu mē raī
ēyaṁmi naḍapēḍaokmē asundarē payaīē aṇavaṭṭhiyasiṇēhavinbhamē nihāṇabhūē savvāvayāṇaṁ mahāghōrasaṁsāraṁmi.
saṁsijjhanti niyamēṇa pāṇiṇō gurusamāiṭāī vihiṇā pavattamāṇassa kusalasamīhiyāī.

tā karēu tāō pasāyaṁ,
aṇujāṇaü maṁ ēyavaïyaraṁmi.

vaccha, naṇu savvēsimēva amhāṇamayaṁ nicchaō, tā
aṇujāṇiō maē.
ahavā tumaṁ cēva amhāṇa vimalanāṇabhāvaō bhāvōvayārasaṁpāyaṇēṇa kāraṇapurisayāē gurū, kimēvaṁ pucchasi.

tā
karēhi kāravēhi ya jaṁ ettha uciyaṁ ti.
tāya, mahāpasāō; uciyaṁ ca vavasiyaṁ tāēṇa.

etthantaraṁmi galiyapāyā rayaṇī, pahayāī pāhāuyāī tūrāī, viyambhiō bandisadō, pavāiyā paccūsapavaṇā, ullasiō aruṇō,
paṇahamandhayāraṁ, samāgayā divasalacchī, viuddhaṁ naliṇisaṇḍaṁ, miliyāī cakkavāyāī.

sāhiyaṁ tē si kumāracariyaṁ,
jāṇāviō niyayāhippāō.
dēva, juttamēyaṁ, sijjhaï ya ēyaṁ dēvassa.
ajjā, ēvamēyaṁ; tā karēhē uviyakaraṇija, alaṁ vilambēṇa.

ghōsāviyā varavariyā, payaṭṭiyaṁ mahādāṇaṁ, karāviyā saṁvyāyayaṇapūyā, saṁmāṇiō paürajaṇavaō, pūjiyā vandimādī, saṁmāṇiyā
sāmantā, pūjiyā gurakhō, ṭhāviō rajjami niyabhāiṇēō pasatyajōēṇa uciō khattiyavaṁsassa muṇicandakumārō tti.

taō ya pasatthē
tihikaraṇamuhuttajōē samaṁ guruyaṇēṇa mittayandrēga dhammapattīhiṁ amaccalōēṇa pahāṇasāmantēhiṁ purandarēṇa uyattaseṭṭhīhiṁ uciyanāyarēhi
mahayā riddhisamudaēṇa samārūḍhō divvamiviyaṁ; vajantēhiṁ maṅgalatūrēhi naccantēhiṁ pāyā lēhiṁ thuvyamāṇō bandīhiṁ pūrantō ya paṇaïmaṇōrahē
saṁgaō rāyalōēṇa aṇuhavantō kusalakammaṁ pulaï jamāṇō nāyaraēhi jaṇentō tēsi vimhayaṁ vaḍyantō saṁvēgaṁ vihintō bōhibīyāī visu.
patthuyaṁ pūyākammaṁ, jāō mahanbhuyaō, āṇandiyā nayarī.

gō ya bhayavaō sīlaṅgarayaṇāyarama caünāṇadhāriṇō pahāsāyariyassa
pāyamūlē, jahuttasiddhantavihiṇā pavanō pavvaja ti.

karāviyā ṇēṇa nayarīē
jiṇāyayaṇēsu avāhiyā, ghōsāviyā amārī.
imiṇā vaïyarēṇa dūmiō girisēṇō, gahiō kasāēhiṁ.

ahō mūhayā nagarasa, jamēyassi apaṇḍiyarāyaüttē
ēvaṁvihō bahumāṇō.
avaṇēmi ēēsiṁ bahumāṇabhāyaṇaṁ, vāvāēmi ēvaṁ durāyāraṁ.

samāgaō iyāṇi ēsa amhārisāṇaṁ pi
dasaṇagōyaraṁ.
bhayavaṁ ca samarāiccō jahuttasaṁjamaparivālaṇaraī bhayavaō pahāsāyariyassa pāyamūlē parivasaï.

aïkkantō kōi kālō।
puvvabhavabbhāsajōēṇa visiṭṭakhōvasamabhāvaō thēvayālēṇēvāhijjiyaṁ duvālasaṅga, āsēviō kiriyākalāvō, ṭhāviō vāyagapaē.
annayā ya sīsagaṇasaṁparivuḍō viharamāṇō ahākappēṇa vivōhayantō bhaviyāravindē gaō.

aojjhāuriṁ, tattha vi ya
vandaṇanimittaṁ sāhusāvagasamēō risabhadēvasaṁgayaṁ mahāvibhūīē sakāvayāraṁ nāma cēiyaṁ.

lg.l: diṭṭhaṁ ca tēṇa tahiyaṁ viyarḍa ujjāṇamajjhabhāyaṁmi

p.s: samāgayā tattha cāraṇamuṁṇī vijjhāharā siddhā ya.

etthantaraṁmi muṇiyasa
marāiccāgamaṇō samaṁ pariyaṇēṇa pamōya vilasantalōyaṇō bhayavaō bandaṇanimittaṁ aojjhānayarisāmī samāgaō pasanacandō.
tabhō vandiūṇa cēiē samarāicavāyagaṁ ca upaviṭṭhō tassa puraō.

bhayavaṁ, ēsa etya nāhinandaṇō
paḍhamadhammacakkavaṭṭī suṇīyaï.
tā kiṁ parēṇaṁ nāsi dhammō; ahaṁ āti, kahamēsa paḍhamadhammacakavaṭṭhi tti.
iha bharahavāsē imīē ōsappiṇīē ēsa bhayavaṁ paḍhamadhammacakkavaṭṭī.

na uṇa parēṇa nāsi dhammō, kiṁ tu aṇāimantā titthayarā,
tapparūviō ya dhammō aṇāimaṁ cēva.
bhayavaṁ, kimēsā ōsappiṇī savvattha havaï, bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ.

somma, nahi
avi ya pañcasu bharahēmuṁ pañcasu ya ēravaēsu, vidēhēsu puṇa avaḍhiō kālō.

tēsu savvakālamēva havanti dhammanāyagā titthayarā
cakkavaṭṭiṇō vāsudēvā baladēvā ya, tahā sijjhanti pāṇiṇō.

bharahēravara su aṇavaḍiō kālō, na savvakālamēva ēyamēvaṁ havaï, kiṁtu
pavattaē kālacakkaṁ.
susamabhupamā supamā susamadussamā dussamasusamā dussamā dussamadussama tti.

susamasusamā pavāharūvēṇa cattāri sāgarōvamakōḍākōḍīō, susamā tiṣiṇa, susamadussamā donni, dussamasusamā ēgā
sāgarōvamakōḍākōḍī ūṇā bāyālī sē hiṁ varisasahassēhiṁ.

igavīsavarisasahassamāṇā dussamā, igavīsavarisasahassamāṇā cēva
dussamadussama tti.
tattha susamasusamāē pārambhasamayaṁmi tipaliōvamāuyā lōyā, pamāṇēṇa tiṇi gavvūyāṇi.

lg.l: ēēsu ya annēsu ya naranāriṁgaṇāṇa tāṇamuvabhōgō
bhaviyā puṇabbhavarahiyā iya savvannū jiṇā benti

p.s: khīyamāṇāṇi ya āuyapamāṇāṇi havanti jīva susamārambhakālō.

musamārambhakālē uṇa
dupaliōvamāuyā, pamāṇēṇa dōni gāuyāṇi.

na khalu ēyāṇa vi visiṭṭhā
dhammādhammasannā.
khīyamāṇāṇi ya āuyapamāṇāṇi havanti jāva susamadussamārambhakālō.

susamadussamārambhakālē uṇa ēgapaliōva
māuyā, pamāṇēṇa ēgaṁ gavūyaṁ havaï.

na khalu ēyāṇa vi visihā dhammādhamma
sannā havaï.

khīṇapāyāē ya imīē ōyaraï ettha bhayavaṁ paḍhamapuhaïbaī sayalakalāsippadēsaō vandaṇijjō surāsurāṇa xjayagurū tēlōkabandhū
annāṇa timiranāsaṇō bhaviyakumuyāyarasasī x paḍhamadhammacakavaṭṭī ādititthagarō tti.

taō pavattaē vārenjāikiriyā dānasī ratava
bhāvaṇāmaō ya visiṭṭhadhammō.
khīyamāṇāṇi ya āuyapamāṇāṇi havanti jāva dussamasusamārambhakālō.

aṁikkamaï
kappatarukappō, avi ya pavarōsahimāiēhitō havanti ūṇāṇuhāvā ya.

havaï ya visidā dhamādhammasannā, jō imīē havanti
titthayarā cakkavaṭṭiṇō vāsudēvā baladēvā ya.
khīyamāṇāṇi ya āuppamāṇāṇi havanti jāva dussamārambhakālō.

dussamārambhakālē
ya pāyaṁ vāsasayāuyā, pamāṇēṇa sattahatthā.
uvabhōgaparibhōgā ya aüsahimāiēhitō habanti ūṇāṇuhāvā ya.

havaï tahā ya hīyamāṇā
visiṭṭhā dhammādhammasanā, jō imīē vi aṇuvattaē titthaṁ, pahabanti ya micchattakōhamāṇama.

khīyamāṇāṇi ya āupamāṇāmi
havanti jāva dussamadussamārambhakālō.

dussamadussamārambhakālē vīsavarisāuyā pāēṇa duhatyapamāṇēṇa pa chantē ya sōlasavarisāuyā
pamāṇēṇaṁ ēgahatthā.

uvabhōgaparibhōgā u amaṇōramēhi maṁsamāīhiṁtō havanti ūṇāṇuhāvā ya, dhaṇiyaṁ na havaï ya visiṭṭā dhammā
dhammasannā.
ussappiṇī vi pacchāṇupubīē ēvaṁvihā cēva havaï.

ēvaṁ ca iha
bharahavāsē imīē ōsappiṇīē ēsa bhayavaṁ paḍhamadhammacakavaṭṭī, na uṇa parēṇa nāsi dhammō tti.

rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ ēvamēyaṁ, avaṇīō
amhāṇa mōhō; bhayavayā aṇuggihīō ahaṁ icchāmi aṇusaddhiṁ.
etthantaraṁmi samāgaō tattha accantamajhatyō saṁgaō buddhīē paralōyabhīrū pariṇō vaōvatthāē indasammāhihāṇō māhaṇotti.
vandiūṇa bhayavantaṁ guruṁ ca uvaviṭhṭhō gurusamīvē.

bhayavaṁ, jamēyaṁ tumha samaē nāṇāvaraṇijjāilakkhaṇaṁ aṭṭhappagāraṁ kamma
muttaṁ, ēvaṁ visēsaō kahamēsa jīvō bandhati.

nāṇapaḍiṇīyayāē nāṇaniṇhavaṇayāē
nāṇantarāēṇaṁ nāṇapaōsēṇaṁ nāṇaccāsāyaṇāē nāṇavisaṁvāyaṇajōēṇaṁ nāṇāvaraṇijja kammaṁ bandhaï.

ēvaṁ dasaṇapaṁḍiṇīyayāē jāva daṁsaṇa
visaṁvāyaṇajōēṇaṁ daṁsaṇāvaraṇijjaṁ kamma bandhaï.

pāṇāṇukampaṇayāē bhūyāṇukampaṇayāē jīvāṇukampaṇayāē sattāṇukampaṇayāē bahūṇaṁ
pāṇāṇaṁ bhūyāṇaṁ jīvāṇaṁ sattāṇaṁ adukkhaṇēyāēm̐ asōyaṇayāēṁ araṁṇayāēm̐ apariyāvaṇayāēṁ sāyāvēyaṇijja kammaṁ bandhaï.

paradukkhaṇa
yāē jāva pariyāvaṇayāē asāyāvēyaṇijja kammaṁ bandhaī.

tivvakōhayāē tivamāṇayāē tivvamāyayāē tivvalōhayāē tivvadaṁsaṇamō
haṇijayāra tivvacarittamōhaṇijjayāē mōhaṇijja kammaṁ bandhaï.

mahāram mayāē mahāpariggayāē paścendiyavahēṇaṁ kuṇimāhārēṇaṁ jīvō nira
yāuyaṁ kamma bandhaï.
māillayāē aliyavayaṇēṇaṁ kūḍatulakūḍamāṇēṇaṁ tirikkhajōṇiyāuyaṁ kammaṁ bandhaï.

pagaïviṇīyayāē sāṇukōsa
yāē amacchariyayāē magussāuyaṁ kamma bandhaï.

sarāgasaṁjamēṇaṁ saṁjamāsaṁjamēṇaṁ bālatavōkammēṇaṁ akāmanijjarāē dēvāuyaṁ kamma
bandhaï.
kāyaüjjuyayāē bhāvujjuyayāē bhāsujjuyayāē avisaṁvāyaṇajōēṇaṁ suhanāmaṁ kammaṁ bandhaï.

kāyaaṇujjuyayāē jāva visaṁ
vāyaṇa nōēṇaṁ asuhanāmaṁ ti.

jāimaēṇaṁ jāva issariyamaēṇaṁ nīyā
gōyaṁ kammaṁ bandhaï.

ēvaṁ bhō dēśaṇuppiyā, ēyaṁ visēsaō ēsa jīvō
aṭṭappagāra kamma bandhaï.
aha ēvaṁ vavatthiē ki puṇa mokkhabīyaṁ, kahaṁ vā tayaṁ pāvijjaï.

pārambhō suhassa pasamasaṁvēgāiliṅgaṁ ucchāyaṇaṁ kammapariṇaīē pāvaṇaṁ ēgantēṇaṁ
kammindhaṇassa muhāyapariṇāmalakṣaṇaṁ acintacinanāmaṇisannihaṁ sammattaṁ.

ēyaṁ ca ēvaṁ pāvijjaï vīyarāgāidaṁsaṇēṇa visuddhadhammasēvaṇāē
guṇāhiyasaṁgamēṇaṁ pakkhavāēṇaṁ guṇēsu taïhābhabdhayāniōēṇa aṇugampāibhāvaṇāē visiṭṭhakammakhaōvasamēṇaṁ ti.
aha ēvaṁ vavatthira ēgantamuhasarūṣō mokkhō kahaṁ dukkha sēvaṇārūvāō saṁjamāṇuḍhāṇāō ti.
jahā cigicchāsēvaṇāō suhasarūvā āroggayā, tahā saṁjamāṇuḍhāṇāō ēgantasuhasarūvō mokhō tti.

na yāvi paramasthaō
dukkhasēvaṇāsvaṁ saṁjamāṇuṭṭhāṇaṁ paramasuhapariṇāmajōgō visuddhalēsāṇubhāvaō ya.

lg.l: na vi atthi rāyarāyassa taṁ suhaṁ nēya dēvarāyassa

p.s:
jē imē ajjatāē samaṇā nigganthā, ēē ṇaṁ kassa tēulēsaṁ vīivayanti? māsapariyāē samaṇē nigganthē vāṇamantarāṇa
dēvāṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ vīivayaï, ēvaṁ dumāsapariyāē samaṇē nimganthē asurindavajjiyāṇaṁ bhavaṇavāsīṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēulēsa vīivayaï, timāsapari
yāē samaṇē nigganthē asura(riṁda)kumārāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ vīivayaï, caümāsapariyāē samaṇē nigganthē gahagaṇanakkhattatārārūvāṇaṁ jōi
siyāṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ vīivayaï, paścamāsapariyāē samaṇē nigganthē candimamariyāṇaṁ jōisindāṇaṁ jōisarātīṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ vīivayaï, chammāsa
pariyāē samaṇē nigganthē sōhammīsāṇāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēōlēsaṁ vīivayaï, sattamāsapariyāra samaṇē nigganthē sarṇakumāramāhindāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēu
lēsaṁ vīivayaï, aṭṭamāsapariyāē samaṇē nigganthē vambhalōgalantāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēōlēsaṁ vīivayaï, navamāsapariyāē samaṇē nigganthē mahā
mukkasahassārāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ vīivayaï, dasamāsapariyāē samaṇē nigganthē āraṇaccuyāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ vīivayaï, ēkārasamāsa
pariyāē samaṇē nigganthē gēvējāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ vīivayaï, bārasamāsapariyāē samaṇē nigganthē aṇuttarōvavāiyāṇaṁ dēvāṇaṁ tēulēsaṁ
vīivayaï tēṇaṁ paraṁ surakē sukābhijāī bhavittā sijjhaï bujjhaï muccaï savvadukkhāṇamantaṁ karēi.

ēvaṁ bhō dēvāṇuppiyā, na yāvi
paramatthaō dukkha sēvagā gurūvaṁ saṁjamāṇuṭṭhāṇaṁ ti.

bhayavaṁ, kē puṇa pāṇiṇō ki kaïppagāraṁ kiṁṭhiiyaṁ vā kamma
bandhanti.

lg.l: mōhāuṁyavaṁjāṇaṁ paṁgaḍīṇa tē u bandhaṁgā bhaṇiyā
tē uṇa dusamayaṭṭhiiyassa bandhayā na uṇa saṁparāyassa
apamattasaṁjayāṇaṁ bandhaṭṭhiī hōi aṭṭha u muhuttā
jē vi pamattā'ṇāuṭṭiyāē bandhanti tēsiṁ bandhaṭṭhiī
sammadiṭṭhīṇaṁ pi hu gaṇṭhiṁ na kayāi vōlaē bandhō

p.s: bhayavaṁ, epramēyaṁ; avaṇīō amhāṇa mōhō; bhayavayā aṇuggihīō daḍhaṁ icchāmi aṇusahi.
etthantaraṁmi samāgayā kālavēlā, avagayā narindāī, kayaṁ bhayavayā uciyakaraṇija.

biiyadiyahē ya taṁmi cēva cēhaē avaṭṭiyassa
bhayavaō samāgaō aggibhūī ṇāma māhaṇō.
vandiūga bhayavantamāidēvaṁ samarāicavāyagaṁ ca ubaviṭṭhō tayantiē.
bhayavaṁ, sāhēhi majjha dēvayāvisēsaṁ taduvāsaṇāvihiṁ uvāsaṇāphalaṁ ca.

dēvayāvisēsō tāra sō vīyarāgō
vajiō dōsēṇa paramanāṇī pūjiō surāsurēhi paramatyadēsagō hiō sadhajīvāṇa acintamāhappō rahiōṁ jammamaraṇēhiṁ kayakiccō
païramappa tti.

taduvāsagāvihī uṇa jahāsattīē nirīhēga cittaṇa añcantabhāvasāraṁ uciēṇaṁ kamēṇaṁ rahiyamaïyārēhiṁ taduvaēsasāraṁ
aṇuṭāṇaṁ dāṇassa pālaṇaṁ viraīē āsēvaṇaṁ tavassa bhāvaṇaṁ bhāvaṇāṇaṁ ti.

uvāsagāphalaṁ puṇa sundaraṁ dēvattaṁ mahāvimāṇāiṁ accharasāō
divyā kāmabhōyā suṁkulapañcāiyāī sundaraṁ svaṁ visiṭṭhā bhōyā viyakkhaṇattaṁ dhammapaḍivattī paramapayagamaṇaṁ ti.

bhayavaṁ, nō bōyarāgō, sō paramamajjhatthayāē na kassaï uvayāraṁ karēi mā annēsi pīḍā
bhavissaï tti; akarentō ya taṁ hiō sabajīvāṇaṁ ti kō ettha hēū.

na khalu paramatthadēsaṇāō
mahāmōhanaüsaṇēṇa annō kōi uvayārō.
karēi ya taṁ bhayavaṁ annapīḍācāēṇaṁ ti.

bhayavaṁ
ēvamuvāsa gāē kō tassa upayārō, avijamāṇē ya taṁmi kahaṁ bhaṇiyaphalasiddhī, kahaṁ vā sā taotti.
na khalu taduvagārāō ettha phalasiddhī, kiṁ tu taduvāsaṇāō.

diṭṭhā ya ēsā taduvagārābhāvē vi vihiōvāsaṇāō cintāmaṇimanta
jalaṇēhi na ya tē tēhiṁ tippanti, kiṁ tu tadaṇusaraṇajēvaṇāsēvaṇēṇa ahippēyatthassa hōi saṁpattī, na ya sā na tēhiṁtō ti.
ahō bhayavayā sammamāvēiyaṁ, avagaō mōhō, icchāmi aṇusāsaṇaṁ ti.
etthantaraṁmi ahiṇavasāvagō saṁgaēṇaṁ vēsēṇaṁ sapariyaṇō samāgaō dhaṇariddhiseṭṭhī.

taō vandiūṇa bhayavantaṁ
vāyagaṁ ca uvaviṭṭhō tadantiē.

bhayavaṁ, sāhūṇa kayakāraṇāṇumaībhēyabhinnā sāvajajōyaviraī tā kahamētēsiṁ sāvayāṇa
thūlagapāṇāivāyādirūvāṇuvvayappayāṇē iyaraṁmi aṇumaī na hōi.
bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ sōma, avihigā hōi na u vihippayāṇēṇa.

saṁsiūṇa saṁvēgasāraṁ jahāvihiṇā bhavasarūvaṁ aṇavaḍiyaṁ ēgantaṇa
kāraṇaṁ dukkhaparaṁparāē, tabhigghāyaṇasamatthaṁ ca acantiyarasāyaṇaṁ jīvalōē akkhēvēṇa sāhagaṁ mokkhassa jahaṭṭhiyaṁ sāhudhamma, jaṇiūṇa
suddhabhāvapariṇaī vaḍḍiūṇa saṁvēgaṁ tahāvihakammōdaēṇa aāḍivajjamāṇēsu taṁ sāvaēsu ujjaēsu aṇuvyayagahaṇaṁmi majjha yassa muṇiṇō pasa
sthakhettāiṁmi āgārāiparisuddhaṁ payacchantassa vihippayāṇaṁ ti.
bhayavaṁ, ēvaṁ pi kahaṁ tassa iyaraṁmi aṇumaī na hōi.

atthi iha vasantaüraṁ nayaraṁ, jiyasattū rāyā, dhāriṇī
dēvī.

ajja utta, kōmuīē antēurāṇa jahi
cchāpayārēṇa ūsavapasāō tti.

karāviyaṁ rāiṇā ghōsaṇaṁ, jahā jō aja etya purisō vasihii,
taspta maē sārīrō niggahō kāyayō.uggadaṇḍō rāya tti niggayā savvapurisā, navaraṁ ēgassa sedviṇō chassuyā saṁvavahāravāvaḍayāē
lahuṁ na niggayā.

harē
gavēsahā kō ettha na nigga bhō tti.
mahārāya, amugasedvissa chassuyā na niggaya tti.

mā annē vi ēvaṁ karessanti tti na
mellēi rāyā.
puṇō puṇō bhaṇṇamāṇēṇa mā kulakhō bhāu tti mukkō sē jeṭṭaputtō.

na ya
samabhāvassa savvēsu ēgabahumannaṇē aṇumaī sēsēsu tti.

rāyatullō sāvaō, bāvāijamāṇavā
ṇiyagasuyatullā jīvanikāyā vāṇiyagatullō sāhū, binnavaṇatullā aṇubdhayagahaṇakālē sāhudhammadēsaṇā.
bhayavaṁ, ēvamēyaṁ, ahō mudihrō bhayavantēhiṁ dhammō.
etthantaraṁmi pubbāgaēṇēva paṇamiūṇa bhayavantaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ asōyacandēṇa.

bhayavaṁ, jē khalu īi thēvassa vi pamāyaceṭṭhiyassa dāruṇavi
vāgā muṇīyanti, tē kiṁ tahēva udāhu annahā.

jē āgamabhaṇiyā tē tahēvaḥ jaō na annahāvāiṇō
jiṇā.

bhayavaṁ, jaï ēvaṁ, tā kīsa kēsiṁci pāṇavahāikiriyāpavattāṇa
añcantaviruddhakārīṇa vi iṭṭatthasaṁpattī viulā bhōgā dī hamāuyaṁ atuṭṭō ya tayaṇubaṁdhō; annēsiṁ ca thēvē vi avarāhē savvavivajjaō ti.

jē khalu akusalāṇubandhikammajuttā saṁsārāhiṇandiṇō khuddasattā doggaïgā
miṇō kallāṇaparaṁmuhā bhāyaṇaṁ aṇatthāṇaṁ, tēsiṁ khalu akupalapavattīē pāvabharasaṁpūraṇatthaṁ iṭṭatthasaṁpattāi saṁjāyaē, vivarīyāṇaṁ tu bhaṇiya
bhāvavivarīyabhāvaō savvavivajaō tti.
etthantaraṁmi puvāgaraṇēva paṇa miūṇa bhayavantaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ tilōyaṇēṇa.
bhayavaṁ, abhayadāṇōvaṭṭhambhadāṇāṇa oghaō kiṁ pahāṇayaraṁ ti.

atthi ihēva bambhaüra
nayaraṁ, kusaddhaō rāyā, kamaluyā mahādēvī, tārāvalippamuhāō annadēvīō.

annayā ya rāyā vāyāyaṇōvaviṭhṭhō samaṁ kamaluyāpamuhāhiṁ
*caühiṁ aggamahisīhiṁ akkhajūyaviṇōēṇa ciṭṭhaï, jāva aṇēyakasāghāyamiyadēhō baddhō +payaṁḍarajjūē daṇḍavāsiēṇa āṇīō
takarō.
taō pāṇavallahayāē avalōiūṇa dīṇavayaṇēṇa disāō akkandiyamaṇēṇa.

ahō paḍhamacōrakārī asaṁpattamaṇōrahō vāvāi jāmi ahannō
tti.

ajjaütta, mā asaṁpattamaṇōrahō vāvāijaü, ajja uttapasāēṇa karēmō
kiṁpi ēyassa.

aṇumayaṁ rāiṇā, bhaṇiyaṁ karēha. taō egāē mōyāviūṇa abbhaṅgāviō sahassapāgēṇa, mahāviō sappaōyaṁ vhāvāviō
gandhōyagāīhiṁ, dina khōmajuyalaṁ.

annāē karāviō āsavapāṇaṁ,
bhakkhāviō vilaṁkē, vilimpāviyō jakkhakaddamēṇaṁ, dinnaṁ kaḍisuttayaṁ.
annāē bhuñjāviō kāmiyaṁ, pāyāviō dakkhāpāṇagāī, bhūsāviō dibbāharaṇēhi, dinnaṁ tambōlaṁ.

ajjaütta,
natthi mē vihavō ēyassa sundarayaradāṇē.
jīvēḷōyasārabhūyā mē tumaṁ, pahavasi mamaṁ pāṇāṇaṁ pi; tā kahaṁ natthi.
ajjaütta, mahāpasāō; jaï ēvaṁ, tā dēmi kiṁci ahaṁ ajjaüttāṇumaīē.

sāmiṇi, suṭṭha diṭṭhō, aō cēva saṁjāyapacchāyāvō viraō ahaṁ jāvajjīva
mēvākajjāyaraṇassa.
jaï ēvaṁ, tā dinnaṁ maē imassa abhayaṁ.

kimimiṇā hasiēṇa; ēvaṁ cēva pucchaha, kimettha sundarayaraṁ
ti.
maraṇabhayāhibhūēṇa na nāyaṁ maē sēsaṁ ti na yāṇāmi visēsaṁ.
etthantaraṁmi samāgayā kālavēlā, gaō sāvayajaṇō, pāraddhaṁ bhayavayā uciyakaraṇija.

ēvaṁ ca nāṇādēsēsu saphala viharamāṇassa
aīō kōi kālō.

jāyā sissaniṣphatti tti visiṭṭhajōya rāhaṇathaṁ bhāvaṇāvihāṇaṁmi raphavāha
sannisāō nāidūraṁmi cēva vivittē asōyaüjjāṇē ṭhiō samarāiccavāyagō paḍimaṁ ti.

diṭṭhō ya kiliṭṭhakammasaṁgaraṇa giri sēṇēṇa,
bahūyaṁ kālaṁ hiṇḍāviō tti añcantakuviēṇa rōdajjhāṇavattiṇā cintiyaṁ ca ṇēṇa.

ēsa ettha patyāvō, na puṇa ēyārisō saṁjāyaï;
tā vāvāēmi ēyaṁ durāyāraṁ, pūrēmi attaṇō maṇōrahē; tahā ya vāvāēmi, jahā mahantaṁ dukkhamaṇuhabaï pāyō tti.

taō sigdhamēva kuōi
āṇiūṇa vēḍiō jaracīrēhiṁ, sittō ayasitellēṇaṁ, lāiō aggī.

niyattiyā cintā, ṭhiō visuddhajjhāṇē, pariṇaō jōō, jāyaṁ mahāsāmāiyaṁ,
pavattamaüvvakaraṇaṁ, ullasiyā khavagaseḍhī, viyambhiyaṁ jīvavīriyaṁ, nihayā kemmasattī, baḍiō jhāṇāṇalō, dardū mōhindhaṇaṁ,
pāviyāō laddhīō, jāyaṁ jōgamāhappaṁ, visōhiō appā, ṭhāviō paramajōē, khaviyaṁ ghāikamma, uppāḍiyaṁ kēvala nāṇaṁ ti.

ettharaṁmi bhayavaō pahāvēṇa ahāsannakhettavattī caliyāsaṇō samāṇō āhōiūṇa ōhiṇā ghettūṇa kusumaniyaraṁ jaïṇayarīē gaīē
aṇēgadēvayāpariyariō mahayā pamōēṇa āgaō vēlandharō.

paṇamiō bhayavaṁ, pāḍiyā kusumavuṭṭī, vijjhaviō huyāsaṇō, avaṇīyāī
cīrāī.

arē rē durāyāra mahāpāvakamma aṇajja purisāhama adaṭṭabva sōya
ṇija, kiṁ taē imaṁ vavasiyaṁ.

etthantaraṁmi ya tō nāidūradēsavattī samāgaō muṇicandarāyā nammayāpamuhāō dēvīō mahāsāmantā
ya.
diṭṭhō ya ṇēhiṁ bhayavaṁ, vandiō paramabhattīē.

mahārāya, appaṇō
’vagārāya imiṇā aṇajjēṇa anāyasattuṇō amayabhūyassa bhayavaō ēvaṁ jalaṇadāṇapaōēṇa pāṇantiyaṁ ajjhavasiyaṁ.
aha kiṁ puṇa imassa ajjhavasāyassa kāraṇaṁ.

candasōmalēsō bhaya vacchalō
sabajīvāṇa nibandhaṇaṁ pamōyassa aṇuppāyaō pīḍāē tti.

mahārāya, na khalu ahametya kāraṇamavagacchāmi,
ettiyaṁ puṇa takkēmi.

etthantaraṁmi bhayavaō kēvalamahimānimittaṁ mahayā dēvēvandrēṇa ērāvaṇārūḍhō vajantēṇaṁ divbatūrēṇaṁ gāyantēhiṁ kinnarēhiṁ nacantēṇaṁ
accharālōēṇaṁ mahāpamōyasaṁgō āgaō dēvarāyā.

sōhiyaṁ dharaṇipīḍhaṁ, saṁpāḍiyā samayā, sittaṁ gandhōdaēṇaṁ, kō kusumokkhārō
niviṭṭhaṁ kaṇayapaümaṁ, āṇandiyā dēvā, harisiyāō dēvīō.

kayatyō si
bhayavaṁ, kvagaō tē mōhō, niyattā saṁkilēsā, viṇijiō kammasattū, pāviyā kēvalasirī, ubagiyaṁ bhaviyāṇa, tōḍiyā bhavavallī
pāviyaṁ sivapayaṁ ti.

ēyamāyaṇṇiya ahō bhagavaō siddhamahilasiyaṁ ti āṇandiō muṇicandō dēvīō
sāmantā ya.
vandiō ya ṇēhiṁ puṇō puṇō bhattibahumāṇasāraṁ.

etthantaraṁmi pagāiyā kinnarā, paṇaciyāō accharāō, pavattā
*kēvalamahimā, jāō mahāpamōō, samāgayā jaṇavayā.

etthantaraṁmi ahō mahāṇubhāvayā ēyassa, asōhaṇaṁ ca maē kayaṁ ti ciniūṇa akkhiviya kusalapakkhabīyaṁ avagaō girisēṇa
pāṇō.

bhō bhō dēvāṇuppiyā, aṇāimaṁ ēsa jīvō kaścaṇōvalō ba
saṁgō kammamalēṇa, taddōsaō pāvēi cittaviyārē, uppajjaï bahujōṇīsu, kayatthijjaï jarāmaraṇēhi, vēēi asuhavēdaṇaṁ, dūmijjaē
saṁjōyaviōēhiṁ, vāhijjaē mōhēṇa, sanivāiō viya na yāṇaï hiyāhiyaṁ, bahu mannaē apacchaṁ, pariharaï hiyāī, pāvaï mahāvayāō.

tā ēvaṁ vavatthiē paricayaha mūḍhayaṁ, nirūvēha tattaṁ, pūēha gurudēvaē, dēha vihidāṇaṁ, ujjhēha kicchāī, aṅgīkarēha metti, pavajaha
sīlaṁ, abbhasaha tabajōē, bhāvēha bhāvaṇāō, chaḍḍēha aggaī, jhāēha suhajjhāṇāī, avaṇēha kammamalaṁ ti.

ēvaṁ, bhō dēvāṇuppiyā,
avaṇīē kammamalaṁmi kallāṇīhaē jīvē vimuddhē ēgantēṇa na honti kēi dukkayajaṇi yā viyārā, hōi acaṁtiyaṁ paramasōrakhaṁ ti.
bhayavaṁ, kiṁ puṇa tassa purisāhamassa bhayavaō vi uvasaggakaraṇē nimittaṁ.

sōma, suṇa
guruō akusalāṇubandhō, sō ya ēvaṁ saṁjāō tti.

ēyaṁ ca sōūṇa saṁviggō rāyā dēvīō
vēlandharō sāmantā ya.
ahō na kiṁci payaṁ, sabbahā dāruṇaṁ anāṇaṁ ti.

anantaraṁ nirayagamaṇaṁ tivyāō vēyaṇāō, paraṁparēṇa u aṇantō saṁsārō ti.
nammayāra bhaṇiyaṁ.
bhayavaṁ, kērisā uṇa narayā havanti, kērisā nārayā kīisīō vā tatya vēyaṇāō havanti.

tē ṇaṁ narayā antō vahā bāhiṁ caüraṁsā ahē khuruppasaṁṭhāṇasaṁṭhiyā nicandhayāratamasā vēgayagahacandavaranakkha
tajōisapahā mēyavasāhirapūyapaḍalacikkhallalittāṇulēvaṇatalā amuī vissā paramadurabhigandhā kāu agaṇivaṇṇābhā kakkhaḍaphāsā
durahiyāsā asubhā narayā.

avi ya thimithimentakhārōdayā calacalentahimasakarā gharagharentavasakadamā phiṇiphiṇentapūyāulā ghogya
entaruhirojjharā simisimintakimivityarā jalajalentaükkāulā kaṇakaṇentaasipāyavā puṁphuentabhīmōragā muṁsuentakharamāruyā
dhagadhagentadittāṇalā karakarentajantāulā.
nēraïyā uṇa kālā kālōhāsā gambhīralōmaharisā bhīmā uttāsaṇayā paramakiṇhā vaṇṇēga.

tē ṇaṁ tatya niccaṁ bhīyā
niccaṁ tatthā niccaṁ tasiyā niccaṁ udhiggā niccaṁ paramāsuhasaṁbaddhā nirayabhavaṁ paccaṇuhabamāṇā ciṭṭhanti.

vēyaṇāō u iha vicitta
kammaṇiyāō vicittā havanti dārugā uttimaṅgacchēyā karavattadāraṇaṁ mūlavēhaṇāṇi visamajīhārōgā asandhicchēyaṇāṇi tattatambāi
pāṇaṁ bhakkhaṇaṁ vajatuṇḍē hiṁ aṅgabalikaraṇāṇi dariyasāvayabhayaṁ atthiuddharaṇāṇi ghōranikkhuḍapavēsā palittalōhitthiyāliṅgaṇāṇi savvaō
satthajōgō jalantasilāpaḍaṇāṇi mōhaparāyattaya ti ēvamāiyāō mahantīō vēyaṇāō.
bhayavaṁ, kērisāṇi subimāṇāṇi, kērisā dēvā, kīisī vā tattha sāyāvēyaṇāō.
tē ṇa vimāṇā vicitta saṁṭhāṇā sayarayaṇāmayā acchā sahā laṇhā ghaṭṭā maṭṭhā nīrayā nimmalā nippaṅkā nikaṅkaḍa.

cchāyā sappahā samirīyā saüjjōyā pāsādīyā darisaṇijjā abhirūvā paḍirūghā khēmā sivā kiṁkaraamara daṇḍōvarakkhiyā lāullōvi
(i)yamahiyā gōsīsasarasa(ratta)candaṇadadaradinapaścaṅgulitalā ubaciyacandaṇakalasā candaṇaghaḍasukayatōraṇapaḍiduvāradēsabhāgā āsa
tōsattaviulabaṭṭabagdhāriyamalladāmakalāvā pañcakṇṇasarasasurabhisukkapupphapuñjōrayārakaliyā kālāgurupavaraku durukaturukadhūvaïmaghamadhentaga
ndhudhdhuyābhirāmā sugandharagandhagandhiyā gandhavaḍibhūyā accharagaṇasaṅghasaṁ(vi)kiṇṇā divyatuḍiyasahasaṁpanna(ṇaïya) tti.

dēvā uṇa maṇahara
vicittacindhā surūvā mahiḍḍiyā mahajjuiyā mahāyasā mahabbalā mahāṇubhāvā mahāsokkhā hāravigaïyavacchā kaḍa yatuḍiyathambhiyabhuyā
aṁgēyakuṇḍalamaṭṭhagaṇḍayalakaṇṇapīḍhadhārī viittahatthāharaṇā vicittamālāmaülī kallāṇagapavaravatthaparihiyā kallāṇagapavaramallāṇulēvaṇadharā
bhāsuravondī palambavaṇamālādharā divyēṇaṁ vaṇṇēyaṁ divvēṇaṁ gandhēṇaṁ divvēṇaṁ phāsēṇaṁ divvēṇaṁ saṁghayaṇēṇaṁ divēṇaṁ saṁṭhāṇēṇaṁ divvāē iḍḍīē
divyāē juīē divvāē pahāē diyāē chāyāē divvāē accīē divvēṇaṁ tēēṇaṁ divbāra lēsāra dasa disāō ujjōvēmāṇā pahāsē
māṇā mahayā'hayanaṭṭagī yavāiyatantītalatālatuḍiyaghaṇamuiṅgapaḍapaḍaha(pa)vāiyaravēṇa divbāī bhōgabhōgāī bhuñcamāṇā viharanti.

lg.l: varamuravāṇaṁ ca vō nēva ya gēyassa vocchittī
raïsāgarāvagāḍhā gayaṁ pi kālaṁ na yāṇanti

p.s: bhayavaṁ, dēvā dēvasuhaṁ ca ēvaṁ bhayavayā sundaramāvēiyaṁ tā kiṁ iō vi sundarayarā siddhā siddhamuhaṁ ca.

kiṁ dēvāṇa sundarataṁ, jāṇaṁ jōō adhuvasarīrēṇa, dāruṇaṁ kammabandhapāra
tantaṁ, ukkaḍā kasāyā, pahavaï mahāmōhō, avasāṇindiyāṇi, garuī visayataṇhā, vicittā ukkarisāvagarisā, uddāmaṁ māṇasaṁ, aṇi
vāriō maccū, virasamavasāṇaṁ ti.

lg.l: savvē āharaṇā bhārā, savvē kāmā duhāvahā"

p.s:
sundarā, dhammasīlē, paramatyaō siddhā, suhaṁ pi tēsimēvaḥ jēṇa tē ṭhiyā ṇiyasarūvē mukkā kammabandhaṇēṇa pariṇidviyapaōyaṇā
vajjiyā maṇōrahēhiṁ khīṇabhavasattī jāganti savvabhāvē pecchanti paramatthēṇa aparokkhāviṇō nevyāṇakāraṇaṁ buhāṇaṁ virahiyā jamma
maraṇēhiṁ ti.
kiṁ vā na īisāṇaṁ muhaṁ, jō niyattā savvābāhāō paramāṇandajōēṇa.

lg.l: na vi atthi māṇusāṇaṁ taṁ sōvakhaṁ na vi ya savvadēvāṇaṁ

p.s:
atthi khiippaïṭṭhiyaṁ nāma nayaraṁ,, jaṁ uttuṅgahiṁ bhavaṇadēulē hiṁ pāyālamuvagaēṇaṁ pharihābandhēṇaṁ gayaṇayalavilaggēṇaṁ pāyārēṇaṁ visēsiyā
dhaṇayapuri iḍhiē bhavaṇēhi ya surindabhavaṇāī.
tami ya jiyasattū nāma naravaī hotthā.

lg.l: sō tīē samaṁ rāyā bhōē bhubjēi suratullē
vattē vi ya jīvavahē apahariō tēṇa vāūvēgēṇa

p.s: tō taṁmi visamadēsē khaliō āsassa aïvēgō.
etthantaraṁmi sambaddhabaddhakavaēṇa diṭṭhō savarēṇa sō rāyā.

tēṇa ya mahāṇubhāvō kōi ēsa puriō paḍiō bhīmamahāḍavīē, tā ka
rēmi sammamuciōvayāraṁ ti cintiūṇa kāūṇa tassa paṇāmaṁ gahiō āsō khalīṇaṁmi, nīō jalasamīvaṁ.

uttiṇṇō naravaī, uppallā
ṇiō turaō majjiō rāyā, ṇhaviō sabarēṇa āsō dāvi(ma)ūṇa mukkō paüradu(duru)vāparasē.

tō sugandhīṇi supāyāṇi kayalayaja
mbīraphaṇasāīṇi uvaṇēūṇa phaïlāṇi nivaḍiō cala gaṁmu.

ahō ēyassa akāraṇavacchalayā, ahō viṇaō ahō vayaṇavināsō, ahō mamōvari bhattibahumāṇō, ahō mahāpurisaceṭṭhi
yayakāyavvujjuttayā, ahō sajjaṇapagarisō tti tā karēmi ēyassa ahaṁ āhāragahaṇēṇa dhiī.
mahāpasāō tti kāūṇa puṇō paḍiō pāēsu sabarō.

pariṇaō vāsarō,
atthamuvagō sarō, jāō sajhākālō, kayaṁ uciyakaraṇijja rāiṇā.
saṁpāḍiō sē sabarēṇa varatūliṁ aïsayantō kusumasattharō.

saṁja
miūṇa tūṇīrayaṁ kōdaṇḍavaggahatthō samāgaō naravaïsamīvaṁ.
dēva suvasu vīsatthō tti bhaṇiūṇa pāradaṁ pāsēsu bhamiuṁ.

kāūṇa gurudē
vayā namokkāraṁ pasuttō rāyā cintayantō savaramahānubhāvayaṁ.

taō ḍhōiō mahāsavaïṇā paścavallahāṇa pahāṇō turu
katuraō.
taō aggāsaṇē nivēsiūṇa pallināhaṁ bhuttaṁ rāiṇā.

bhuttuttaravēlāē sahatthēṇa vilimpiūṇa savaranāī
parihāviūṇa dēva yalaṁ dinnaṁ sē aṇagdhēyaṁ samatthaṁ niyamāharaṇaṁ.

dēva sāhēhi, kō ēsa purisō, jō ēvaṁ dēvēṇa saṁpūiō
tti.
taō sāhiō rāiṇā āsāvahārāiō pasuttadarisaṇapajjavasāṇō palliṇāhaceṭṭhiyavuttantō.
ahō rāyasundari, uvacariyacō taē ēsa sabbhāvasāraṁ mama pāṇadāyagō.

gahēūṇa ya taṁ
palliṇāhaṁ karaṁmi gayā niyabhavaṇaṁ ēsā.

taṁ ca sōullōiyaṁ dēvagāivatthapūyāē sacitta
kammujjalaṁ barēṇa varacittāḍiyacandōdaēṇaṁ ōlambiēhiṁ pañcavaṇṇiyasurahikusumadāmēhiṁ pajaliyāhiṁ maṇippadīviyāhiṁ dhuvvantīhi
aṇavarayadhunnamāṇakālāgarukappūrapaürāhiṁ dhūvaghaḍiyāhi gaṇḍōvahāṇayāliṅgaṇisamēyāē tūliyāē sōviō dantamayapallaṅkē.
ēvaṁ ca pañcavihaṁ visayamuhamaṇuhavantassa aïkantō kōi kālō.

tō dāruṇamaṇagdhēyaṁ daviṇajāya cēlāiyaṁ ca mahandhamullaṁ
dinā sē sahāyā pañcaïyapurisā.
taō paṇamiūṇa naravaïṁ gaō sabaragāhō pattō kaïvayadiyahēhi niyapalli.
kattha tuma gaō si, kahi vā ṭhiō si ettiyaṁ kālaṁ, kiṁ vā taē laddhaṁ.

tō
sāhiō tēṇa rāyadarisaṇāiō palli pavēsapajjabasāṇō nigavuttantō.
taō ahiyayaraṁ sakō uhallō pucchaï taṁ jaṇasamūhō.

lg.l: kērisaō sō rāyā kī isarūvaṁ ca hōī tannayaraṁ
kērisaō tattha jaṇō kiṁvissiṭṭō ya paribhōgō
sō sāhiuṁ na sakaï uvamārahiyami tattha raṇami
bhakkhāṇaṁ ca phalāī jubaīsu pulindayāṇa jubaīō
sō sāhēuṁ vaṁphaï nayarasta guṇē jahaṭṭhiē tēsiṁ
nivyāēūṇa muhaṁ pugō vi tuhikō ṭhāi
ēvaṁ uvamārahiō na tīraē ettha sāhiuṁ mokkhō
navaraṁ sadahiyavvō na annahā bhaṇaï savvannū
na vi atthi māṇusāṇaṁ taṁ sokkhaṁ na vi ya savvadēvāṇaṁ

p.s: ēyaṁ āyaṇṇiūṇa ēvam ēyaṁ ti saṁviggā savvē.

parinā sannā uvamā cēva na
vijjaï.

sē na saddē nāsadē, sē na rūvē nārūvē, sē na gandhē nāgandhē, sē na phāsē nāphāsē, sē na
rasē nārasē.
avi ya sayalapavaśvarahiyaṁ sattāmattasarūvaṁ aṇantāṇandaṁ paramapayaṁ ti.

ēyamāyaṇṇiūṇa khaōvasama
muvayaṁ cārittamōhaṇīyaṁ muṇicandassa dēvīṇa sāmantāṇa ya.

bhayavaṁ, aṇuggihīyāṇi amhē bhayavayā imiṇā dhamma
dēsaṇēṇa.
samuppanō ya amhāṇaṁ bhayavaō cariyasavaṇēṇa saṁsāracārayāō nivvēō.
tā āisaü bhayavaṁ, kimamhēhiṁ kāyavvaṁ ti.

pāviyaṁ tumbhēhiṁ saṁsāracārayavimōyaṇasamatthaṁ chēyaṇaṁ nēhaniyalāṇaṁ pakkhālaṇaṁ mōhadhūlīē parama
nevyāṇakāraṇaṁ ajhaṁ nāṇapagarisassa palhāyaṇaṁ bhāvēṇa saṁkilē sāiyāravirahiyaṁ bhāvaō suddhacaragaṁ ti.

tamhā kayaṁ kāyanvaṁ, navaraṁ davvaō
vi ēyaṁ paḍivajasu tti.

ahō ēēsi dhannayā, pattaṁ maṇuyalōyasāraṁ
bhāvacaraṇaṁ ti.

davā viyaṁ āghōsaṇāpuvvayaṁ
mahādāṇaṁ, kārāviyā savvāyayaṇēsu pūyā, païṭāviō jeṭṭaputtō candajasō nāma rajjē.

niggaō mahāvibhūīē nayarāō pahāṇasāmantā
maccaseṭṭhilōyapariyaō nammayāpamuhantēurēṇa saha.
pavvaïyāṇi ēyāṇi bhayavaō pahāṇasīsassa sīladēvassa samīvē.
mayacaṁ, kiṁ sō purisāhamō bhayavantamuddissa attaṇōvasaggakārī bhaviō abhaviō tti.

asaṁkhejjēsu poggalapariyaḍēsu samaïcchiēsu tiriyagaīē sadla sēṇarāiṇō pahāṇaturaṅgamō hōūṇa
pāvissaï, jō ahō mahāṇubhāvō ti maṁ uddisiya cintiyamaṇēṇa.

ēēṇaṁ ca pasatthavisayacintaṇēṇa āsagaliyaṁ guṇapakkhavāya
bīyaṁ; kāraṇaṁ ca taṁ paraṁparayāē sammattassa.
aīēmu ya asaṁkhejjabhavēsu saṅghanāmamāhaṇō hōūṇa sijjhissaï tti.
annayā ya cōravaïyarēṇa ujjēṇīpa cēva gahiō girisēṇapāṇō, vāvāiō kumbhipāēṇa.
bhayavaṁ pi viharamāṇō kālakamēṇa gayō usahatitthaṁ.

nāūṇa kammapariṇaī kaō kēvalisamugdhā
ōpaḍivannō sēlēsiṁ, khaviyāī bhavodhaggāhikammāī taō sabbappagārēṇa caïūṇa dēhapañjaraṁ aphusamāṇagaīē gaō ēkasamaēṇa tēlōka
cūḍāmaṇibhūyaṁ appattapuvvaṁ tahābhāvēṇa paramavambhālayaṁ ūttamaṁ savvathāmāṇa sivaṁ ēgantēṇa acalamarujaṁ sāhayaṁ paramāṇandasuhassa jammajarā
maraṇavirahiyaṁ paramaṁ siddhipayaṁ ti.

kayā tiya sēhiṁ mahimā, pūjiyā bondī, gahiyāī pahāṇagāī, nīyāṇi suralōyaṁ, ṭhaviyāṇi vivitta
dēsē sāhiyāṇi dēvāṇa, samāgayā dēvā, divāṇi tēhi, pūjiyāṇi bhattīē, paṇamiyāṇi saharisaṁ, avirahiyaṁ ca tēsiṁ, paḍivattīē
karenti āyāṇuggahaṁ ti.

lg.l: jaṁ viraïūṇa puṇṇaṁ mahāṇubhāvacariyaṁ maē pattaṁ
tēṇē ihaṁ bhavavirahō hōu sam̐yā bhaviyalōyassa
